column1: Organiser toutes sortes d'événements entre amis, ... en 3 clics

TamenKoa?, c'est une appli vraiment innovante, pour créer et partager des événements entre amis (anniversaire, randonnée, soirée, concert, etc.) y ajouter une liste de courses, et si besoin une cagnotte, un co voiturage, etc.
L'appli TamenKoa? va simplement faire de chacun de vos événements un vrai succès
- Pourquoi nous avons besoin de vous ?

Nous avons déjà realisé une grand partie de notre projet TamenKoa?. Désormais nous avons besoin d’un soutien financier complémentaire pour être certain de transformer cette appli en un réel succès. Mais nous avons aussi besoin de votre opinion en tant qu’utilisateur, et prendrons en compte le moindre conseil ou la moindre idée pour en faire la meilleure appli d’events planner que vous puissiez imaginer.

Consommateurs & Mobilité, il est à l'origine de l'aventure et a créé AboutGoods Company pour mieux donner naissance au projet des applis KOA, après plus de 20 ans dans le marketing Grande Conso et ces 4 dernières années entièrement dédiées à l'Internet Mobile dans un centre de R&D en Suisse.

Design & Expérience utilisateur sont ses mots-clefs, elle en est même l'Ingénieur spécialisée au sein de l'équipe d'AboutGoods Company, rien de bancal ou de pas clair, tout pour l'évidence des usages et des fonctions.

Informatique & Architecture, son diplôme d'ingénieur en poche, elle prend en charge tout le back-office des applis et des services Internet d'AboutGoods Company, sans parler de notre R&D et du programme très innovant de Semantic Web soutenu par OSEO.

Informatique et Développement, sa licence de développeur en cours le plonge dans la conception et développement des applis mobiles de la famille KOA, au premier rang desquelles se trouve la super appli TamenKoa?, c'est tout dire.

Marketing & Usages, la grande spécialiste des stratégies gagnantes, qu'elle enseigne aussi à ses étudiants de Licence et Master Infocom. Elle met l'expertise de son agence NEVE au coeur du projet des applis KOA.

Images et Signes, c'est lui, c'est son truc depuis ses débuts dans les agences de com les plus prestigieuses et avec lui, les signes doivent dire ce qu'ils veulent dire. Il met avec sa complice Noémie l'expérience de son agence SPAAARK au service du projet des applis KOA.

Chipser"" des noms est un talent rare qui demande des heures d'entrainement. Nous n'hésiterons pas à nous filmer en train de nous empiffrer de chips tout en citant vos noms. Les premiers tests sont très concluants. Ces vidéos seront diffusées sur Facebook.
Les comptes premiums offerts seront distribués sous forme de codes qu'il faudra indiquer dans les paramètres de compte de l'appli.
WOW, il s'agit là d'un fond d'écran d'une dimension artistique inouie! Elle vous inspirera la joie et la bonne humeur à chaque fois que vous vous trouverez sur votre bureau.
Les titres de musique sont exclusifs et produits par Kcidy. Retrouvez cette artiste sur Soundcloud si vous souhaitez découvrir ce nouveau talent de la scène electro Lyonnaise.

Les objets personnalisés (pochette de téléphone, T-Shirt et sac à main) sont des accessoires uniques qui feront de vous un supporter confirmé et vraiment spécial de TamenKoa?. Une fois la phase ""C'est quoi"" passée, vous partagerez ce moment avec vos amis et ferez ainsi grandir la communauté TamenKoa?
Il s'agit d'une oeuvre originale de 50x70 réalisée spécialement pour l'occasion par un artiste independant. Chaque oeuvre offerte à nos donateurs sera bien sûr une oeuvre numérotée et signée.

Si vous choisissez un partenariat avec nous, votre marque (et/ou votre nom) sera présente au sein de notre appli et signalée comme partenaire officiel, nous aurons des discussions particulières avec vous pour rendre ce partenariat profitable pour nos deux entreprises.

L’appli TamenKoa? n’est que le début d’une grande aventure, notre ambition est d'apporter aux consommateurs une suite d’applis, chacune dédiée à des services particuliers, qui vont rendre certaines de vos actions quotidiennes beaucoup plus rapides et efficaces. Donc, après avoir aidé, restez à l’écoute, nous reviendrons vers vous dans quelques mois pour d’autres applis aussi incroyables qu'efficaces et vous récompenserons avec de super cadeaux, en particulier si vous avez contribué à diffuser l’appli TamenKoa? auprès de tous vos amis !

designer and engineer at HPC System LTD and this is my personal project UCASE: Sheet

Metal Case for UDOO board.

What is the UDOO?
The UDOO is a very powerful mini PC based on dual or quad core
ARM cortex-A9 CPU with great performance both on Android and Linux OS, and a

dedicated ARM processor for the GPIO.

Main specifications:
• Freescale i.MX 6 ARM Cortex-A9 CPU Dual/Quad core 1GHz
• Integrated graphics, each processor provides 3 separated accelerators for 2D, OpenGL® ES2.0 3D and OpenVG™
• Atmel SAM3X8E ARM Cortex-M3 CPU (same as Arduino Due)
• USB type A (x2) and USB connector (requires a specific wire)
• More features can be found at UDOO Features

UDOO is a great tool for  DIY projects, watch videos, play music and games, surf the internet or use it as XBMC media center.

Who is HPC System LTD?

HPC system LTD is cash drawers manufacturer successfully working more than 15 years.  I am designer and engineer at HPC system LTD. I got opportunity to walk through all business steps using all company resources and my boss supports my personal project(-s).

What is the UCASE?

As a DIY enthusiast I purchased the UDOO board but i couldn't get UDOO case. So, I have taken some of my ideas and combined with feedback from the UDOO enthusiast community in UDOO Forum to create the UCASE - UDOO Sheet metal Case for UDOO Dual and Quad. It covers the board so you can use it in all projects that need hiding components and wires but also it leaves all connections and headers open so you can easily attach any expansion devices/boards to meet your requirements.

Powerful development tool in a small package

I tried to make the design simple as possible. The UDOO board perfectly fits inside  the case which keeps it safe while letting you to access all plugins and pin outs without any problem.

There are two options:
• Case with 2,5"" HDD space which is the best for the UDOO Quad version.

If you don't need HDD place you simply remove it and the case become standard, because both parts have plastic feet.

The case assembly is two parts: bottom case (where the UDOO board fits in with four screws) and top cover. I tried to create the case design for all UDOO community needs. On bottom case part added holes for SATA cable and additional USB.
column3:
/>

On top part added holes for 40x40x10 mm 5V fan, holes for Arduino Mega/Due shields, knock out for LVDS touch screen display and Camera also.

For simple switching between operating systems just by changing microSD cards I added forming for easy access to it and a hole for external battery.

For those who need more memory space for projects like network attached storage or use the UDOO board as media center there is an option to add space for 2.5'' HDD or SSD.

This is view with all UCASE components: 5V fan, female headers kit to extend Meda/Due pins to the case top and HDD space.

*Images are for illustrative purposes only. HDD and UDOO board shown are not included.

UCASE Technical Specifications:

column1: Finish: Textured black powder coat (Options: matted black, glossy black)
Cooler: 40mm x 40mm x 10mm 5V adopted for Arduino pinout
Feamale headers: long leg arduino mega kit: 5 - 1x08

column3: 4 - M2.5x12 and 4 M2.5 nuts for fan.

column1: I want to bring a case to the community which is designed by

enthusiast for UDOO enthusiasts and offer a product that meets the demands for their projects.I want to transform my hobby into real business and start mass production. The More parts I can order, the cheaper they will be thus making final product less expensive.

Here is what I need: plastic feets, M3x7 weld studs
column3:
5V fans.

How can you help?

Make a donation and spread the word. Every

column1: little bit helps. If you know anyone who would be interested in the UCASE,

send them a link to this page! The more people hear about this project, the better the chance we'll hit our goal. Your contribution will help me bring this project into reality faster.

If you're interested in seeing the UCASE made and would like to receive one of the first editions, please contribute. 

Additional images in the gallery.

If  you decide to get reseller pack first contact me please.

Ever wish your arms were just a little bit longer to make sure EVERYONE is in the frame of your Selfie? Or you simply want to take a solo Selfie with more than just your head in the shot?

With either of these 2 Bluetooth® low-energy devices, you can now take a Selfie using these remote control units. Tiny, slim, lightweight. We know, we know, you've been searching everywhere, but now it's here.
Both Tags also double as an alarm! If you lose anything they are attached to within 50 feet, they will make your Smartphone ring to notify you.
And the best part is, they are ready to go! You won't be waiting months for updates on production &
column2: development. We've spent a lot of time and effort to make sure these Tags are ready now, plus, we've added loads of extra features!

column1:
SMART TAG:

The black remote control unit (the SmartTag) will activate the camera in your Smartphone by simply pressing the gray button. Just ""click"" &
column2: you're done!          (10-second self-timer option included)<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)

column1: The bonus feature in this unit is its AUDIBLE ALARM. You simply pair the unit with your Smartphone (via the free app), then clip the SmartTag (key chain included) to anything: your keys, a backpack, purse, etc., and if you drop or leave behind your keys, backpack, etc., your SmartTag will ring AND your cell phone will also ring to alert you!

WalletTag:

The smaller white remote control unit (the WalletTag) will activate the camera in your Smartphone by simply pressing the red button. Just ""click"" and you're done! The special feature in this unit is its SILENT ALARM. You simply pair the WalletTag with your Smartphone (via the free app), then place this super slim tag (3mm - the world's thinnest Bluetooth tracking device yet!) in your wallet or purse and if you drop or leave your wallet/purse/tagged item behind, your cell phone will ring to alert you within 50 feet!

There is also a map 'PIN-DROP' feature which shows you WHERE you lost your tagged item. And just in case you realize you've lost your item AND your phone battery died, simply plug in your phone charger &
column2: check the map locator in the app!

column1: ...but there's even MORE! If you lose your phone, press the red button on the Tag &

column5: >The SMART TAG measures 60mm x 35mm x 12mm (2.5"" x 1.5"" x 0.5"").

column1: How many Tag devices can a Smartphone pair with?
Using the free app, an iOS Smartphone can manage up to 4 Tags at once or 2 Tags on Android.
How do I replace the battery in my Tag?
Both devices have a simple sliding door to make battery replacement easy. WalletTag uses a single CR2016 battery (supplied). SmartTag uses a single CR2032 battery (supplied).
Both Tags have a range of approximately 150 feet radius.
How do the Tags attach to items?

column2: slips inside any wallet or purse without detection. It also has a custom pouch available. The SmartTag comes with a key chain.

column1: How are these Tags different from other locator products?
1) It has a Selfie Remote!! C'mon, how cool is that?

2)Two-Way Technology with the SmartTag : Find your item using your phone or find your phone using your SmartTag . (Note the WALLET TAG can find your phone, but the WalletTag itself is silent and cannot ring - it's specifically designed that way as a warning device for losing your wallet - i.e. your cash, so it doesn't let everyone else know!)
3) The WalletTag is THE thinnest item tracker device available on the planet: only 3mm (0.11"") thick.

column1: ","Ever wish your arms were just a little bit longer to make sure EVERYONE is in the frame of your Selfie? Or you simply want to take a solo Selfie with more than just your head in the shot?

With either of these 2 Bluetooth® low-energy devices, you can now take a Selfie using these remote control units. Tiny, slim, lightweight. We know, we know, you've been searching everywhere, but now it's here.
Both Tags also double as an alarm! If you lose anything they are attached to within 50 feet, they will make your Smartphone ring to notify you.

And the best part is, they are ready to go! You won't be waiting months for updates on production & development. We've spent a lot of time and effort to make sure these Tags are ready now, plus, we've added loads of extra features!

SMART TAG:The black remote control unit (the SmartTag) will activate the camera in your Smartphone by simply pressing the gray button. Just ""click"" & you're done!          (10-second self-timer option included)

The bonus feature in this unit is its AUDIBLE ALARM. You simply pair the unit with your Smartphone (via the free app), then clip the SmartTag (key chain included) to anything: your keys, a backpack, purse, etc., and if you drop or leave behind your keys, backpack, etc., your SmartTag will ring AND your cell phone will also ring to alert you!
Lost Your Phone Again? Your Tag Will Find It!

You can also tap the ""Find Me"" icon on the phone to make your Tagged item ring if you've lost it. There is also a map 'PIN-DROP' feature which shows you WHERE you lost it. And just in case you realize you've lost your item AND your phone battery died, simply plug in your phone charger & check the map locator in the app!
...but there's even MORE! If you lose your phone, just press the button on the Tag & your phone will instantly ring to let you know where you left it!

WalletTag:The smaller white remote control unit (the WalletTag) will activate the camera in your Smartphone by simply pressing the red button. Just ""click"" and you're done! The special feature in this unit is its SILENT ALARM. You simply pair the WalletTag with your Smartphone (via the free app), then place this super slim tag (3mm - the world's thinnest Bluetooth tracking device yet!) in your wallet or purse and if you drop or leave your wallet/purse/tagged item behind, your cell phone will ring to alert you within 50 feet!

There is also a map 'PIN-DROP' feature which shows you WHERE you lost your tagged item. And just in case you realize you've lost your item AND your phone battery died, simply plug in your phone charger & check the map locator in the app!
...but there's even MORE! If you lose your phone, press the red button on the Tag & your phone will instantly ring to let you know where you left it!
Free App can Tag up to 4 Items on iOS*
By ordering now, you'll get preferential pricing. You will be one of the first people to have one of these unique units. You will have the best Selfie shots and your tagged items will be safe!
BONUS GIFT WITH CERTAIN LEVELSDepending on your donation level we will also add to your order 1, 2, 3 or 4 unique patented RFID credit card shields to your order!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help: Ask your friends to get the word out and share this idea with them. Just use the Indiegogo social media links and email your friends. Thank you!
Creation of an E-Commerce web site to market online sales
Attend trade expos to show products to the promotional merchandising marketplace

Expand leather goods items to include wallets/purses that have a custom pouch for the Tag. This will be an ""Elegant Technology"" range of wallets with RFID shielding in conjunction with a pouch for the loss detection device. We're working on these now & have a Patent Pending application). See Gallery for prototypes
The WALLET TAG measures 50mm x 30mm and is only 3mm thick (2"" x 1 & 3/16"" x 0.11"") – THE world's thinnest on the market.
The SMART TAG measures 60mm x 35mm x 12mm (2.5"" x 1.5"" x 0.5"").
How many Tag devices can a Smartphone pair with?
Using the free app, an iOS Smartphone can manage up to 4 Tags at once or 2 Tags on Android.
How do I replace the battery in my Tag?
Both devices have a simple sliding door to make battery replacement easy. WalletTag uses a single CR2016 battery (supplied). SmartTag uses a single CR2032 battery (supplied).
What is the range of Tag?
Both Tags have a range of approximately 150 feet radius.
How do the Tags attach to items?
The WalletTag is super slim & slips inside any wallet or purse without detection. It also has a custom pouch available. The SmartTag comes with a key chain.
How are these Tags different from other locator products?
1) It has a Selfie Remote!! C'mon, how cool is that?

2)Two-Way Technology with the SmartTag : Find your item using your phone or find your phone using your SmartTag . (Note the WALLET TAG can find your phone, but the WalletTag itself is silent and cannot ring - it's specifically designed that way as a warning device for losing your wallet - i.e. your cash, so it doesn't let everyone else know!)
3) The WalletTag is THE thinnest item tracker device available on the planet: only 3mm (0.11"") thick.
4) Loss Proximity Alarm: Notifies you when you leave an item behind as well as remembers where you left the item as shown within the app on a GPS map.

The device will last through rain but isn't waterproof. However, tests where the SmartTag  had been fully immersed in water for 30 minutes (the Tag went into the washing machine by mistake!) showed the device worked again once the Tag had dried out. Now that's awesome!!
What version of iOS are these Tags compatible with?
They are compatible with iOS 6 & up
* Android currently pairs with a maximum of 2 Tags
Smartphone Compatibility for the WALLET TAG & SMART TAG App:
iPad Version 3/4 operating iOS 6 & above. iPad Mini, all versions operating iOS 6 & above. iPad Air & iPod Touch (Version 4) operating iOS 6 & above
Samsung: Galaxy S3/4/5/Note 3: Android OS, v4.4, Bluetooth® v4.0, Galaxy J: Android OS, Galaxy Round, Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition), Galaxy S4 mini:
SONY Xperia Z1, Xperia Z Ultra:
Asus Google Nexus 7 (2013), Asus PadFone Min
Communications Standard: Bluetooth® 4.0 Low Energy Wireless Technology

SmartTag"" (audible alarm) can be clipped to your bag, suitcase, child in the mall, or any item you wish to tag
Alert Range: User adjustable up to 50ft
VampireFreaks is the #1 social network in the world dedicated to gothic/industrial culture. Help us create a mobile app for our site!

VampireFreaks has been proud to support underground culture since 2000.  We have over 1.6 million members and an active, nurturing community.  The site is entirely self-funded without any corporate investors or outside help, and maintained by a very small staff.  Our most requested feature has been a mobile app for Iphone and Android.  We realize it is hard to compete with other large social networking sites such as facebook etc when we don't have a proper mobile app, and we believe the mobile app will be a major step in making Vampirefreaks grow.  We're not trying to be a social network for 'everyone', we are VampireFreaks, we bring together people who love all things dark and spooky, who have common interests and values.

This is your chance to help us bring the site to the next level - to reach mobile users who can access our network on the go, and create a mobile app for our site!  Our goal is to create a professional mobile app with the social networking features you love on the site.
Our proposal:  A FREE, professional mobile app for both Iphone and Android platforms.
Yes we want a mobile app just as much as you guys do!  We plan on making this a FREE app but it costs money to make!  We've heard your requests and this is your chance to make it happen.

We have already completed some of the work necessary for a mobile app, such as a semi functional API to connect to our database, and some of the design work complete.  However even with this work complete, there is still much that needs to be done.
Our minimum goal is $10,000 to pay for mobile app developers and create a sleek, professional app for both iphone and android.

Mobile app development is expensive!  We already have some of the work done, such as the design / user interface, and some of the server API.  But we still have a lot more work that needs to be done!  We want to bring you a quality, professional, mobile app experience.  Any money made above our minimum goal will be used to make the mobile apps more feature rich and awesome.

The minimum features we will include in the first version are:
Inbox
Contact Users / leave comments or inbox messages
Ideally we would like to surpass our goal.  We would ideally like to reach $50,000 to make the app super amazing and be able to include additional features such as:
Cults - View Cults, Cult Updates, Post Cult Threads and Comments
Location search - view mobile users in your area
In Addition, we would like use any extra funds to create a new mobile web version of the website, to match the new look of the mobile app.
The point is that we will use all proceeds to making our mobile app as awesome as possible.
If we don't reach the minimum goal we will still use the proceeds to create a mobile app although it will take us longer to create on a lower budget.
As a special thank you for your support we have some awesome rewards!
See the side panel for full rewards info.  We are producing limited edition stickers and tshirts just for this campaign, and brand new Blue VF Shotglasses.
$10 - get 2 brand new VF sticker designs that will be printed only for this campaign!  Once they're gone that's it!

You will receive 5 of each design chosen, for a total of 10 stickers.  These designs include a full-color sticker versions of one of our best-selling tshirt designs, as well as one never-before-seen design.

Cyber Tunnel Sticker (never-before-seen design by Niemand):

Guns and Ammo Sticker (by GodEmperor23):

$39 - Limited Edition VF Tshirt #1:

We are printing a limited run of only 100 tshirts worldwide, everyone who purchases this level will get the tshirt below.
Available in Mens / Unisex sizes S-2XL, and Womens babydolls and tanktops in S-XL.  Note - everyone at this level also receives the $6 level and one year premium membership ($20 value).

Limited Edition VF Tshirt Design #1:
Flying Bones (design by GodEmperor23):

$39 - Limited Edition VF Tshirt #2:

We are printing a limited run of only 100 tshirts worldwide, everyone who purchases this level will get the tshirt below.
Available in Mens / Unisex sizes S-2XL, and Womens babydolls and tanktops in S-XL.  Note - everyone at this level also receives the $6 level and one year premium membership ($10 value).
These tshirt designs have never been printed before and will never be printed again after this campaign, making them a collector's item.
Bat Robot Love (design by cloning_souls):

VampireFreaks Tshirt of your choice in your size (choose from any designs we have in stock), 2 Blue VF Shotglasses, 150 High Quality VampireFreaks.com Stickers, 10 VampireFreaks Buttons, 10 VampireFreaks Condoms, 10 VampireFreaks Syringe Pens, 2 VampireFreaks Patches, VF Drawstring Backpack. Plus you get the $10 level exclusive stickers. Over $90 Value! Free Shipping within the US. Outside of the US add $7 for shipping.
We're creating brand new Blue VF Shotglasses just for this level! High quality translucent blue glass with the VF logo printed on both sides:

I'd like to give my sincere thanks to all the Vampirefreaks users who have supported our cause throughout the years.  We realize that we are nothing without our users and it's our goal to keep our community alive and thriving. We realize that as a gothic/industrial website we are catering to an underrepresented market, but we have shown that by sticking together and bringing together a worldwide audience we can build an awesome community and help support independent music and underground culture.

Our goal is to complete the mobile app as soon as possible.  We know you want to see results for your support and we are working towards a deadline of December 31st 2012.

We are first year Design MFA students at College of the Arts. This start-up is an assignment for our Business of Design class. While we hope to make this start-up a reality in the future, the money from the campaign will all be donated to Architecture For Humanity (http://architectureforhumanity.org).
What makes watching the big game at a bar or at home ten times more exciting than being at the live game?
What is our company all about?

SmackTalk is an app for making light-hearted bets with friends in social situations. SmackTalk is first and foremost a way for friends to make small wagers, like for the cost of a beer or a basket of fries, while enjoying sports events.
SmackTalk takes the awkwardness out of exchanging money between friends and promotes fun friendly competition.
How does it work? Why should I get it?
It’s simple. To play SmackTalk, simply download the app, enter in your credit card information, which is securely stored, and SMACK... you are connected with your friends &
Live stats stream through the app to inspire your betting or help with less stat savvy players.  The app also validates any bet made between friends to keep “who won” out of the discussion.
The money exchanged between friends though SmackTalk is a legal transaction because the money is considered a gift and we do not make a profit off other people’s wagers.
Is the gambling market really that big?
Juniper Research estimates that betting on mobile devices alone will be a $100 billion worldwide industry by 2017.
According to an ESPN survey, about 118 million Americans gambled on sports in some manner in 2008.
So... yes. Mobile gambling is really that big.
We envision three potential revenue streams could be generated by SmackTalk.
The first is simply from charging users a small fee to download the app.
The second is from advertising sales-- any ad that would fly on espn could potentially find its way onto SmackTalk.
The last way we imagine making money is from data that will be mined from each user: significant bits of information like demographics, location, food and drink preferences.

SmackTalk is a great way to get your head in the game, and your face out of your smartphone screen. SmackTalk is a mobile application, but it’s all about escaping the virtual space by creating lively, person-to-person interactions. For gambling enthusiasts, sports fanatics, or just people wanting to have fun watching the Superbowl, SmackTalk changes the way we watch sports.

column6:
>No Key. No Problem.

Keys have been used to open locks for centuries. But keys have the same problems today as they did back then. They are easy to lose, they can be stolen, they are a pain to share, and if you share them, you must get them back. Sharing combinations has its own set of issues.

We thought it was time to put those problems behind us, so we created Noke. By using Noke and your smartphone, you'll always have easy access to all the important things in your life. In addition, you'll be able to share access to your possessions easily, safely, and securely.

How It Works
column12:
s=72ac23326567fe7ee0ea90975b19fcaf"" src="""" style=""""/>

We designed Noke to be the simplest electronic device you own. Once you've downloaded our iOS or Android app, Noke automatically finds and pairs to your Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smartphone. You can name your Noke and even give it a photo if you like. That's it. 

To unlock Noke, simply press the shackle. Noke wakes up and searches for your phone or a shared phone. If the phone is within a few feet, Noke will instantly unlock so you can be on your way. No need to launch an app or remove your phone from your pocket or purse.

If you have a specific reason to limit the range or turn off the 1-step unlock feature, you can do this within the app. In order to unlock with the 1-step unlock feature turned off, you can simply press unlock button in the app or use a Quick-Click code. This will allow you to lock your phone in a locker or stand near your lock without fear of it being unlocked. You can also set up push notifications in the app if you'd like to know when Noke is being opened.

Optional Cable and Bike Mount

You will probably want to use Noke on your bicycle, so we created a custom chain and bike mount to neatly and securely attach Noke to your seat post. Available for only $40.

Protect Your Things

column3: >Once you start thinking of all the places you'll use the Noke, you'll be glad to know we have discounted pricing for multi-unit orders.

column4: >Using our iOS, Android or Windows Phone app, Noke allows instant and secure sharing. You can choose permanent, one-time, or custom settings. Need to give Johny access to your locker while you're on vacation? With Noke, it's no problem.

column9: s=15e2e02863ed4ba82781b03fa7c553cc"" src="""" style=""""/>Noke is great in an office environment. In addition to granting access on specific days and times, you can use the history function to track who is using your Noke and when. You can even use the GPS feature to see where on a map your lock was accessed.

column3: >What if you forget your phone or your battery dies? With Noke, it's no problem. Our patent-pending Quick-Click technology allows you to create a custom access code. If you're ever without your phone, simply key in those clicks and your Noke will instantly unlock for you. You'll never worry about being stranded again.

column1: Long before it's time to replace your Noke's battery, you will receive notifications through the app. To replace the battery, simply unlock Noke and twist off the back cover. It's easier than replacing the batteries on your remote control.

In the unlikely event you let the battery completely drain, we've added a simple way to ""jump-start"" your Noke with an external battery so you can unlock your Noke, open the back, and replace the battery. This ensures you'll never have to worry about being stranded with a dead battery. Take a look at the image below to see how we will allow you to jump start Noke. All you need to do is press the replacement battery against the contact points and it will allow you to open Noke and replace the battery. No tools, dongles, wires, or adapters to lose. The contacts will be covered with a silicone insert to protect the contacts from the elements.
Compatible with iOS devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running iOS 7.0 or later (including iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, iPad minis).

Compatible with Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and  running the Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4) or higher versions of the Android operating system (including Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and several more).
Compatible with Windows Phone devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running Windows Phone 8.1 or newer.

Attractive. We designed Noke to look as good as it functions with a body the same size as an ordinary padlock but with subtle curves and bevels to complement its aesthetic. The compact size allows Noke to be used anywhere you'd use a traditional padlock.

Strong. While Noke is an incredibly attractive device, we also made it strong. Using hardened steel and boron, Noke will stand up to the toughest environments. Noke also uses the latest in anti-shim technology so you need not worry about thieves trying to use a shim to open your lock.
Water Resistant. You're sure to use Noke in places where it may get wet, so we removed any external buttons and added four silicone gaskets to keep the water out.

Security. Noke uses Bluetooth 4.0 which contains the highest level of security. Bluetooth 4.0 uses a 128-bit AES CCM encryption algorithm and we've added our own PKI technology and cryptographic key exchange protocol to ensure Noke keeps your valuables safe and secure.

Long-Lasting Battery. All these features would be useless if you had to worry about the battery. So we packed Noke with a long-life battery that will last over a year of normal use. If you use Noke infrequently, it should last a few years. If you need to replace the battery, this can easily be done without the use of any tools.

Noke is aimed toward innovating smart-locks of every kind, making locks an asset to consumers rather than a hindrance. The Noke team works to make securing, sharing and tracking locks a seamless and convenient user experience.

Once you start thinking of all the places you'll use the Noke, you'll be glad to know we have discounted pricing for multi-unit orders.

Using our iOS, Android or Windows Phone app, Noke allows instant and secure sharing. You can choose permanent, one-time, or custom settings. Need to give Johny access to your locker while you're on vacation? With Noke, it's no problem.

Noke is great in an office environment. In addition to granting access on specific days and times, you can use the history function to track who is using your Noke and when. You can even use the GPS feature to see where on a map your lock was accessed.

What if you forget your phone or your battery dies? With Noke, it's no problem. Our patent-pending Quick-Click technology allows you to create a custom access code. If you're ever without your phone, simply key in those clicks and your Noke will instantly unlock for you. You'll never worry about being stranded again.

Long before it's time to replace your Noke's battery, you will receive notifications through the app. To replace the battery, simply unlock Noke and twist off the back cover. It's easier than replacing the batteries on your remote control.

In the unlikely event you let the battery completely drain, we've added a simple way to ""jump-start"" your Noke with an external battery so you can unlock your Noke, open the back, and replace the battery. This ensures you'll never have to worry about being stranded with a dead battery. Take a look at the image below to see how we will allow you to jump start Noke. All you need to do is press the replacement battery against the contact points and it will allow you to open Noke and replace the battery. No tools, dongles, wires, or adapters to lose. The contacts will be covered with a silicone insert to protect the contacts from the elements.
Compatible with iOS devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running iOS 7.0 or later (including iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, iPad minis).

Compatible with Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and  running the Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4) or higher versions of the Android operating system (including Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and several more).
Compatible with Windows Phone devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running Windows Phone 8.1 or newer.

Attractive. We designed Noke to look as good as it functions with a body the same size as an ordinary padlock but with subtle curves and bevels to complement its aesthetic. The compact size allows Noke to be used anywhere you'd use a traditional padlock.

Strong. While Noke is an incredibly attractive device, we also made it strong. Using hardened steel and boron, Noke will stand up to the toughest environments. Noke also uses the latest in anti-shim technology so you need not worry about thieves trying to use a shim to open your lock.
Water Resistant. You're sure to use Noke in places where it may get wet, so we removed any external buttons and added four silicone gaskets to keep the water out.

Security. Noke uses Bluetooth 4.0 which contains the highest level of security. Bluetooth 4.0 uses a 128-bit AES CCM encryption algorithm and we've added our own PKI technology and cryptographic key exchange protocol to ensure Noke keeps your valuables safe and secure.

Long-Lasting Battery. All these features would be useless if you had to worry about the battery. So we packed Noke with a long-life battery that will last over a year of normal use. If you use Noke infrequently, it should last a few years. If you need to replace the battery, this can easily be done without the use of any tools.

Noke is aimed toward innovating smart-locks of every kind, making locks an asset to consumers rather than a hindrance. The Noke team works to make securing, sharing and tracking locks a seamless and convenient user experience.",15.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Short Summary

I'm a 19 year old college student studying Math and Engineering at Eastern Mennonite University in Harrisonburg, VA.  I'm seeking funding to prototype a solar powered electric tricycle that doesn't use batteries.  This project aims to take a Schwinn 26"" adult tricycle and outfit it with a 3x6ft solar canopy that provides up to 300 watts of instantly available power for pedal assistance.  The trike would be capable of a virtually unlimited range provided there is enough sunlight because it doesn't store charge, it captures available sunlight and sends it directly to the rear electric drive motor.  This eliminates the high cost, weight, and environmental impact that most electric vehicles are burdened by today.  I'm looking for funding to build a working prototype to demonstrate the viability of this standalone solar technology for lightweight vehicles such as bikes, tricycles, and scooters.  The current estimated bill of materials stands at just under $600, and I think it has the potential for commercial success.

I'll be constructing the photovoltaic array from scratch, working with 6x6 inch silicon solar cells and soldering them together in series.  The cells will be mounted on a 3x6 sheet of twin-wall corrugated polypropylene sheeting, and protected on top with an identically sized sheet of yellowing-resistant acrylic sheeting.  The array will be framed with angled aluminum, and sealed with silicone caulking.  I have constructed a number of solar panels in the past, and this is the cheapest and lightest method I have found.  The panel will produce 48V in full sun, but will experience lower voltages under cloudy or overcast conditions.  This electricity is fed into a solar regulator circuit and converts a range of 24-50V into a constant 24V with variable current.  A 24V motor controller is powered by the resulting electricity, and sends the power to the rear mounted 300W brushed motor.  The resulting setup will enable up to 300W of readily available power to be used and and controlled by a twist throttle on the handlebars.  Under full sunlight, 300 watts should be able to sustain 15-20mph on flat surfaces without pedaling, and provide significant assistance for climbing up hills.
• $400 or more: I'll start building the tricycle
• $1000 or more: I'll experiment with a small on-board battery that can be used for a quick boost for going up hills or low light situations, that will be recharged by the solar panel.

• $1200 or more: I'll buy a grid tie inverter and create an effective method to transfer excess solar energy while the bike is not in use into AC current that can be fed directly into an existing home grid to lower utility bills.
• $5000 or more:  I'd like to get a team together to explore how this could turn into a small company.

I've been fascinated with all kinds of technology from an early age.  I built my first software program at age 13 which I've been selling online ever since, I did a complete overhaul of the electrical and battery systems of a Razor scooter when I was 14, I opened a small business repairing Apple products at age 16, I began outfitting bicycles with small 2 stroke gasoline engines and selling them at age 17, I started building solar panels at age 18, and I recently created a script that provides instant notifications of ticket availability for a number of Comedy Central shows, which has had tremendous success on the internet so far.  I've loved working on all of these little projects, and I'm always looking for something new to do.  I've considered buying or building an electric bicycle for some time now, but battery technology is highly inefficient and quite costly.  I have always been fascinated by the free readily available power that can be harnessed with solar panels, and I think it has great potential for single-person transportation.  With your help, I'd like to turn this from an idea into a working product.

column2:
What You Get

Here's where the funding will go:

column1:
• Buying an adult trike, solar cells, electric motor and chain drive sprockets, electronic circuitry, and canopy framing.
  • Obtaining a few tools that I currently don't have, including a welder
Here's what I can offer to funders:
• $10 or more: I can send you a thank you postcard with a photo of the finished trike.
• $50 or more: Your name will be added to a plaque that will be attached at the rear of the prototype trike, letting the world know who helped fund its development.
• $200 or more: I'll use CAD software and a 3D printer to make a small model of the trike and send it to you.
• $400 or more: I'll build another trike and sell it to you for cost of parts + $50.

The Impact

I am embarking on this project to demonstrate how solar technology can be used for transportation without the need for expensive, heavy batteries.  Batteries take a lot of resources to produce, and their short lifespans makes them less economically viable, and worse for the environment.

If I succeed in building a working prototype for a reasonable cost, I would like to attempt to commercialize the product.  Your financial assistance will help move this project along into what hopefully becomes a marketable product.
• Being able to use lower-voltage power from the solar panels when light is not ideal.
• Solar panel capacity limited to 300W, may need to increase array size depending on how much mechanical power is actually able to be produced.
• Rapidly fluctuating voltage of panels in variable light may yield to non-smooth ride.
""Setbacks are just learning experiences."" - Beth Brooke
A project like this will have setbacks, there's no avoiding that.  But the more that goes wrong, the more there is to learn and perfect.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this project but can't help financially, here are a few things you can do:

• Spread the word, Share on Facebook, and just make some noise about it.
  • Shoot me an email with any suggestions or resources you might be able to offer.

Thanks for looking!

my name is Silvio Pitteri and I am an Italian materials engineer, 58, living in Bruxelles, that after 25 years of work in R&
column2: D (tribology, surface engineering, composites, polymers...) and in the plastic industry, needed a change and some action with aluminium: the PlyGo foldable stand became the obvious answer to that compelling need of making something challenging out of aluminium, while on the contrary, if that need had targeted another material, like for instance linear low density polyethylene, none of my relatives, friends and customers would nowadays be so familiar and fulfilled with that little foldable quadruped named PlyGo.

column1: PlyGo is made with high quality components that are either reusable or recyclable. Its aluminium bars are protected by anodization and come in five standard colours (black, blue, orange, green and ""natural aluminium""), making of PlyGo an elegant, stable, strong, repairable and durable friend.

The innovative and original ""plank-free"" concept on which PlyGo is based has allowed it to evolve into a foldable and highly configurable stand that can be comfortably and ergonomically adapted to various usage situations, with all kinds of laptops and tablets, adhering to PlyGo thanks to Velcro strips: when sitting at the desk or on an armchair, when lying in bed, when travelling, when tele-working from home or from Internet cafes, and this without feeling unpleasant pressures or heat on the body, without assuming bad postures, and without risking falls of laptops or tablets.

Which makes PlyGo particularly attractive for people who often use their laptop or tablet from home, either because they telework, or because they are ill or disabled. Or, to the other extreme PlyGo is attractive also for people always on the move, like business men, managers, tourists, travelers…
Nowadays PlyGo is not anymore perceived as a kind of UFO, i. e. an Unidentified Folding Object, because this cool, ergonomic, foldable &
column2: portable laptop stand is getting more and more noticed by the people and by the internet world, which appreciate its qualities, special features and advantages: the very positive reactions of visitors during the Concours Lépine 2016 in Paris (bronze medal), of spectators following its TV appearances, and of world-wide backers during a previous successful Kickstarter Campaign, demonstrate that many people are very keen on PlyGo, as soon as they have seen it in action.

column1: The selling price to the public of PlyGo, about 69 Euros, is justified by the high quality, portability,  and versatility of this new and very innovative stand, and this Indiegogo crowdfunding project will further provide a large visibility to PlyGo: after an early life in the form of prototypes, PlyGo has recently reached the “400 sold” target and has had a large production of 150, which makes it available for your purchase under its five standard colours.

Recently some new accessories were created and made available in order to further improve the PlyGo experience: they consist of (a) two thin and transparent plastic shapes used to hold the pages of books, of (b) two 30 mm long spacers, to either increase the height of the stand arms, or to hold books over such spacers, and of (c)  two little removable plates covered by expanded rubber, that on one side adhere to the velcro-covered arms of PlyGo, and that on the other become the new anti-skid contact surface to support laptops, with no more need of sticking velcro strips on laptop bottoms.

Producing PlyGo does not present particular difficulties, because there are several approved suppliers for each of the PlyGo' s components and the prices are under control, as is under control the assembly phase and the reproducibility of the excellent quality.

So, PlyGo is already available to support you everywhere, and with your support we should soon be able to make new productions and reach the 1000 PlyGo sale target, particularly if the word gets spread
column2: this would mean some serious assembly and shipping work for myself and my company partners, the confirmation that PlyGo is growing well, and... many more people appreciating the new PlyGo stand around the  world.

column1: To summarize, here are the main advantages and special features of PlyGo, that are seldom found among other laptop and tablet stands already on the market:
1- PlyGo is one of the smallest (25x3x3 cm3) and lightest (300 g) portable stands.
2- PlyGo is the only small stand allowing to keep tablets, laptops and books above the abdomen and laps while resting, for a comfortable and posturally correct use on bed, sofa, armchair.

3- PlyGo is the only stand that can be adjusted in height (from 2 to 32 cm) and in width (from 29 to 52 cm) and in the inclination of its supporting base (all angles), for a good, ergonomic use when lying down or sitting at the desk.
4- PlyGo is the only small stand able to support laptops, tablets, e-readers, books and smart-phones of all sizes, on beds or on desks.
5- By lifting PC laptops in the air, above tables, cloths, carpets, blankets, cushions… PlyGo insures them an excellent cooling, thus extending their life.
So, position yourself comfortably, adapt the configuration of PlyGo to you ... And enjoy !

my name is Silvio Pitteri and I am an Italian materials engineer, 58, living in Bruxelles, that after 25 years of work in R&D (tribology, surface engineering, composites, polymers...) and in the plastic industry, needed a change and some action with aluminium: the PlyGo foldable stand became the obvious answer to that compelling need of making something challenging out of aluminium, while on the contrary, if that need had targeted another material, like for instance linear low density polyethylene, none of my relatives, friends and customers would nowadays be so familiar and fulfilled with that little foldable quadruped named PlyGo.

PlyGo is made with high quality components that are either reusable or recyclable. Its aluminium bars are protected by anodization and come in five standard colours (black, blue, orange, green and ""natural aluminium""), making of PlyGo an elegant, stable, strong, repairable and durable friend.

Which makes PlyGo particularly attractive for people who often use their laptop or tablet from home, either because they telework, or because they are ill or disabled. Or, to the other extreme PlyGo is attractive also for people always on the move, like business men, managers, tourists, travelers…

Nowadays PlyGo is not anymore perceived as a kind of UFO, i. e. an Unidentified Folding Object, because this cool, ergonomic, foldable & portable laptop stand is getting more and more noticed by the people and by the internet world, which appreciate its qualities, special features and advantages: the very positive reactions of visitors during the Concours Lépine 2016 in Paris (bronze medal), of spectators following its TV appearances, and of world-wide backers during a previous successful Kickstarter Campaign, demonstrate that many people are very keen on PlyGo, as soon as they have seen it in action.

column3:
> 

GOSPACE is a revolutionary storage device for all your portable electronics. 

It is a portable cloud that holds all your files with 5G wireless, which is faster than ever and allows you to stream content wirelessly. 

Its storage can be extended without limit and connects with up to 8 devices at the same time. You can even connect your Dropbox and Google Drive accounts to GOSPACE.

column2:
>

Connect GOSPACE to any of your devices for rapid transfer and cloud storage access.

column1: Use 5GHz WiFi, USB 3.1, or USB-C to transfer files at high speeds.
column2:
>

Time is money. Why waste it by waiting for a ﬁle to download? GOSPACE comes with the fastest 5GHz Wi-Fi with transfer speeds up to 866 Mb/s. You can stream your favorite movie or music wirelessly.

column1: Use the USB-C or USB 3.1 to transfer data from a computer at speeds up to 10GB/s if you are moving whole libraries.
Share Photos and videos with up to eight friends.
column3:
>

Use GOSPACE for your peer to peer file transfer needs. With 5GHz Wifi capability, transfers will happen quickly and securely. GOSPACE allows you to share with 8 devices within Wi-Fi range. No matter if your device is Android, Apple or PC, you can stream music and video from GOSPACE.

column1: The GOSPACE App is the One Stop Shop for all things related to your data.
column2:
>

Whether you want to backup your phone, stream a video, or even edit your documents, you can get it all done with the GOSPACE app, simply and smoothly.

column1: Google Drive and Dropbox users, we got you covered.
column2:
>

You may sync with your accounts with our app so you can access all your files and documents from one place. No more storage space issues.

column1: Use GOSPACE to extend your WiFi.
column2:
>

GOSPACE can extend your WiFi to hard to reach places in your house. Your device can stay connected to Wi-Fi even when it is connecting with GOSPACE. You can have full access to GOSPACE and the internet at the same time, no compromise.
column4:
>

Get limitless storage for your devices and never miss a backup for your photos, videos, and music.

column1: Use SD cards to store and stream your entire music and movie libraries.
column2:
>

We all have different needs for storage. A music lover may need more space for songs, or you need space to keep all your selﬁes, photos, and videos.
column3:
>

With GOSPACE, you are ﬁnally free from the bars of your phone’s limited storage. GOSPACE is expandable with a swap of an SD card. There is no limit for your storage, so you can keep your memories.

column1: Accidents happen, and backup is like having insurance.
column2:
>

It is priceless to be able to backup your devices and restore your precious data anytime. That’s why with GOSPACE, you can backup your whole phone or tablet within seconds and forget the cloud. 

No matter if it’s just a few selfies on your phone or the whole hard disk on your laptop, GOSPACE can backup and restore them quickly and safely.
column3:
>

Using the latest in wireless charging, GOSPACE keeps your Android or Apple smartphone charged on-the-go.

column1: Use GOSPACE to Qi charge your new iPhone or Android device.
column2:
>

 

Wireless connectivity is the core of GOSPACE, not only files and data can stream with your device wirelessly, GOSPACE also supports wired and wireless charging. 

So you can charge your iPhone 8/ iPhone X or any other devices that support Qi open wireless charging standard 5W and 10W with GOSPACE.

column1: GOSPACE’s battery lasts a week.
column2:
>

Support by it’s 7000 mAh internal battery, the software and hardware of GOSPACE are designed to maximize its power efficiency, that’s why GOSPACE can standby for more than a week and continued use for more than 15 hours.
column3:
>

Add $9 to any reward to get a specially made case for your GOSPACE.
column4:
>

 

GOSPACE Case – the GOSPACE anti-shock bag can protect your GOSPACE and carry a large number of wires, charging devices, headphones, SD cards etc. Carry your personal cloud around effortlessly!
column9:
>

GOSPACE was designed to seamlessly blend Cloud and Local Storage.

 After months of design and redesign, we have finally perfected GOSPACE.  You can seamlessly access your cloud and local storage all in one device.  We designed GOSPACE to perfectly blend into your digital life.

column2:
>

  

We are a team of professional engineers and designers who have extensive experience in bringing innovative products to the market. We care about every detail of the products we create, from the position of one single screw to the perfect angle of the curve. We have overcome many challenges in bringing GOSPACE to life, it is our pleasure to introduce this wonderful product to you. Want to get more information about our company and us? Please visit our company website.

column1: ","GOSPACE is a revolutionary storage device for all your portable electronics. It is a portable cloud that holds all your files with 5G wireless, which is faster than ever and allows you to stream content wirelessly. Its storage can be extended without limit and connects with up to 8 devices at the same time. You can even connect your Dropbox and Google Drive accounts to GOSPACE.
Connect GOSPACE to any of your devices for rapid transfer and cloud storage access.

Use 5GHz WiFi, USB 3.1, or USB-C to transfer files at high speeds.  Time is money. Why waste it by waiting for a ﬁle to download? GOSPACE comes with the fastest 5GHz Wi-Fi with transfer speeds up to 866 Mb/s. You can stream your favorite movie or music wirelessly.
Use the USB-C or USB 3.1 to transfer data from a computer at speeds up to 10GB/s if you are moving whole libraries.

Share Photos and videos with up to eight friends. Use GOSPACE for your peer to peer file transfer needs. With 5GHz Wifi capability, transfers will happen quickly and securely. GOSPACE allows you to share with 8 devices within Wi-Fi range. No matter if your device is Android, Apple or PC, you can stream music and video from GOSPACE.

The GOSPACE App is the One Stop Shop for all things related to your data.Whether you want to backup your phone, stream a video, or even edit your documents, you can get it all done with the GOSPACE app, simply and smoothly.
Google Drive and Dropbox users, we got you covered.You may sync with your accounts with our app so you can access all your files and documents from one place. No more storage space issues.

Use GOSPACE to extend your WiFi.  GOSPACE can extend your WiFi to hard to reach places in your house. Your device can stay connected to Wi-Fi even when it is connecting with GOSPACE. You can have full access to GOSPACE and the internet at the same time, no compromise.    Get limitless storage for your devices and never miss a backup for your photos, videos, and music.

Use SD cards to store and stream your entire music and movie libraries. We all have different needs for storage. A music lover may need more space for songs, or you need space to keep all your selﬁes, photos, and videos. With GOSPACE, you are ﬁnally free from the bars of your phone’s limited storage. GOSPACE is expandable with a swap of an SD card. There is no limit for your storage, so you can keep your memories.

Accidents happen, and backup is like having insurance.  It is priceless to be able to backup your devices and restore your precious data anytime. That’s why with GOSPACE, you can backup your whole phone or tablet within seconds and forget the cloud. No matter if it’s just a few selfies on your phone or the whole hard disk on your laptop, GOSPACE can backup and restore them quickly and safely.    Using the latest in wireless charging, GOSPACE keeps your Android or Apple smartphone charged on-the-go.

Use GOSPACE to Qi charge your new iPhone or Android device. Wireless connectivity is the core of GOSPACE, not only files and data can stream with your device wirelessly, GOSPACE also supports wired and wireless charging. So you can charge your iPhone 8/ iPhone X or any other devices that support Qi open wireless charging standard 5W and 10W with GOSPACE.

GOSPACE’s battery lasts a week.Support by it’s 7000 mAh internal battery, the software and hardware of GOSPACE are designed to maximize its power efficiency, that’s why GOSPACE can standby for more than a week and continued use for more than 15 hours.   Add $9 to any reward to get a specially made case for your GOSPACE. GOSPACE Case – the GOSPACE anti-shock bag can protect your GOSPACE and carry a large number of wires, charging devices, headphones, SD cards etc. Carry your personal cloud around effortlessly!          GOSPACE was designed to seamlessly blend Cloud and Local Storage. After months of design and redesign, we have finally perfected GOSPACE.  You can seamlessly access your cloud and local storage all in one device.  We designed GOSPACE to perfectly blend into your digital life.

We are a team of professional engineers and designers who have extensive experience in bringing innovative products to the market. We care about every detail of the products we create, from the position of one single screw to the perfect angle of the curve. We have overcome many challenges in bringing GOSPACE to life, it is our pleasure to introduce this wonderful product to you. Want to get more information about our company and us? Please visit our company website.",54.0,6,"3 Campaigns
If you’ve used a free classifieds system in the past
few years, you’ve probably noticed that the options out there are far from
perfect.<span>  It seems like whenever you’re
trying to buy something, you either can’t find what you’re looking for at all,
or have hundreds of postings to sift through, with no good way to sort or
filter them.  When you’re trying to sell something, you have to re-post your
ad every few days just to get it noticed, otherwise, it falls to the
bottom of the haystack, and no one can find it.
The most popular classifieds system hasn’t improved much in the past ten
years, and it has a LOT of room for improvement.  We need a smarter,
safer, more convenient option for free classifieds… that’s why we’re building

Post It Find It.

What is Post It Find It?
Who's building it?
What's the timeline?
What are your expenses?
What perks are available?
How can I contact you?
Post It Find It (aka “PiFi”), is a new kind of free online classifieds
system, with an unparalleled set of features.<span>
Here are some of Post It Find It’s advanced features which will work together to make it the smartest,

safest, most convenient free classifieds system on the Internet:


To learn more about our planned features, click the ""Gallery"" tab above (or click here) to browse the feature slides, or view the feature slideshow at www.postitfindit.com.


Maximillian R. Carper (“Max”) is the founder of Post
It Find It, and is also the Sr. Software Engineer who will be building it.  Here’s a little background on Max:
Max grew up in the city of University Place, WA, about
30 miles south of Seattle, and has lived in Seattle, San Diego, Honolulu, and now
Austin, Texas.<span>  His parents bought him
his first computer (a Texas Instruments TI-99/4A) when he was 4 years old.  The TI-99/4A booted into BASIC (a programming
language), so Max’s curiosity led him to experiment with it.  He was making small programs in BASIC by the
time he was 7.  Max got his first consulting
job for Microsoft at 18, and continued to use consulting opportunities throughout
his career to build and enrich his skills in C#/BASIC Programming, Database
Administration and Development, and I.T. Systems Engineering/Administration.  He has consulted for Fortune 500 companies
Washington Mutual), and Holland America/Princess Cruises.  In his late twenties, Max designed and built
a casino promotions and business intelligence system called “SPPRB” that competed
with other promotions systems from much larger, more well-established
birthday, a 2,500-slot casino/resort near San Diego liked SPPRB enough to choose
it over the larger competitors’ offerings, and paid him a six-figure amount for a license.
Max recently left a full-time position
as a Sr. Software Engineer for an industry-leading biotech company called
Luminex (www.luminexcorp.com) to found
Here are some references and testimonials from Max’s
“Max is an experienced, trustworthy and reliable
technology professional with a strong work ethic.<span>  He has a diverse technology skill set which
is well suited for developing and implementing enterprise level hardware and
software solutions. He delivers exceptional customer support and is relentless
in solving problems and issues for his clients.”
Company withheld (due to company reference policy)
“Maximillian Carper has shown the highest level of
integrity and work ethic related to all projects that he has undertaken with
Viva Learning LLC (formerly Learn HealthSci Inc.).<span>  His expertise, knowledge and meticulous
attention to details have made Max a valuable asset to our company.  He has engineered our entire IT
infrastructure, which has proven reliable, fast and secure.  We continue to utilize Max's expertise on an
on-going basis for a variety of IT projects.”

Philip Klein, Chief Executive Officer
Viva Learning, LLC

used technology to leverage a strong cost effective infrastructure that grew
with the company’s stellar worldwide growth rate.<span>  Max is not only a great visionary, but can

Rick Johnson, Chief Financial Officer
Ethertronics, Inc.
“Max is a visionary who dreams big and gets things
done.<span>  His attention to detail makes
working with him on projects a great experience.  He focuses on the long term goal throughout
his execution and is always quick to remedy any arising issues.  I firmly stand behind his work and his
“Max has the technical skills, drive, and attention to
detail to build great software, and I know he'll make Post It Find It a success.”

Bart McCleskey, Chief Executive Officer
Rapid Point of Sale
If we achieve our first funding goal of $70,000, we’ll
be able to start full-time software development immediately, and should be able
to launch a basic version of Post It
Find It called “PiFi Lite” just 4-6 weeks after our Indiegogo campaign ends.<span>  PiFi Lite will start out with just a basic set
of features, such as advanced filters, location-awareness, and a web site that is
with its basic feature set, we are confident
you will like PiFi Lite better than the other
free classifieds systems out there… but once PiFi Lite is launched, we’ll continue
adding features to it, until it has evolved into the full version of Post It Find It.
Because of the complexity of all of the advanced features we’re planning
for the final release of Post It Find It, it will take approximately six months
to add all of the features in our current list (above) to the system.
Building the smartest, safest, most convenient free
classifieds system isn’t cheap—or easy.  If it were, someone would have probably done
it already.  We’re taking care of the difficult part, which is designing and building
it, but we need your help keeping our bills paid while we build it.
Your contributions will help us fund our start-up operations as follows:
All of the above, plus additional money for
advertising, to help drive traffic and new members to the site.
All of the above, plus additional money to purchase
our own high-performance web servers, rather than leasing them from someone
else.<span>  Having dedicated servers gives us
a much more powerful system, for a much lower cost, and gives us more control
Any funds raised above $120,000 will be used towards advertising,
which will jump-start our efforts to become the most popular classifieds system

on the Internet.

We can’t thank you enough for your support in helping
Post It Find It get off the ground.<span>  That’s
why, in addition to the great feeling of knowing you’re helping fund a smarter,
safer, more convenient classifieds system that will make our lives easier, you’ll
receive the following generous perks with your contribution:
We strongly believe that open communications (both with our customers, and internally, with our own team) is key to making great software.  That’s why we give you several different ways
to contact us, should you have any questions, comments, or feedback:

Page

Click the ""Comments"" tab above (or click here) to leave your question,
comment, or feedback as a “comment” on our Indiegogo page.<span>  If

you don’t require live personal interaction, this is the best way to get in contact.  Not only is it quick and easy, but it also allows other Indiegogo users to see your question or comment (and our response), which may save them some time, especially if they had the same question or comment.

Pre-Launch
interaction of a phone call?<span>  Call our
Pre-Launch Hotline from 9am to 8pm CT any day during our Indiegogo campaign,
and our founder will answer your question(s) and take your feedback personally.  The Pre-Launch Hotline phone number is 512-872-2650.
up-close-and-personal experience of a video conference?<span>  Like the “community” feel of being on a
conference call with other PiFi supporters, and hearing what they have to say?  For the duration of our Indiegogo campaign, our
founder will be hosting live question and answer sessions via video conference,
twice a week.  You don’t have to have a
webcam (or even a computer) to participate—you can just dial-in from a phone if

you don’t want to watch the video feed.  To register, click the day of the week you prefer below.

We are a team of mechanical technician, precious metal expert, systems engineer and designers with very creative ideas. We like to think of ourselves as individuals that do not just think outside the box but outside the room the box is in, but in the same time keeping in mind that the basics in the box is just as important.

George Kriel: With an expansive background in Mechanic's, metal properties, design and manufacturing processes, all-ways looking to find new and more cost effective processes to manufacture objects, yet in the same time keeping the environment in mind.

Peter brier: Is an all-round ""maker"": tinkering with Electronics, optics, mechanics and software. He seeks to make technology available to others. Via his work in the last 15 years for industry and research, but also in various open-source and educational projects. Currently he is also working on 3D printing of food (for a dutch independent research institute), and making open source laser controllers available to everyone (www.LaosLaser.org).
Peter will help during development with generic stuff (software, printhead/encoder interfacing) all his work will be open source.

Unlike most other 3D printers that use a plastic filament or a powder as material to build a part the i-AM 3D uses a liquid ink as material that is deposited with an inkjet print head according to the design.
The ink is then cured (sintered) by means of a laser that is guided by galvometer scanners.

At this stage most of the hardware, electronics and software of the machine is done and we have a functional machine (printer) Albeit with a test print head (ink shield – Nicholas C Lewis – a Kickstarter project )
We won’t bore you with all the hard and software spec’s, but If you really want to know just drop us a mail and we will share with you.
As for the laser and Galvo optics, we must yet purchase together with the correct print head and drive electronics’.

That is where we need your help, so we can buy the correct Print head, Galvo scanners and laser to finish the prototype machine and start testing the parts. (Density, tensile strength and durability) to make the i-AM 3D printer a reality.

We experimented with a lot of ideas and processes to come up with the perfect product(ink) for the application and believe that we now have three precious metal inks (gold, palladium and platinum) for the application process. (patent pending) More inks to follow, Titanium, Aluminum and alloys thereof.
The current inks were tested using the test print head and laser(hand held) and curing (Sinter) the ink in an oven at very low temperatures.
Ink can be cured(sintered) on a wide variety of substrates.  Paper, plastic, metal ect.
The cured inks were also tested with a laser spectrometer (assayed) and returned positive results.

With all other 3D metal printers (powder bed) you need a lot of extra material to manufacture (print) a  part. Example a powder bed printer with a build volume of 90mm x 90mm you would need 1 kg of metal powder (gold ) to start the process, although the metal powders is recyclable it comes at a very high price and for every different material you would need a kg to start off with.
With our concept and machine (printer) you would only need the amount of material that is needed to make the part and between 2 and 3 % extra.
That amounts to a huge saving in material and cost not to mention the minimal cost to the environment.
Fully cured into a metallic metal and 100% conductible
Once we have the prototype printer complete and all relevant test done, we will manufacture the final product (printer) that will go into production.
It will be a table top model
Unlike most of the campaigns on Indiegogo whereby you can get some form of product, reward or a discounted price, our campaign is very different.
What we can offer is making you part of the machine, (printer) making you part of its DNA
I bet you are now very curious, so let me share with you how we will do it.

Every contributor’s image (sign, symbol or whatever image that represent you) will be part of the livery of every machine, furthermore the printer will have a full monitor as the front(face) that will be able to show videos, content, advertising, ect. and your image or will also be displayed.
Besides the above there is some other perks.
We are quietly confident that the i-AM 3D printer will be one of the first 3D printers that manufacture metal parts, to go into space as the printing process and application lends itself to it.
Most of us will most probably never get to space, but your image might just make it into space with the i-AM 3D

If you feel the need to help us make the i-AM 3d printer a reality but are unable to do so financially, please spread the word, use the Indiegogo share tools. Every bit of help we can get will help us all evolve and create a better world.
All donations received will go towards buying the parts as mentioned, even if we don’t make our target the funds will go towards buying the parts and we will honor our perks to all contributors.

Our Inks contain only natural elements.
Palladium metal ink printed on paper

iPhones take amazing pictures. But if you want a print it can be a pain. Our app lets you send your pictures to be printed straight from your phone -- no need to upload them to a home computer first. You have your choice of getting them mailed to you or you will be able to pick them up at a convenient retailer such as CVS or Rite Aid. Finally, you'll be able to display your iPhone pictures on your living room wall as well as on your Facebook Timeline.

Version 1 of our app is already in the iTunes store and you can download it right now. Currently, your only option is to have your pictures mailed to an address. We need the money to develop Version 2 which will link the app to the leading retailers who have already agreed to work with us. At that point, you can run down to a local store to pick your pictures up within the hour.
So far, we've funded this ourselves -- but our friends and family network needs a bit of expansion. If you'd like to help us succeed, please consider helping us reach our funding goal.

Of course, if you are an iPhone owner, you can also help by downloading the app from the iTunes store and using it right now to print those amazing pictures you can capture when you always have a great camera in your pocket. And don't forget to rate us on the iTunes store.

iPhones take amazing pictures. But if you want a print it can be a pain. Our app lets you send your pictures to be printed straight from your phone -- no need to upload them to a home computer first. You have your choice of getting them mailed to you or you will be able to pick them up at a convenient retailer such as CVS or Rite Aid. Finally, you'll be able to display your iPhone pictures on your living room wall as well as on your Facebook Timeline.
What We Need & What You Get

Version 1 of our app is already in the iTunes store and you can download it right now. Currently, your only option is to have your pictures mailed to an address. We need the money to develop Version 2 which will link the app to the leading retailers who have already agreed to work with us. At that point, you can run down to a local store to pick your pictures up within the hour.
So far, we've funded this ourselves -- but our friends and family network needs a bit of expansion. If you'd like to help us succeed, please consider helping us reach our funding goal.

Of course, if you are an iPhone owner, you can also help by downloading the app from the iTunes store and using it right now to print those amazing pictures you can capture when you always have a great camera in your pocket. And don't forget to rate us on the iTunes store.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: >There is already a lot of 3D content on youtube and flickr.( 3D stereoscopic photography predates 2D photography)
column5:
>


How it is used:
column6:
/>

History:

Stereoscopy has been my passion since childhood. I still remember how my parents got upset when I dismantled the brand new ViewMaster out of curiosity. But that didn't stop me. I continued to explore and understand how things work.

Once I bought my own 3D camera, our family loved seeing the special moments . Next, my relatives and family wanted to view the special moments in 3D. However there was no easy way for them to do this. I was determined and started working on it for the last few years. 

Once, I felt happy with the outcome of my 3D viewer, I gave it to my daughter. She said, ""Dad this is cool, I love it"". ""Did you make it?"" She enjoyed viewing her holiday photos in 3D. I enjoyed seeing her trying to touch the waterfalls in Yosemite and many more special moments. I was confident that I had a product to reach each and
