We run 27crags.com. It is one of the world's largest online rock climbing topo services. Our users have repeatedly asked us for a mobile application. 

Well now.. we have designed an app to meet the needs of every badass rock climber. If the campaign goal is met, the app will be released to Android and iOS devices.

Key features of the app:
allows you to access topos without an internet connection
keeps your goals and projects in order
tick tracker shows your progress on boulder, sport or trad ascents

column3: >shows you the most suitable climbing locations on a map

column1: sharing helps you become the coolest climber on social media
Premium topos made by local climbing professionals

A bad Internet connection in the mountains or a dense forest will no longer stop you from accessing the high quality topos 27crags.com offers.  

While still at home, you can download topos onto your smartphone...
... and use them offline regardless of where you are...

column3:
/>

.. and we mean anywhere you are.

column1: GPS features help you navigate your way to the crag or boulder. No more wasting hours wandering around.
Plan your future climbs and add them to your to-do list. You can see the routes on a map and access them easily.
Follow your progress as a climber with the tick list.

The intelligent route search shows you the most suitable climbing locations on a map. The search adapts to the routes you have climbed most recently and makes individualized suggestions for possible next projects or crags.

After a hard day of climbing you can share your heroic sends and artistic pictures with the climbing community. If you can’t climb as hard as your friend, you can always be the guy/girl who takes the best climbing shots, right?
At present 27crags.com has over 130,000 routes listed in its public database.
We are currently developing a premium topo database, which contains high quality rock climbing guidebooks from European countries made by local climbing professionals.

You don't need to buy a local climbing guidebook anymore. We co-operate with the locals. By using our premium topos, you will also support the local climbing professionals to bolt new routes in their area.
The premium topo database and locations will be published by the end of 2015.

As soon as our campaign goal is met our development of the site takes next level. Almost 200 improvement requests from users are waiting to get implemented. Bolt crosses on sport routes, multipitch topos, intelligent route search, improved map etc. We are eager to complete all of them.
Let’s collaborate to make the best climbing software ever!
To reach our goal, we need your support, thoughts and comments on the project. Select a perk and order a subscription of the app in advance. The subscription will allow you to:
• use the 27 Crags app with full features for 3, 12 or 36 months
More perk to early birds: If you order a subscription before our first campaign goal is met you’ll get your subscription months in double.
Together we can create a climbing app that we all love using!

This is for two badass climbers! Get a private climbing course + our 12 month app subscription for 2 persons. The teacher of the course, Saku ""badass"" Korosuo, is a true climbing viking. The course is a one-day course and you can decide what you want to learn. Saku can teach you for example bigwall climbing, multipitch climbing or how to make a self rescue. The course is held in Austria some nice day as agreed. You can decide where and when. Contact saku _at_ korosuo.com for more info or check out courses at: http://korosuo.com/climbingcourses.html
• 90% will go to the development team's salaries while they are out of their daily jobs
We commit to making the app for you professionally and with love and passion for climbing.

Development will start according to schedule if our goals are met. First public release may not contain all of the features mentioned above but those will be delivered to your app before the end of the year 2015.
• 20,000 € will allow us to create an app for iPhone/iOS (autumn 2015) and Android  phones as well (spring 2016)

column2: >will significantly speed up our development process

column1: The greater goal we achieve, the greater possibilities we have to get funding from other sources and investors.

As soon as our campaign goal is met our development of the site takes next level. Almost 200 improvement requests from users are waiting to get implemented. Bolt crosses on sport routes, multipitch topos, intelligent route search, improved map etc. We are eager to complete all of them.
With your help we can guarantee the continuous development of 27crags.com.
• Tell your climber friends about the campaign
• Share this campaign on Facebook or Twitter

Will I have to pay for the app after the first 12 months are up?
Yes. All of the app features and the topo guidebooks made by professionals are included in the annual membership. If the campaign is a success, a free app with limited features will also be available.

Will all 27crags.com content eventually become subject to charge?
No. Everything that has been free of charge will always remain free.

Will a free version of the application be available?
If the campaign goal is met, a free version with limited features will be available.

Will there be an app available for the Windows Phone?
We'll first create apps for the iPhone and Android phone and then for the Windows Phone.

Why are you making the iOS app before the Android app?
We want to serve our users in the best possible way. According to the users statistics of 27crags.com, there are significantly more iPhone users than Android users.

Is there a public API for 27crags.com?
If you can help us reach the campaign goal, we'll make a public API before long.

Do you have more questions?
Don't hesitate to email us at support@27crags.com (in english, finnish or swedish). We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Recently we've formed a team that truly wants to make the 27 Crags app a reality. If we reach our campaign goal, our development team won't let you down
– we'll create the app for you with love and passion for climbing.

column3: >*August 7 - featured in The Delta Optimist newspaper.

column5: >On April 25, 2015, a devastating 7.8 magnitude earthquake hit Nepal, killing over 8,500 people and destroying years of history in seconds.

column1: Many news outlets have now stopped their reporting on the Nepal earthquake that occurred just a few months ago. Thousands of people have lost their families and friends, and just as many have lost their homes, with thousands living in tent cities.

More than 25% of the Nepalese population have been living without electricity, even before the earthquake. This means that they spend every night dangerously in the dark and their lives stop when the sun goes down. We have found a way to contribute to solving this issue and give them light.
Introducing The World's Most Powerful iPhone Case

It's very simple: an affordable case that protects your phone and makes the world a better place. Every case purchased contributes directly to Nepal relief and provides a meal to someone in need of food and a solar light to someone without electricity.
We set our minimum project funding goal at $12,000 USD because this is what it will take to:
• Order the solar lights (one for every case sold) from Nokero
• Transport the solar lights from the factory to Nepal

column2: taxes on the lights upon arriving in Nepal
>Pay for meals (one for every case sold) for people in Nepal

column1: • Cover the costs to ship your perks

What happens if we don’t reach our goal:

We already have enough iPhone cases to fulfil the orders below our minimum fundraising goal. If we do not hit our goal, we will still order Nokero solar lights and provide meals (one of each for every case sold) to those in need. No matter what we raise, you will still receive your case, and a solar light and meal will still make their way to Nepal on your behalf.
You can order either a single iPhone case, or a larger quantity of cases, whether they be for your friends &amp
column2: family, co-workers, employees, or community. For those of you without iPhones or not interested in a case, you still have the opportunity to send a solar light and meal to someone in need in Nepal.

column1: These solar lights are incredible. In just one day of charging in the sun, the light lasts five hours at night. We've tested these lights and they are remarkably bright.
Many of us take light for granted, but at night, it provides safety from people attempting to do harm. It benefits education, allowing children to read and do their homework at night.
Without electricity, our lives simply stop when the sun goes down.
Chris and I (Alec) met in business school 3 years ago and made the decision that together we would use our entrepreneurial skills to make the world a better place.
column2: >We've spent the last year developing our iPhone case. When news hit of the devastating Nepal earthquake on April 25 we knew this is who we wanted to help.

column1: We’re fortunate to be working with Kiran Kreer (IMKIRAN), our brand ambassador, with valuable experience providing support to countries across Asia. Kiran is now in Nepal working on relief projects and will help us distribute the meals and solar lights to those in the most need.

column2:
Challenges

We've taken the time to do our research, and here are a few risks &
column3: challenges that we're taking into consideration:

column1: Shipping Your Perks: We'd like to ensure timely delivery of all of your perks. External factors could cause a slight delay in shipping perks depending on where you live. We've spoken with multiple shipping companies and have calculated the best approximate delivery times. We will also begin preparing packages before the campaign has come to an end.

column2: Taxes in Nepal: When importing items into most foreign countries, there are duties and taxes payable upon their entry. It's not easy for us to calculate the exact fees we will be charged before the lights arrive in Nepal. However, in talks with Nokero and our connections we've been able to figure out a rough estimate and we've included a buffer in our budget to compensate for unexpected fees.

column1: Help us provide strength and hope to Nepal by purchasing one or more of our first iPhone cases. If you don't have an iPhone or aren't interested in a case, you can still help us send a solar light and meal to someone in need in Nepal on your behalf.
If you're unable to contribute monetary funds to the project, we would tremendously appreciate your support in sharing this page with your own network.

column2: >If you have any questions about our project, please don't hesitate to contact alec or chris (at) cases4cause.com, we'd be happy to chat!

column1: ","*August 7 - featured in The Delta Optimist newspaper.
On April 25, 2015, a devastating 7.8 magnitude earthquake hit Nepal, killing over 8,500 people and destroying years of history in seconds.

Many news outlets have now stopped their reporting on the Nepal earthquake that occurred just a few months ago. Thousands of people have lost their families and friends, and just as many have lost their homes, with thousands living in tent cities.

More than 25% of the Nepalese population have been living without electricity, even before the earthquake. This means that they spend every night dangerously in the dark and their lives stop when the sun goes down. We have found a way to contribute to solving this issue and give them light.
Introducing The World's Most Powerful iPhone Case

It's very simple: an affordable case that protects your phone and makes the world a better place. Every case purchased contributes directly to Nepal relief and provides a meal to someone in need of food and a solar light to someone without electricity.
We set our minimum project funding goal at $12,000 USD because this is what it will take to:
Cover our iPhone case & packaging production costs
Order the solar lights (one for every case sold) from Nokero
Transport the solar lights from the factory to Nepal
Cover duties & taxes on the lights upon arriving in Nepal
Pay for meals (one for every case sold) for people in Nepal
Cover the costs to ship your perks

What happens if we don’t reach our goal:We already have enough iPhone cases to fulfil the orders below our minimum fundraising goal. If we do not hit our goal, we will still order Nokero solar lights and provide meals (one of each for every case sold) to those in need. No matter what we raise, you will still receive your case, and a solar light and meal will still make their way to Nepal on your behalf.
The Perks of Being a Supporter

You can order either a single iPhone case, or a larger quantity of cases, whether they be for your friends & family, co-workers, employees, or community. For those of you without iPhones or not interested in a case, you still have the opportunity to send a solar light and meal to someone in need in Nepal.
These solar lights are incredible. In just one day of charging in the sun, the light lasts five hours at night. We've tested these lights and they are remarkably bright.
Many of us take light for granted, but at night, it provides safety from people attempting to do harm. It benefits education, allowing children to read and do their homework at night.
Without electricity, our lives simply stop when the sun goes down.

Chris and I (Alec) met in business school 3 years ago and made the decision that together we would use our entrepreneurial skills to make the world a better place. We've spent the last year developing our iPhone case. When news hit of the devastating Nepal earthquake on April 25 we knew this is who we wanted to help.

We’re fortunate to be working with Kiran Kreer (IMKIRAN), our brand ambassador, with valuable experience providing support to countries across Asia. Kiran is now in Nepal working on relief projects and will help us distribute the meals and solar lights to those in the most need.
Risks & Challenges We've taken the time to do our research, and here are a few risks & challenges that we're taking into consideration:

Shipping Your Perks: We'd like to ensure timely delivery of all of your perks. External factors could cause a slight delay in shipping perks depending on where you live. We've spoken with multiple shipping companies and have calculated the best approximate delivery times. We will also begin preparing packages before the campaign has come to an end.

Duties & Taxes in Nepal: When importing items into most foreign countries, there are duties and taxes payable upon their entry. It's not easy for us to calculate the exact fees we will be charged before the lights arrive in Nepal. However, in talks with Nokero and our connections we've been able to figure out a rough estimate and we've included a buffer in our budget to compensate for unexpected fees.

Help us provide strength and hope to Nepal by purchasing one or more of our first iPhone cases. If you don't have an iPhone or aren't interested in a case, you can still help us send a solar light and meal to someone in need in Nepal on your behalf.
If you're unable to contribute monetary funds to the project, we would tremendously appreciate your support in sharing this page with your own network.
If you have any questions about our project, please don't hesitate to contact alec or chris (at) cases4cause.com, we'd be happy to chat!",7.0,0,"1 Campaign
Never before there has been ""so much"" alarm system for so little money! The globio #Jacky 'Door contact' and the globio app simply use the numerous functions of an old or unused Android smartphone.
Noch nie gab es so viel Alarmanlage für so wenig Geld! Der globio #Jacky 'Türkontakt' und die globio App nutzen einfach die zahlreichen Funktionen eines alten Android Smartphones.

What do I use globio #jacky for?
Wofür verwende ich globio #Jacky?

It's so easy to protect your home or your versatile properties.
Es ist so einfach, sein zu Hause und seine mobilen Objekte zu schützen.
Get a message when the front door has been opend.
Get alarmed if someone wants to discover your privacy.
Get a picture when the horse stable has been opend.
No matter which window you want to protect.
In the event of alerting you can
• get a call and intercept in to the room silent or talk to the ""intruder"" directly,
• get a short message or an E-Mail,
• let the phone take pictures or record a video and get the data sent to you,
• play a given or individual sound at home and more.
• dich anrufen lassen und still in den Raum hinein hören oder mit dem ""Eindringling"" sprechen,
• dir eine SMS oder eine E-Mail schicken lassen,
• Photos oder ein Video aufnehmen und versenden,
• einen vorgegebenen oder eigenen Sound abspielen und vieles mehr.

Thanks to the smartphone, it does not matter how far you are away from home!
Dank des Smartphons spielt es keine Rolle, wie weit du von zu Hause entfernt bist!

With only 20 € and an old smartphone, you will experience a positive feeling of security at home on next holiday.
Mit nur 20€ und einem alten Smartphone begleitet dich ein sicheres Gefühl im nächsten Urlaub.

The intruders are particularly fond of winter and holiday periods.
Besonders gern im Winter und in den Ferienzeiten schlagen die Einbrecher zu.

Over 100 million old mobile phones remained unused in the German households in year 2016. A mobile phone consists of at least 25% of metals such as copper, iron, nickel, zinc, tin, but also lead, cobalt, coltan, lithium and noble metals like silver, gold, palladium and platinum. Our resources are not infinite! Avoid cell phone scrap and use an old smartphone to reach your goal!

Über 100 Mio. alte Handys lagen im Jahr 2016 ungenutzt in den deutschen Haushalten herum. Ein Handy besteht zu mindestens 25% aus Metallen wie Kupfer, Eisen, Nickel, Zink, Zinn, aber auch Blei, Cobalt, Coltan, Lithium sowie den Edelmetallen Silber, Gold, Palladium und Platin. Unsere Resourcen sind nicht unendlich! Vermeide Handy-Schrott und nutze ein altes Smartphone, um Dein Ziel zu erreichen!
Use existing resources and protect our environment!

Globio is an approach by a team of people who felt the need for an easy, cheap and reliable security device. After many years of developing products in the mobile communication area the globio idea was born in January 2015. Since then it has matured as a brand and comprises a comprehensive range of individual products.

Seitdem ist sie als Marke herangereift und umfasst eine umfangreiche Palette von Einzelprodukten.

Über 100 Mio. alte Handys lagen im Jahr 2016 ungenutzt in den deutschen Haushalten herum. Ein Handy besteht zu mindestens 25% aus Metallen wie Kupfer, Eisen, Nickel, Zink, Zinn, aber auch Blei, Cobalt, Coltan, Lithium sowie den Edelmetallen Silber, Gold, Palladium und Platin. Unsere Resourcen sind nicht unendlich! Vermeide Handy-Schrott und nutze ein altes Smartphone, um Dein Ziel zu erreichen!
Use existing resources and protect our environment!

Globio is an approach by a team of people who felt the need for an easy, cheap and reliable security device. After many years of developing products in the mobile communication area the globio idea was born in January 2015. Since then it has matured as a brand and comprises a comprehensive range of individual products.

Globio ist das Konzept von einem Team, dass die Notwendigkeit für eine einfache, billige und zuverlässige Alarmanlagenlösung erkannte. Nach vielen Jahren der Entwicklung von Produkten im Bereich der mobilen Kommunikation wurde die globio-Idee im Januar 2015 geboren. Seitdem ist sie als Marke herangereift und umfasst eine umfangreiche Palette von Einzelprodukten.

We design shields for Arduino and Raspberry-Pi since many years and we wanted to have something to connect short range RF 434 Mhz transceivers and long range RF 868 Mhz transceivers.
Raspberry-Pi is a great Linux prototyping connected board (now with Wifi and BLE on board) as a result we designed a shield for that.

column1: integrate into a DIN box for example.

Programming

Using Chistera-Pi with Raspberry-Pi is super easy in C or Python and other binding with RadioHead Packet Radio library for embedded microprocessors.
We port Chistera-Pi hardware support to RadioHead library for Linux.
We customized an Open Source LoRaWan stack to be used out of the box with Chistera-Pi as a end device or as a Gateway.

Both transceivers can be used at the same time over SPI.

Being an Open Source Hardware company, library, code example will be CC-by-SA GPL licence on our GitHub.

What will the contributions be used for?
Our first and main goal is to gather funds for manufacturing a batch
of at least 150 Chistera-Pi. This is a good amount to produce the
boards at a reasonable price. As soon as we reach this goal, additional

perks will be added to complement the Chistera-Pi.

Check the 3D dynamic model of the board on Sketchfab
• 1.000 EUR: Chistera-Pi shield is on the market!
• 5.000 EUR: Upgrade all orders to Chistera-Pi + !
• 10.000 EUR: Upgrade all orders to Chistera-Pi + and a DIN box

What are the risks?

At the moment we have a working and tested prototypes of the Chistera-Pi+.

We have long-term experience in designing and developing
small-scale-production and prototype electronic devices for the Makers

According to statistics, up to 25% of all traffic fatalities, for drivers under 25 years old, happen because of distracted driving. With today's technology, our children are always linked in. Cell Phones, iPods, and other devices are a constant distraction for young drivers. Smart Monitor offers parents a way to minimize this threat to our kids. Smart Monitor will allow parents to disable certain features of their child's device, while driving. Calls to the parent and emergency services will still be allowed. In addition, parents will be able to track the location of their child, using GPS monitoring.

We are asking for $25,000 to fund this project. This will allow us to develop the app for multiple devices and platforms. Let's face it, you can't put a price on saving lives. For $3 a month, parents can register up to 3 devices for their child, and ensure that they can be found (GPS monitoring), and will not be able to text or call while driving. We feel that this is a very reasonable cost for peace of mind. If we can save one life, this project will be a success.
If you are unable to contribute financially, please help us spread the word about Smart Moniitor. Our children deserve the chance to survive! Parent's deserve the Peace of Mnd!

As human beings, we tend to overlook fun and pleasurable activities as the result of being preoccupied with life’s quotidian events. Often times, we are met every morning with a list of tasks waiting to be accomplished. Why not make life easier? Here at Amiko Tech, we have made this our primary objective, and we are proud to announce that the answer is finally here.

column1: Amiko is inspired by the idea of a computer personal assistant, who could mold to your specific persona, and be available at all times. This assistant adapts to your daily life, and understands your specific needs. Amiko allows the user to multitask with ease, and accelerates your life by accomplishing tasks by voice command. Simply put, Amiko works hard so you don’t have to.

Today, Amiko has become the point in which an astonishing array of microtechnology and powerful application programming conjoin. The device works in unison with Amiko APP that allows for the user to make a simple download that will make the phone or tablet device completely compatible with the Amiko headset. Fitness Tracking, GPS navigation, social network updates, and more all within the capabilities of one brilliant headset.

When designing Amiko, we knew that sound quality was of utmost importance. We set on our course to create the perfect microphone and speaker in order to convey audio quality at its finest. Amiko’s ear-bone microphone will pick up on vibrations from the skull and thus deliver excellent sound quality. As for the receiving end of sound, we’ve equipped Amiko with a noise-isolating speaker that will deliver clear HD audio.

Since our inception in early 2012, our team of talented engineers has strived to create a headset that can be suitable for the myriad needs of the 21st century. After an eventful two years, we are truly proud to announce that the future of wireless headset technology is finally here!

When designing Amiko, it was our primary objective to deliver an appealing design without sacrificing one bit of comfort. The result proved to be a perfect blend of both, as we created minimalistic, yet effective visuals and a comfortable in-ear fit that will hold securely.

The outer shell of Amiko is a combination of durable, top-quality plastic, and soft silicone particularly used in the areas that make most contact with skin. The silicone ear bud tips are comfortable and block unwanted outside noise. The device's blue region will alert the user when the headset is off or on, has low battery, or is pairing with a device.
column3: >An interesting fact about our design process is that we chose to avoid any flat, stodgy surfaces. We knew that by creating a curved surface all throughout the device, Amiko could more closely resemble the beauty of the natural world around us
column4: which happens to be full of curved surfaces! Apart from it's clear aesthetic appeal, this design also aids in providing the optimal comfort that we sought.

column2: Onyx Black, Phantom White, Azure, and Rose Pink (plus a 5th color that you will be able to vote on if stretch goal #1 is reached!). We know that colors can be the ultimate expression of your personality, so take your pick when you choose your reward!

column1: The entire design is intended to resemble a regular earphone piece (wireless, of course) rather than many of those large, bulky bluetooth headsets seen on the market today. This way, Amiko can be more discreet all the while maintaining a sharp and innovative design.

Introducing Amiko’s other half - Amiko App. Amiko App provides a fully personalized experience that will bring your headset to life, and allows you to customize your headset to suit your very specific needs. Program your very own smart alarm, view your workout results and fitness stats, pair devices, and choose from up to 5 preset Amiko voices. Track your device wherever it is, so you will never have to be worried about losing your headset! Once downloaded, thousands of possibilities unravel to bring to you the ultimate Amiko experience.

Amiko will connect to any smart device using the latest Bluetooth 4.0 LE. It can connect to up to 3 devices at once, and will be perfectly compatible with iOS and Android softwares (the latest iOS 8 and Android 4.0 or newer). Amiko APP offers advanced control over the headset device, allowing you to set specific voice commands, turn features on/off to extend battery life, control settings, and configure the entire Amiko voice control system.

APP is the perfect companion to Amiko, enabling it to reach its extended capabilities. With APP, you will be able to personalize Amiko 100% to your liking, ensuring that no two Amikos can ever be the same.
Amiko can pair directly with any devices that support bluetooth
column2: smart TV's, speakers, computers, and much more! Once paired, voice control functionality is set up on your smartphone or tablet, where you can establish commands for any compatible device. For example, changing the channel on a TV can become as simple as saying ""Amiko, next channel,"" practically rendering remote controls obsolete.

column1: If Amiko is connected to several devices at once, be sure to establish a different command for each designated device, when commands can be mutually intelligible. For example, ""Amiko, turn speaker volume down,"" as opposed to ""Amiko, turn TV volume down."" Amiko's bluetooth connectivity has been tested with up to 5 devices, although for optimal functionality, a maximum of 3 is highly recommended.

Born March 1, 1980 in the city of Donauwörth, West Germany, Sercan began playing soccer at a very young age. He spent part of his youth career at the FC Bayern Munich youth academy. He spent much of his professional career playing a pivotal role as striker in both Germany and Turkey, before moving on to the San Jose Earthquakes and officially becoming the first Turkish soccer player in Major League Soccer.

A: Amiko is a very original and futuristic device. Through my soccer I’ve been travelling a lot in the world and I really have never seen anything like that before. I’ve been testing it for weeks now, and it has really become a very important device in my life.

A: My favourite feature - as a professional athlete I would have to say, the fitness tracker. I can measure my heart rate, and record my speed and distance that I have travelled. Besides that, I can listen to my favorite music while I’m working out.
Q: How does it feel inside your ear?
A: It is very comfortable, once I get used to it, I even forget it’s there!

A: In one word - I would say revolutionary.

We are Amiko Tech LLC. Our team is composed of highly skilled and professional individuals who have been fervent in our pursuit of Amiko. We are proud to say that our effort has yielded a brilliant result, and we are proud to say that we are Amiko Tech.
column2: >

/>

Interested in making Amiko a part of your app? Check out the ""Programmer Package"" reward and don't miss out on exclusive early access to the SDK along with a prototype Amiko to ensure full functionality by Amiko's official launch date!

Included in the Programmer Package:

column1: - Exclusive early access to the SDK
- Instruction booklet to help answer any questions related to Amiko software/hardware
column2:
>

When designing Amiko, we had in mind the endless potential of such a device in real world settings. Amiko has been our lifelong dream of creating something unique, with the ability to transform the world. It is our deepest hope that with future development, and help from curious individuals willing to experiment on our device, Amiko can reach even newer heights. We believe that by releasing Amiko into the market, we are unleashing a device capable of breaking new barriers.

column1: Education: Imagine a classroom in which students could learn course material, answer questions, and communicate with each other, all through the power of one compact, subtle headset. Amiko would allow students to excel in schooling by offering an enriched learning experience.

Business: Imagine a conference room, where all of the attendees are being fed the same, or perhaps different, information through one in-ear device. Amiko can be used in the future to help facilitate business meetings, deals, and transactions. Amiko software has also been developed to be compatible with language translation applications, so international business will be easier than ever.

Sports: As sports constantly evolve over the course of time, they become more reliant on technology. Imagine Amiko being used by sporting officials to better communicate and make correct calls, or perhaps players being able to receive concise and clear instructions from coaches and communicating freely with teammates while in the action.

From the very start, our goal has been to construct a device that could aid its user in every possible way, hence the term personal assistant. We are certain that Amiko is ideal to help people with certain handicaps- in particular the visually impaired or individuals who suffer from learning difficulties by transmitting information to these users in the most user-friendly manner. Our hope is that we can provide the platform for future development, which can make life easier for those who need a helping hand.
•Made out of durable plastic and silicone
•Bluetooth profiles supported: A2DP, audio/video remote control profile (AVRCP), headset (HSP), and hands-free (HFP)

- I made a mistake in my order, what do I do?

Send an E-mail to team@amikotechllc.com with the details of your order (Name, perk, and address) and your issue. We will get in touch with you in the next 24 hours!

- Will AMIKO fit in my ear?

AMIKO comes with 3 different sized tips: small, medium, and large. 

- How close does AMIKO need to be to my phone?

33 feet (10 meters). AMIKO will alert you if you left your phone behind, and vice versa. 

- Where do you ship to?

We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver.

- Is shipping included?

Shipping is free if you're in the US. $15 would have to be added onto the order to ship outside the US.

- I forgot to add $15 for shipping. How can I add this amount?

No worries! Make another contribution and select ""No perk, Just a Contribution.""

- Will the app be compatible with my windows phone?

Yes, AMIKO is compatible with the following operating systems: Apple iOS, Android, and Windows. 

- Will the mobile app receive updates?

Yes of course! Your smartphone should let you know when that will happen!

- Is there a warranty for AMIKO?  

Yes, AMIKO comes with a one year warranty.

- What if I didn't find an answer to my question?

You can send us an e-mail to team@amikotechllc.com. We will do our very best to reply as fast as possible!

When you charge your Apple Watch series 4 with a non-MFi-Certified wireless charger, the charging process is often intermittent.

column8:
AirPods at the same time.

 

We were excited that the first generation SliceCharge got a lot of support from people and the media.
column9:
>

'Apple AirPower Never Showed Up, But This Charging Mat Is a Solid Substitute -Gizmodo

'...the SliceCharge gets you 98% of the benefit for something like a third to a quarter of the price. -9to5mac

'...of all the wireless chargers we've tested, SliceCharge is the closest yet to matching AirPower's design and features. -AppleInsider

 

We redesigned the shape of the coil, combining five coils together while solving the problem of interference and heat.

 

 

As a result, you can place your devices anywhere on the mat to charge them successfully.
column10:
>

 

Not only that, SliceCharge Pro can provide up to 30W charging power for 3 devices, which means your charging speed will be 30% faster than other wireless chargers.

 

SliceCharge Pro incorporates an MFi-Certified Apple Watch Charger by OPSO to fully support Apple Watch series 1/2/3/4.
column11:
>

 

Now SliceCharge can support Sport Loop, Leather Loop, Milanese Loop, and Link Bracelet.

 

In addition, the cable length is 50% longer with a separate USB-C charging cable, giving total freedom to your SliceCharge placement.
column12:
>

 

A beautiful stand for your iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods.
column14:
>

 

We offer an extremely competitive price for just $79, only in this campaign.
column15:
>

Our Package includes one(1) SliceCharge Pro wireless charging base, one(1) MFi-Certified Apple Watch charger by OPSO , one(1) 30w USB-C power adapter, one(1) USB-C to USB-C cable, and one(1) BassCanon AirPods/EarPods cover as a gift, starting at $79, only in this campaign.

 

For every backer of SliceCharge Pro, we would like to offer you our new product for a gift.
column18:
Black.

We will send out the BassCanon AirPods/EarPods Cover with your SliceCharge Pro, which will give your AirPods or EarPods better sound quality and noise reduction.

 

Proof of working prototype that is ready for production

The following unedited single-shot video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production SliceCharge Pro. Testing items include:

column1:
Creating valuable products has always been our philosophy. Hard Cider Labs is a group of designers and engineers who love using Apple products and developing new technology for them. It is our goal to produce the best products we can to make the world just a bit better and hassle-free.

","SliceCharge Pro is available at our official website: www.hardciderlabs.com

Press kit""That one didn’t have AirPower’s USP – overlapping coils that let you put your phone anywhere on the mat – but the new version does …"" - Review by 9to5mac.com  ""...the SliceCharge Pro by Hard Cider Labs is high on our list of replacements for AirPower. It's got six coils, so it'll be very difficult to accidentally miss the charging position. "" - Featured in imore.com

""MFi認証を取得しているといっても、Qi対応のデバイス全てが使えるので、ワイヤレスチャージャーの購入を考えている人にとってはいい選択肢となりそうだ。"" - Featured in nicovideo.jp  ""SliceCharge Pro has the closest function to the AirPower."" - Featured in ProductHunt --- So you got your new iPhone, Apple Watch and wireless charger. But you find that charging your iPhone with the wireless charger is not easy, If your device isn’t placed just right, it won't be charged. When you charge your Apple Watch series 4 with a non-MFi-Certified wireless charger, the charging process is often intermittent. Introducing SliceCharge Pro. World's 1st 6-coils design wireless charger with OPSO MFi-Certified Apple Watch charger.SliceCharge Pro can charge your iPhone, Apple Watch & AirPods at the same time. We were excited that the first generation SliceCharge got a lot of support from people and the media. 'Apple AirPower Never Showed Up, But This Charging Mat Is a Solid Substitute -Gizmodo'...the SliceCharge gets you 98% of the benefit for something like a third to a quarter of the price. -9to5mac'...of all the wireless chargers we've tested, SliceCharge is the closest yet to matching AirPower's design and features. -AppleInsider We redesigned the shape of the coil, combining five coils together while solving the problem of interference and heat.  As a result, you can place your devices anywhere on the mat to charge them successfully.Place the center of your phone in this area. Otherwise, it won’t be charged successfully. Not only that, SliceCharge Pro can provide up to 30W charging power for 3 devices, which means your charging speed will be 30% faster than other wireless chargers. SliceCharge Pro incorporates an MFi-Certified Apple Watch Charger by OPSO to fully support Apple Watch series 1/2/3/4. Now SliceCharge can support Sport Loop, Leather Loop, Milanese Loop, and Link Bracelet. In addition, the cable length is 50% longer with a separate USB-C charging cable, giving total freedom to your SliceCharge placement. A beautiful stand for your iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods. We offer an extremely competitive price for just $79, only in this campaign.30W USB-C PD power adapter is available with JP/US/CN, EU, UK, AUS electrical plug.Our Package includes one(1) SliceCharge Pro wireless charging base, one(1) MFi-Certified Apple Watch charger by OPSO , one(1) 30w USB-C power adapter, one(1) USB-C to USB-C cable, and one(1) BassCanon AirPods/EarPods cover as a gift, starting at $79, only in this campaign. For every backer of SliceCharge Pro, we would like to offer you our new product for a gift.Available in 3 colors: White, Orange & Black.We will send out the BassCanon AirPods/EarPods Cover with your SliceCharge Pro, which will give your AirPods or EarPods better sound quality and noise reduction. Proof of working prototype that is ready for productionThe following unedited single-shot video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production SliceCharge Pro. Testing items include:
charging the iPhone, AirPods (with ElectroLeather), and Apple Watch simultaneously
charging the iPhone X, iPhone XS Max, and Apple Watch simultaneously
the iPhone can be charged successfully at different locations on the pad
the new Apple Watch stand function
Compatibility: iPhone 8/8 Plus, iPhone X/Xs/Xs Max, Samsung Galaxy S7/8/9/9 Plus, Apple Watch series 1/2/3/4, and other devices with Qi standard
Materials: High-class fabric, PU leather, Aluminum Alloy, Plastic
Color: Frosted White, Anthracite Grey, Mountain Blue
RewardsAvailable in 3 colors: Frosted White, Anthracite Grey & Mountain Blue.  About us & Logo replacementThe new logo above will gradually replace the old one.

It is our goal to produce the best products we can to make the world just a bit better and hassle-free.",20.0,1,"2 Campaigns

column2:
run out of juice when you are in emergency.

NIFTYX bracelets are able to charge your devices up to 2.4A to provide the fastest charging solution. And it also allows you to sync your devices as well so you can just carry our bracelets for most of the uses.
column3:
>

 

Our NIFTYX bracelets(NAB &
column4:
NLB) provide 3 colour options for the leather.

Twilight Black, Chestnut Tan, Burgundy Red
column6:
Original Collection(Black-White)


We have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpectedly happened, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

 

When do you start shipping?
It is scheduled on April 2017.

What colours can I choose from?
We offer Burgundy Red, Chestnut Tan, Twilight Black.

When can I select the size / colour?
You will receive a survey after the end of campaign to choose your options of the order.

What kind of phone does it support?
Currently it supports Lightning and Micro USB devices, and Type C will be our stretch goal.

What is the capacity for NIFTYX LifeSaving Bracelet(NLB)?
It is 210mah which is more than enough for an emergency use.
We are looking for a bigger capacity without compromising its size.

What is the Max Current allowed?
It supports up to 2.4A

Do they support sync and charge?
Yes, absolutely.

Do you offer warranty on your products?
Yes, all products will be offering 1 year warranty.

Are they really hand braided?
Yes, they are all hand-braided from our team to provide you the finest quality.


General Enquiry: enquiry@getniftyx.today

Press and Sample Review: pr@getniftyx.today

column1: The One80 Pouches use no magnet, no velcro and no zipper. They require no pocket or belt to provide you with an easy and safe solution for carrying your cards, phone or passport.
We've taken the idea of a running belt and transformed the concept into something completely new and different
column2: then expanded on the idea from a way to carry a phone while running to wallets and passport holders.

column1: The One80 Pouch is the first stand alone pouch that can be added to a waistline (with or without a belt) with no need for a belt, pocket, magnets or velcro. This pouch makes it possible for you to carry those day to day necessities with ease. Each pouch lays discretely against your waist with little to no show.
Compare the old way to the newly reinvented One80 Pouch way!
Carrying your cell phone, cards or passport has never been so easy.

In developing the One80 Pouches we poured over reviews to figure out the good and bad of all comparable items. Zippers are the number one breaking point of running belt and fanny packs. Magnets are potentially dangerous to cell phones and velcro often loses its stick after time. So, we set out to find a way to develop the pouches without any of these to improve user experience and convenience.
No one likes sitting on a wallet. It's uncomfortable and annoying.

Minimal wallet are great. Better than a large traditional wallet. Yet the problem remains.  You have have to keep in a pocket. Do you deal with having it in a back pocket and the bother of sitting on it? Or keep it in a front pocket and contend with the front pocket bulge?
Dave, who has been testing testing the card holder wallet prototype said,
""I went to using a minimal wallet a year ago. From there I started keeping it in my front pocket to avoid having to sit on it. That was better than a back pocket.
But THIS wallet is a GAME CHANGER.""
Fanny packs and running belts are great
column2: but what if you don't want to carry that bulky thing? Or just want something more discrete? One80 Pouch is for you. Perfect to carry your phone on a run and inconspicuous enough to wear with almost anything out to a movies or dinner. Wearing leggings or jeans? With or without a belt? You can comfortably wear any of these with the One80 Pouches.

column1: In front, in back, on the side? Or maybe partially on the side or somewhere in between. Wear your pouch how you like.

Even if you're not wearing it on you waist it's perfect for the inner pocket of your backpack or purse. Have you ever lost your wallet to bottom depths of a bag? Use your pouch to keep it attached inside the bag exactly where you need it.
Inconspicuously wear your One80 Pouch wherever life takes you.

True functionality happens so easily you don't have to think about it. Carrying items can be cumbersome and an obstruction. The One80 Pouch is truly functional. You can wear it to the gym and it won't get in the way of your workout. Wear it running and it will disappear into your running experience. It's time to leave those bulky phone holders that demand continual adjustment behind.

The easy attached clips make putting on your One80 Pouch super easy. The clips are smooth and super low profile so they won't bother or annoy you while wearing your pouch. The design was tested over and over to ensure easy attachment and removal, yet tight enough grip and hold securely.
Less is better, especially when talking about comfort. And that's exactly what your going to get with your One80 Pouch
column2: comfort. So much less to worry about and be bothered by.

column1: No belt. No bulky over-sized  bag. No straps covered in velcro. No magnets to hold it on. No zipper to fuss with. Pure and simple comfort.

What makes these pouches so different from every other wallet, phone or passport holder? The easy on easy off propriety clips. So simple, yet made with precision to ensure your pouch will easily slip on to a waistline or belt, will hold secure, and then can be removed easily.
Doesn't seem that difficult right? That's what we thought at first too.

We spent a year trying different ways of making this work and tested hundreds of clip variations. With each rendition removing or adding millimeters at a time and subtle shape modification before finally at what you see today.

Some of first steps were to figure out a pouch or bag system. We went through various types fabrics and materials. Tried velcro, zippers and magnets before ultimately deciding we wanted to simplify the pouch as much as possible and eliminate these different  materials
column2: as most of them were leading causes for issues in other bags and belts.

column1: We knew the key to make this concept work would be and effective clip. This proved to be the most difficult part of the building process. After various concepts and the slightest adjustment of 1/2 mm at a time we arrived at the clip we felt accomplished what we had set out to do.

Lots and lots of 3D printing and design lead us to the clips we came to today. Testing each along the way for it's capabilities and function. Our industrial sewing machine and 3D printer got a lot of use during those months.

This is our 2nd crowd funding campaign, so we are familiar with the process and have learned much from our first experience. With that in mind we are not naive enough to believe we have it all figured out, and keep our perspectives alert and open to the potential of unplanned changes through this process. From what we learned, we've done everything possible to streamline the process on our end. We are working with the same trusted manufacturer on this project that we've worked with over the past 3 years. We’ve set a delivery date that is real and attainable to ensure an on time delivery or early delivery
column2: even in the case that something unexpected occurs. Regardless, we’ll work to keep all backers aware of changes or challenges if/as they happen.

column1: • Nixie LAB - Ultimate Nixie Project
• Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi

Universal Nixie Tube Tester it's a simple handy device for testing nixie tubes. Additional tester functionality (with socket no.16) is the ability to test nixie tube drivers. The tester allows you to connect 16 different sockets for several dozen nixie tubes and nixie tube drivers. 
The sockets (no.1 - 15) presented below are also compatible with Nixie Shield for Arduino and Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi.
• Perfect quality enclosure (colour: black, red, blue), laser-cut and engraved
• Enclosure dimensions: 1.3 x 2.75 x 4.8 inch (33 x 70 x 122 mm)
EXCHANGEABLE TUBE SOCKETS
• 16 sockets available for dozen different tubes and nixie drivers

column4: >Specially Designed Cage for iphone X/XS
column18: >Full access to buttons and interfaces, does not affect cellular or WIFI reception
column32: >Made of aluminum alloy with an anodized finish
column38: >Back Tri-Chuck bayonet mount
column41:
>Hidden lanyard hole

Product Features:

column1: • Specially Designed for iPhone X/XS with CNC machining to ensure a precise fit.
• 17mm threaded lens mount and an additional bayonet mount plate for lenses.
• Side hollowed-out design with full access to buttons and bottom lightning interface.
• Stylish Spider-web back makes the cage lighter without sacrificing any strength.
• Hidden lanyard hole on the bottom of cage back.
• Back Tri-Chuck bayonet mount helps connect to a holder, cradle or other external devices with the same structure.
• Inbuilt rubber shims protect the phone from scratching.
• A pocket cage as well as a protective case.
• Made of aluminum alloy with an anodized finish.

If you like photography, you won’t miss the mobile photography.

Compared to shooting with DSLR or mirrorless cameras, shooting with mobiles can also achieve good results. Thanks to the improvement of hardware and software performance, live streaming and short video shooting with mobile phones are becoming more and more popular among photographers. However, the problem is that fixing the mobile phone before shooting in traditional ways can often be complicated, unhandy, not so stable and lack of protection.

At the end of 2016, some of our dear customers suggested that we should design a specific iPhone cage, on which they would be able to mount other accessories to achieve mobile shooting. During some non-commercial situations which cares less about the professional perspective, shooting with iPhone would be much easier than with some professional equipment because of its small size and light weight. Later, similar suggestions were put forward intermittently, and we realized this would be a revolutionary product. Before long, a dedicated design team was founded.

In September 2017, Iphone X was announced. Its outstanding performance in shooting ensured us this would be a great opportunity and we seized that.

After updating 4 versions, drawing over 100 sketch designs, trying dozens of structural methods and solving multiple processing difficulties, in April 2019, this newly designed Iphone X cage came out. It retains a 17mm threaded lens mount for 17mm-threaded lenses and an additional bayonet mount plate for lenses. It also retains a unique Tri-chuck bayonet on which can be used to mount a holder, cradle or other external devices with the same structure for mobile phone filmmaking, video photography, interview, live stream, vlogging and etc..

Design Concept
Source of inspiration: Spider web
Product implication: catch prey, instant focus
We always put our users’ needs first during the whole design process. We optimize product design continuously based on different usage scenarios because we know any product that is disengaged from our users and their using habits would be a failure. On this basis, we strive to achieve our vision in the most simple way, whether from the structure, appearance, processing methods or users habits, to bring the best quality products to our users.

Specially Designed for iPhone X/XS with CNC machining to ensure a precise fit.
17mm threaded lens mount and an additional bayonet mount plate for lenses.
Side hollowed-out design with full access to buttons and bottom lightning interface.
Stylish Spider-web back makes the cage lighter without sacrificing any strength.
Hidden lanyard hole on the bottom of cage back.
Back Tri-Chuck bayonet mount helps connect to a holder, cradle or other external devices with the same structure.
Inbuilt rubber shims protect the phone from scratching.
A pocket cage as well as a protective case.
Made of aluminum alloy with an anodized finish.

>What do I need to use MHQ?

column1: What is MHQ and how does it work?
advanced communication service designed to put phone calls back in
your control. Part of its job, and one of the aspects you will
certainly like, is that it stops marketing phone calls. The other
part of its job is to let you control who can contact you, when they
can contact you and how they can contact you. The net result of MHQ
and its features is that it will free up your time and minimise
disruptions in your personal life. MHQ stops you from receiving unwanted phone calls at unwanted times from
unwanted people. For examples on what MHQ can do please read the features and examples further below.
work MHQ uses a Cloud based platform to pre-process your
incoming phone calls before they are sent to your phone. This includes signal processing, audio processing and self learning

systems. We combined those aspects with what we have learnt in our 8 years of being in the communications business space to ensure that MHQ delivers as we have outlined here. Because of this, we are 100% confident that we can deliver MHQ.
Here is an image illustrating how MHQ does its work:
note MHQ is a service with an associated monthly fee. See below for
more details on the available packages. Some of our perks will
give you discounts on these plans.

MHQ is the brain child of Enrico, founder of MondoTalk (that's me writing this by the way, odd to refer to myself in the third person but I guess it reads better). My educational background is in Computer Science, IT and Mathematics. Eight years ago I founded MondoTalk, a company offering voice services and specializing in associated software development.

So how did I come upon MHQ. Well I had been talking to friends and family about how annoyed I was with the amount of unwanted phone calls I was getting. Many people sympathized and were also fed up with the situation. So here is where the mother of invention, necessity, put my neurons to the test. I used my experience and what I had learnt at MondoTalk and not long after an early, early, pre, pre alpha system was created. The first thing I did was to put it to the test, and it worked, marketing calls had stopped! I left it running for a few months and my wife and I were over the moon that we no longer got marketing phone calls. Mind you it wasn't a very elegant solution but it worked! From there the design went through many iterations, improvements and feature additions over the period of several years. It wasn't until 2013 that I believed I had put together a design that not only stopped marketing phone calls but was also intelligent enough to control all your calls, while at the same time keeping it easy to use. I then held a meeting with the rest of the MondoTalk team to get feedback and see if MHQ had merit. Everybody loved it and additional great ideas were added. Soon after a project was kicked off. Now all that remains is to get funding for the aspects of the project that the MondoTalk team do not have experience in. We need to hire exceptional iOS and Android developers to ensure that the MHQ App user interface is as easy to use as possible. This brings me to where I am now, writing this in hope you believe in MHQ as much as we do. If you do, please show your support by buying our perks. Your funds will be used to get the iOS and Android developers we need.

First contributors specials
To reward our first supporters we are offering a limited quantity of MHQ at a big 66% discount. Please get in quick so you don't miss out.

Will MHQ be available in my country?
Yes! We are aiming to be able to bring MHQ to as many counties as possible. Please spread the word in your country and with enough support we will roll out the MHQ service there too.</font></font>
Do I need a VoIP or IP Phone to use MHQ?
No. Also see the question immediately below.
Can I answer calls on regular phones with the base package?

Yes! To do this with the Base package there is a cost per call that you answer. That is why we made the Multi Phone package. With this package the cost per call answered has been removed. If you are looking to use MHQ to block most of your calls or answer most of your calls from VoIP Internet phones the Base Package is perfect for you.
How do I set up and customize MHQ?
To configure MHQ with your preferred custom settings you will need an Android or iOS device along with the MHQ App. The MHQ App will be free.

The New Type Portable Smart Phone Charger!!   

""Power Station""


Smartphones are very useful in everyday life and have become an indispensable part of our daily lives. 

Browsing the web, reading e-mails, updating social networks, watching online TV and recording photos and videos... 

But smartphone users have always stressed on the short battery life, especially while they are out and far away from charger. 
External battery aka ""power bank"" showed one way to solve the short battery life issue. 
 
Having a power bank can be a great solution to extend short battery life. 
So, the first step we did is to analyze the concept of power bank 
 
• what is the biggest concern most smartphone users have since smartphones have become an extension of daily life 
• why smartphone need power bank 
 
And we have found annoying problems to face when using power bank 
 
• only one battery can be charged at one time 
• the higher the capacity, the longer the charging time 
 
We are developing the new and innovative power bank product to solve the problem above. 


Power Station Feature
: 3000mAh(1pc Power Bank) x 4 pcs = 12,000m (4pcs Power Bank)
Power Bank / Charger Electrical Characteristics
• Power Bank Charging Time (With Charging Pod) : 2.0 hour ~ 3.5 hour
• Smartphone Charging Time (With Power Bank) : iPhone 1.5 hour (About)
• Can be check battery capacity (Blue LED 4 Step : 0%~25% / 25%~50% / 50%~75% / 75% ~100%)
• Cafes, Coffee shops, Restaurants, Food service Business
• Department stores, Banks, Hotels, Airport services lounge
• Theaters, Libraries, Art galleries, Museums, Galleries, Opera hall, Casino
• Hair salon, Skin care, Nail salon, SPA
• Golf driving range, Golf course, Baseball fields, Bowling club...
Early Adapters / Package
• Change Stickers, You will want to the design (Family pictures, Characters, Logo…)

Why we need your support?

We need to production funds, your support will be produced and we will provide you our product. Our product is very useful and helpful in Smartphones.

Very useful at home and at the office. If you have a cafe or restaurant, our product is give your customers of more satisfaction.

Use Smartphones any space, Power Station is very useful

We will manage all sales from Indiegogo. Your demands will increase our Market Sale Price. Of course more money, more happy! We will develop new type large capacity charger and wireless charger if we can reach more money than our target

Anyway we will not give up. We will continue to search capital and finish this project. Because we believe in it and hope you will believe in us too

","The New Type Portable Smart Phone Charger!!   ""Power Station""Smartphones are very useful in everyday life and have become an indispensable part of our daily lives. Browsing the web, reading e-mails, updating social networks, watching online TV and recording photos and videos... But smartphone users have always stressed on the short battery life, especially while they are out and far away from charger. External battery aka ""power bank"" showed one way to solve the short battery life issue.  Having a power bank can be a great solution to extend short battery life. So, the first step we did is to analyze the concept of power bank  • what is the biggest concern most smartphone users have since smartphones have become an extension of daily life • why smartphone need power bank  And we have found annoying problems to face when using power bank  • only one battery can be charged at one time • the higher the capacity, the longer the charging time  We are developing the new and innovative power bank product to solve the problem above. Power Station Feature

Smartphone Charging Time (With Power Bank) : iPhone 1.5 hour (About)
Can be check battery capacity (Blue LED 4 Step : 0%~25% / 25%~50% / 50%~75% / 75% ~100%)

column1: KryKey is grothing at a rapid rate of around 15% per month and offers a stable and popular platform for people to create a web vased radio station and broadcast 24/7 at 320K. Currently in version 2, we have designed version 3, but as it is a free service and no VC backing, we require funds to take this next step. www.KryKey.com
• move from flash based streaming to html45
• put on all mobile devives and tablets

The funds will make version 3 a reality and help turn every radio station into a radio/TV station. People will be able to broadcast live using video or audio using their mobile devices back to the studio, record shows, play more content (YouTube, SoundCloud, etc). It will give a voice to those in countries that havent got one.
We are also looking for developers who are highly skilled in ASP.NET, HTML5, Silverlight and even graphic design, so if you cant help with funds, your time would be awesome.

Inspired by the need for an easier handsfree hearing and speaking experience, I designed this product to be as close to the ears as possible.  The visor allows you to rotate and position your smart phone in many different positions for optimal hearing.  Unlike all the other smart phone holders, this product can hold more than a smart phone. The Ez Handsfree All Purpose Visor Clip can hold all smartphones, mp3 players, sunglasses, car documents, family photos, pens, notepads, and more.

I need your help to raise money to get this product out to the market.  I have invested everything I have to get to where I'm at today.  Patent fees and research and development has drained all my funds.  With your sponsor,  I will be able to use this money for your orders and make this dream a reality. I will also include a matching smart phone stand I created as a thank you for your support.

I created this product to make my life easier.  All the other products on the market were either too bulky or too far away from my ears and sight.  All the other phone holders only served one purpose and that was to hold your phone.  My product is an ALL PURPOSE visor clip which holds almost anything essentially flat.  With your help, I can get this product into every consumers automobiles across the world.
Any kind of support is much appreciated.  Mentioning something in your social media circle, using the Indiegogo share tools or even liking my product page on facebook would mean a great deal.

column1: IRENE is a project designed by Narek Bavikyan, better known as Naneau, and developed in collaboration with an industrial designer Vadim Kibardin. Both designers are based in Prague, Czech Republic.
IRENE is a versatile and multi-functional system for all types of Smartphones, Tablets, Portable Cameras and Car GPS Navigators, regardless of the model or manufacturer.
IRENE is an attempt to create a certain ideological analog of a Swiss knife in the field of accessories for modern devices.

Narek himself explains the history of the project: ""One day I was in a giant electronics store and I was struck by an infinite number of different accessories for various smartphones, tablets, portable cameras and car navigators.
On the one hand, I knew that as an active user of these devices, these accessories provide some necessary and useful functions.
But on the other hand, I was against spending hundreds of dollars on those accessories and buying a backpack to carry all those accessories with me every day.
And most of all, as a person keen on sustainable design, I was frustrated with
momentary and short life cycle combined with a pursuit of fashion and current models of gadgets
crudity of design, engineering solutions and neglection of convenience
and most of all - the indifference to the environment that was brought with the production of those accessories.

A few weeks later after the analysis of the existing accessories, their functions and operating scenarios, I met with Vadim in a cafe, where we shared some thoughts. We began to discuss the idea and made the first sketches there.
So that's how the project IRENE begun, based on the ten principles for good design by Dietem Rams, to whom we would like to express our deepest respect and love. ""
The market analysis of existing accessories identified some key functional groups for accessories and the benefits that IRENE has combined.
A Handle/Holder for a Smartphone, Tablet, E-reader etc
A Table Stand for a Smartphone, Tablet, E-reader etc, that has two viewing modes and two input modes (portrait or landscape orientation)
A Monopod for Smartphone, Tablet, Portable Cameras with 1/4 inch Hot Shoe Ball-Head Mount
Versatile Car GPS Navigator, Smartphone, Tablet  Mount
Security lock for Smartphone, Tablet and any other devices
Two 1/4 inch universal screws for additional bases and extensions that enhance the functional of IRENE, so you can add functionality more and more
Elegant aesthetic design, crafted to the very last detail
column2: Durable construction and long-lasting design allows IRENE to become an accessory that gets better over the years and becomes a think of true value and emotional attraction for its owner

column1: Innovative in its versatility and flexibility, IRENE allows you to use it for almost all types of Smartphones, Tablets, Portable Cameras, Car Navigators, regardless of the model or manufacturer. And this applies not only to those devices that are manufactured today, but also to those that gonna appear tomorrow. That's why the customer will not need to buy a new IRENE, if he wishes to change the gadget, as in the case with all the majority of Handles/Holders, Cases, Table Stands and many other accessories, designed for specific models of different manufacturers
Ease of use, as well as compact size and weight
IRENE has an elegant aesthetic design with all its clean lines, lean on the material, functionality and meticulous attention to color and texture of the surface, that wants to be touched.
Our goal is to transform a mass product into a quality product without any compromise.
IRENE will be available in a wide range of colors and materials suitable for any kind of personalization.
Three Body and Base colors: matte white, matte black, brushed aluminum.
Three types of surface for a Ball-Head: Rose gold, Yellow gold, Polished Stainless Steel.
Four colors of leather: white, black, brown and beige (coming later).
Total: 108 possible mix and match looks.
Two different Bases models [the Main Base and the Additional Base] will also be available, and their total number in the kit will depend only on the wishes of the customer.
Bases attached directly to the back of Phone/Phone case
column2: Tablet/Tablet case etc using a 3M high performance adhesive tape.

column1: Materials: Aluminium alloy, Stainless Steel, Wood, Leather (coming later)
Length (body): 13 cm / 5.1 in. (50 cm / 19.68 in elongated with the monopod)
Weight: 87 g. / 0.19 lb. (with a Main Base and wooden decorative panels)
In the future we plan to market Additional Attachments that extend the basic functionality of this model, as well as two completely new models:
IRENE Breeze - light version without a monopod.
IRENE Gale - the professional grade monopod extendable up to 100 cm / 39.37 in. length
The market analysis of existing accessories identified some key functional groups for accessories and the benefits that IRENE has combined.
we will continually inform our Contributors about the progress that we are making
this will include delivery times updates - especially if we are ahead of plan!
we will be transparent with all of the results, unexpected issues and how we plan to resolve them

Manufacturing: As you can imagine we have to use the best quality materials and to achieve the faultless end result. Our chosen manufacturer will be involved in the prototype phase so they will know our product in the embryonic stage.

Delivery time: We have built in some contingency time during the prototype and manufacturing stage to ensure that we can meet the deadlines outlined above. We will inform you immediately if we need more time or of course if we are ahead of schedule.
Please help to support us and then just  enjoy every minute of this wonderful IRENE! THANK YOU!
Folks please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! And that's all there is to it.",15.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1:
LAZYLOCKS is designed to fit any door. It can be easily installed next to your existing lock without removing or replacing anything - it takes just a few minutes.
The LAZYLOCKS presents a contemporary new look for an old-fashioned lock: a sleek, modern device in brushed metal with LED light showing the lock/unlock status. Its elegant simplicity fits with any home decor.
install - you don’t have to replace your existing door lock neither your keys.
Attach LAZYLOCKS next to your existing lock on the inside of the door and fix 6
screws. Pair it with your Android phone or iPhone and you are ready to control
your lock through the LAZYLOCKS apps. LAZYLOCKS can be installed without any

configure it within the LAZYLOCKS apps and you are ready to use it.
We have made locks both for right - hand door or for left - hand door

LAZYLOCKS displays the status of your home door right on your smart phone wherever you are. An access log and notifications will keep you updated as well. No more doubts and uncertainties about your door.
Make sure you have any computer operating devices with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth Connection turned on

LAZYLOCKS comes with free apps for Android and iOS. 
You can grant access codes to friends and family.
column5: >LAZYLOCKS comes with two pre-configured security codes: |
column9: >1st – which you will use on your daily basis
column13: >2nd – which you can give to your guests and then restrict their access.

column1:
We are happy to announce our new product:
Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER.
You have the unique opportunity to make a pre - order for an extra Early Bird price of $49! Hurry up!!! The Offer is limited - 50 pieces only!!!

Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER - reach up to 110m.
 Once your guest presses the button - you will receive a notification on your phone, with photo or video (depends on your settings)
VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER will last for 600 notifications on two standardized AA batteries.

It will synchronize with LAZYLOCKS application.
The kit set includes a special waterproof case for outdoor use

The  dimensions of VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER are:
8 x 4.5 x 1.5 cm/ 3.1 x 1.8 x 0.69 inches

column5: >Do not let anyone interrupt you, when you are extremely busy!

column1: At times LAZYLOCKS might be a necessity.
There are moments in life, when every second is precious and you don't want to miss a thing let along bother with the door opening
With the help of the LAZYLOCKS it is possible to lock and unlock
your door from anywhere. It allows you to not only operate LAZYLOCKS from
within Bluetooth reach  (approx. 10 m), but also via a mobile data
LAZYLOCKS will last for 400 openings on standardized AA batteries,
which is almost 2 months of frequent using. Once your battery runs low, LAZYLOCKS
will notify you both on your smart phone and via your door lock well in
advance. You will receive a notification via your app as well as the LAZYLOCKS
will be blinking with red light. You will have at least 20 openings since the 1<sup>st</sup>
time you will receive the notification.
At LAZYLOCKS our mission is to make door locks smarter and
physical keys irrelevant, thanks to your phone. We are thrilled to take on this
challenge because we believe in the power of mobile technology innovations to
facilitate the daily live of you and me. We tested and developed different
models and strive for finding the best working solution to solve this problem.
However, every project carries risks with it. The most common risks are
potential delays in production, obtaining supplier materials, packaging and
shipping. We do everything do reduce these risks but it has to be said that
they can never be completely eliminated.
requires a long chain of manufacturing steps to produce a high quality product.
Delays in any of the steps tend to ripple down and delay the whole process.
companies have attempted to create a product like this and failed. We have
solved the main challenges that discouraged previous developers.
have a Plan B and Plan C for the most important features.
there is a lot to get right - ease of use, reliability, cost, and delivering a

We have ordered part of the components for the larger amount, as we had two campaign (due to huge interest) and we have to let you know that we have not received any funds for the second campaing of this project from Indiegogo. Therefore, we had to find other means of funding to be able to fulfill our obligations.Every supporter of this campaign will receive what he/she pledged for.

Bearing in mind that delay is inevitable.Our Backers from second campaing have to contact Indiegogo for the refund, as they have not sent us the funds.Thank you so much for your support!Once again, we do apologise for the delayWe will keep you posted!

By multiple requests of our backers, we have decided to launch one more campaign, so those of you who did not manage to buy LAZYLOCKS, will have this opportunity. To see new campaign please folow the link below:

LAZYLOCKS is designed to fit any door. It can be easily installed next to your existing lock without removing or replacing anything - it takes just a few minutes.The LAZYLOCKS presents a contemporary new look for an old-fashioned lock: a sleek, modern device in brushed metal with LED light showing the lock/unlock status. Its elegant simplicity fits with any home decor.
install - you don’t have to replace your existing door lock neither your keys.
Attach LAZYLOCKS next to your existing lock on the inside of the door and fix 6
screws. Pair it with your Android phone or iPhone and you are ready to control
your lock through the LAZYLOCKS apps. LAZYLOCKS can be installed without any
configure it within the LAZYLOCKS apps and you are ready to use it.We have made locks both for right - hand door or for left - hand door

LAZYLOCKS displays the status of your home door right on your smart phone wherever you are. An access log and notifications will keep you updated as well. No more doubts and uncertainties about your door.
Make sure you have any computer operating devices with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth Connection turned on

LAZYLOCKS comes with free apps for Android and iOS. You can grant access codes to friends and family. LAZYLOCKS comes with two pre-configured security codes: |1st – which you will use on your daily basis2nd – which you can give to your guests and then restrict their access.

We are happy to announce our new product: Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER. You have the unique opportunity to make a pre - order for an extra Early Bird price of $49! Hurry up!!! The Offer is limited - 50 pieces only!!!
Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER - reach up to 110m.  Once your guest presses the button - you will receive a notification on your phone, with photo or video (depends on your settings)
VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER will last for 600 notifications on two standardized AA batteries.
It will synchronize with LAZYLOCKS application.The kit set includes a special waterproof case for outdoor use
The  dimensions of VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER are:8 x 4.5 x 1.5 cm/ 3.1 x 1.8 x 0.69 inches
Do not let anyone interrupt you, when you are extremely busy!
At times LAZYLOCKS might be a necessity.
There are moments in life, when every second is precious and you don't want to miss a thing let along bother with the door opening
With the help of the LAZYLOCKS it is possible to lock and unlock
your door from anywhere. It allows you to not only operate LAZYLOCKS from
within Bluetooth reach  (approx. 10 m), but also via a mobile data
LAZYLOCKS will last for 400 openings on standardized AA batteries,
which is almost 2 months of frequent using. Once your battery runs low, LAZYLOCKS
will notify you both on your smart phone and via your door lock well in
advance. You will receive a notification via your app as well as the LAZYLOCKS
will be blinking with red light. You will have at least 20 openings since the 1st
time you will receive the notification.
At LAZYLOCKS our mission is to make door locks smarter and
physical keys irrelevant, thanks to your phone. We are thrilled to take on this
challenge because we believe in the power of mobile technology innovations to
facilitate the daily live of you and me. We tested and developed different
models and strive for finding the best working solution to solve this problem.
However, every project carries risks with it. The most common risks are
potential delays in production, obtaining supplier materials, packaging and
shipping. We do everything do reduce these risks but it has to be said that
they can never be completely eliminated.
requires a long chain of manufacturing steps to produce a high quality product.
Delays in any of the steps tend to ripple down and delay the whole process.
companies have attempted to create a product like this and failed. We have
solved the main challenges that discouraged previous developers.
have a Plan B and Plan C for the most important features.
there is a lot to get right - ease of use, reliability, cost, and delivering a

                     How to Improve Charging by 4X?

We would like to offer our Indiegogo backers the opportunity to purchase our newest product for a discounted offer (30% off future retail pricing).  The BULLT Charger will be the fastest wall charger on the market and if used with our MagBull cable can increase your charging speeds by up to 4 times!  The multi output charger allows you to quick charge using both the MagBull 3 in 1 cable and the Power cable at the same time giving all your devices access to fast charging instantly.  This is a Limited Discounted offer for our MagBull Indiegogo Backers only.
• Dual outputs of USB A and USB C, allows you to charge any USB-C or USB device with a single adapter.
• Intelligent chip automatically detects and provides the most suitable power, ensuring the fastest charging speed and safety.
• Power Delivery 3.0: USB-C port with up to 46W Power Delivery, charges compatible devices even faster.
• The additional 11.5W USB-A port powers all 5V USB devices with output up to 2.1A
• Compatible with MacBook/Pro, Dell XPS, Nintendo Switch, Samsung Note8/S8/S8+, Google Pixel/XL, iPhone 7/Plus and More
