Tom Kowalick's Automotive Black Box Security Mission

I'm a retired professor after 30 years with an intense passion towards enhancing vehicle and highway safety while safeguarding civil liberties, consumer protection and privacy. I am president of AIRMIKA, Inc., located in the Sandhills region of North Carolina at Southern Pines, and the manufacturer of a simple to use automotive aftermarket product for vehicle owners - The AUTOcyb (tm) Automotive Cyber Security Lock.

Since 1997, I helped create automotive black technology in light vehicles (cars and trucks) with high level national and international experience in Event Data Recorder (EDR) standardization, legislation and regulation. I am widely recognized as a true expert regarding EDRs and have testified to the U.S. Senate, National Academies of Sciences, Government Accounting Office (GAO)  and many other places.  I'm author of seven (7) books) on the topic including FATAL EXIT: The Automotive Black Box Debate.

This technology has the potential of reducing injuries and deaths but also has the capability of subjecting vehicle owners and motorists to unnecessary problems if the data is not accurate and secured.
My mission is to assure fair usage of automotive black box technologies.

Recently Congress and federal regulators failed to provide essential consumer protection.  I took the next steps and created and manufactured a product to do just that.  It is simple to install and remove and protects the security, integrity and authenticity of the data.  You hold the key, not automakers, law enforcement or insurance companies. If others want to access your crash data they will have to seek your permission or use legal means to do so.  Basically, this device protects your interests.

I believe this will be a high demand disruptive technology product that will put data control back in the hands of the vehicle owner.  Businesswise, I have everything in place to take my company to the next level except funding to produce more units and marketing.

Presently 4000 units are ready to ship. I offer each person who donates $33.00 or more to this important project one (1) AUTOcyb (tm) - Automotive Cyber Security Lock shipped anywhere nationwide USA.  The product does not currently ship outside the U.S.
I am also working on enhancing the product line with Near Field Communications (NFC) technology to create an Internet of Things cell app.
Bottom Line:  This project is all about your driving protection - something everyone needs.  Please share this important useful information with others.

CaseFace is a group of young startup entrepreneur’s students living together in a co-living space called CrashPad in Cambridge, MA the nation’s hub for innovation.
We have created CaseFace to give people and artist from around the world the opportunity to create and share a large variety of designed cell phone cases using a social media platform.

What is CaseFace?
A cell phone case design service that is growing by the minute. Vote for your favorite design, using your social networks and get cases for $5 instead of $50! Designers submit artwork daily that want and need the exposure we have to offer with our unique business model.
1. Vote for your favorite design using social media.
2. Share, expose, and co-create your favorite cases with your favorite artist.
3. Buy your favorite and your friend’s favorite case for ONLY $5

""Aren't you tired of being stuck with the same annoying $50 cell phone case?""

column3: >Androidly is a beautifully designed android smartwatch and phone. With full access to Google Play's hundreds of thousands of apps. Your world on your wrist!

column1: Androidly completely changes how we think of, use, and integrate computers and smart technologies in our life. Right now, we integrate with technology in passive and primitive ways, and Androidly is here to change all that

Androidly runs our in-house developed, customized, full implementation of Android 2.2 OS, which makes it a smartwatch from the next generation. Androidly has access to over 500,000 applications on Google Play Store, most of which are free! So it remains infinitely customizable and adaptable as you grow, and as the Android ecosystem grows.

Androidly is a watch with an Android phone. It has a 2"" display and 2 buttons each on both the sides. The 2 buttons on the left are for controlling the volume and on the right side, the top button is for Menu and the bottom button is the Back button and doubles up as the power button. The SIM and the MicroSD card go underneath the battery.

It looks and feels just like a regular wrist watch, until you turn it on! Once it’s on, it looks quite unlike anything else you have ever seen. It’s fascinating to see and do on your wrist, what one could only do on larger and cumbersome devices until now. It’s an experience which was just not available before Androidly.

Imagine if we combined a phone, camera, GPS, and an array of sensors into a smart device and miniaturized this device to the size of a conventional wristwatch with full Android running on top. This opens up a fascinating world of possible applications and usage scenarios. One would never need to pick any other device up, as the watch will always be strapped onto the wrist and available for use anytime, anywhere. The smartwatch integrates as an artificial limb of the users, providing all the benefits of a fully connected smart device, at all times!
Removable Storage: 8 GB SD included, Up to 16 GB SD.

Multitask like a superhero. Reach out for that refreshing drink in the middle of an email, with full confidence. Read through your documents, with references on your wrist and a coffee in your hand! Cook with the recipe handy, or manage your stocks with a live ticker always at hand. Monitor your blog or server status on your wrist, as you create new content. Keep your hands free for the important things in life!

Android: Androidly is the world's smallest full android device. We have customized Android to create a beautiful and functional user experience on the smaller watch screen. Feel at home with the regular Android experience. Carrying separate device for different things is a thing of the past now.

Phone:  With the power of Android, all your contacts are always available, and you can call them directly with a tap on your wrist. Use the inbuilt speakerphone and mic, or connect a Bluetooth headset and talk away! Threaded SMS are inbuilt. You can even connect your VoIP provider!

Camera: A camera on your wrist watch opens up many possibilities. It's always out there on your wrist, so you are always ready to click when memorable moments present themselves. Capture unique angles or use it to automatically capture images every minute, to create a photo-journal of your life!
GPS: Be an explorer. Know all the routes and destinations, without taking your hands off the wheel. Voice guided turn by turn navigation. Experience navigation from your wrist
column2: travelling will never be the same again.

column1: WiFi: Carry the powers of the Internet, in the most stylish form factor available, in your watch. Connect over high speed WiFi to all your favourite sites and apps. Your emails, schedule, contacts and videos are always in sync and YouTube videos play smoothly.

Bluetooth: Connect and communicate with all your connected devices. Create a true Personal Area Network, with all your devices accessible from your wrist. Listen to music, make calls, sync, share and also control Bluetooth peripherals seamlessly.

USB: Panic attacks caused by the draining battery, is a thing of past. The strap of the watch ends in a USB port. Making it possible for the smartwatch to be charged, anywhere and anytime. When plugged in to a computer the watch acts as a pen drive with 8GB external memory that can be expanded to 16GB.
I HAVE FAT FINGERS (CAN I TYPE ON THIS?)

Androidly uses a specialized keyboard for the smaller watch screen, called the FLIT Keyboard. It uses 4 big buttons with tap and slide typing approach. The biggest of fingers can type on the device with great ease. You can also use any other custom keyboard which you like!

column2:
>
WHAT IS GOING ON NOW?

column1: The watch prototypes have been carefully put together and continually tested. This includes tests for physical durability of the watch and the software that is specifically built for Androidly to provide optimum functionality.
We are happy to offer step goals as additional rewards, which are designed to better the Androidly experience.

$250K VOTERS CHOICE NEW COLOUR! 

We'd bring you on-board and let you decide a whole new colour for Androidly when we hit $250,000! Three colours currently available are, Black, White and Gray. A feedback survey will be sent along with the welcoming email, asking you to pick a brand new colour. Once the voting ends, you will be given the choice to pick between your pre-chosen and the newly voted upon colour!

$550K LANDMARK NEW DESIGN!

With your help and support, if we succeed in reaching the $550,000 landmark, then we will have the resources to completely re-design the Androidly Smartwatch!  We will provide all the backers with a choice of 3 NEW Androidly designs! We will send out a survey to pick out the most popular new design out of the three. Upon completion you will be provided with a choice of the new design or the pre-chosen device!

We are proud to say that Androidly shines as a developer friendly device. There is full ADB support and custom apps can be installed via USB. The watch is compatible with the existing Android SDK, so you can put all your regular Android development experience to good use directly on the Androidly smartwatch.

Androidly comes with Super User privileges and the app developers can have a field day enjoying the endless possibilities of having an unrestricted android device on their wrists.

Forums on the internet are full of custom development for the chipset used in Androidly, which translates into an easier development platform for you!

column2: >The Androidly team comes together from different areas of expertise but is united in their love for technology, design and open source. The team always wanted to create smart devices which help people do things that were not possible before. We had seen many primitive accessories being sold as smartwatches and wanted to create something which does justice to the moniker. Androidly is a bootstrapped startup.

column1:
Q.) How big is the battery, how long does it last?
A.) The battery is 800mAh. It will last over 2 days on standby. Besides that the watch strap has a USB port at the end which can be used for charging anywhere on the go. The watch charges to full battery in 45 minutes.

Q.) How sturdy is the watch?
A.) The watch is Scratch Resistant and Water Resistant. It comes with a 1 year warranty. The watch has gone under extensive real life testing to ensure the same.

Q.) What is the difference between Androidly and Z1 (other watches which look similar to it)?
A.) There are some watches which look similar to Androidly but that is where the similarities end. No other smartwatch comes with the complete Android experience. Only Androidly allow you to connect to your Google account to sync and use Gmail, Calendar and Contacts and other Google services. Only Androidly has and runs the complete Google Play Store which gives access to over 500,000 apps on the Play store!

Q.) Can the strap be changed?
A.) Androidly comes with an innovative strapping system which includes the charging wires and a USB port at the end. This allows the charging of the watch anywhere without carrying a separate charger, but also means that the strap can't be changed.

Q.) When will the watches ship?
A.) Please see the timeline graphic above.

Q.) What does the T-shirt look like?
A.)  Please find below.

(http://potentialdifference.com) Potential Difference is an electrical phrase that is the definition of voltage, and the logo is the symbol for voltage. Elliott chose it because the words can also imply making a difference for science, technology, or the environment.

We seek your help in providing our patented ultra-fast battery charger technology to charger manufacturers. Those manufacturers will then provide to you products that recharge your ordinary off the shelf batteries in minutes without overheating: batteries used in your environmentally friendly electric cars or cell phones, cameras, power tools, toys, model cars and airplanes, and other consumer electronics. Dramatically faster charging will even be available for forklift trucks and other industrial electric vehicles. For your help, we are providing the perks in the list on the right.

Exciting New Development! Much earlier than expected, our manufacturing partner, Chargetek, Inc. (http://www.chargetek.com) will work with us to develop a programmable microcontroller chip that will be available to charger manufacturers before the end of the year. We expect the first prototype chips to be finished this summer. At that time, charger manufacturers will have the opportunity contract with us for microcontroller chips or for our charging algorithm to be installed on their own chips.

Therefore, rather than receiving chargers from our company or Chargetek, Indiegogo campaign contributors who want fast chargers will be added to the top of the list to receive them from a manufacturer that will use our technology to make fast chargers.

Our company, Potential Difference, Inc. has an exclusive license from the Georgia Institute of Technology for two rapid battery charging patents to charge lithium ion batteries in minutes without overheating: 70% state of charge in 10 minutes, 80% in 12 minutes, and 100% in 16 minutes. With more tweaking, we expect to even further reduce the charge time. See more test details near the end of this page.
Our success with this campaign can also affect the environment as we have successfully tested it on the lead acid battery chemistry used for electric vehicles and solar and wind power battery backup.

column1: We have collaborated with Chargetek, a charger manufacturer that already ships thousands of chargers monthly for various industries and member of our Indiegogo campaign team, to produce rapid chargers. Elliott Small, president of Potential Difference, has an A.B. degree in Biochemical Sciences from Harvard and has been director of the U. S. Commerce Department funded Technology Commercialization Center in Washington, D.C.
(1) With Chargetek, have developed a design an ultra fast charger for cell phone batteries

(2) Pursuing cooperation of consumer electronics manufacturers for development of rapid charging integrated circuit (IC) to control the charging circuitry inside of cell phones, laptop computers, power tools, etc.
For Electric Vehicles, partnered with manufacturer Chargetek to produce rapid charging stations. With Chargetek, we have completed the design of an electric vehicles charger.
(1) We built an experimental charger and a production sized electric vehicle demonstration charging station.
(2) After successful testing with a major forklift truck manufacturer, we received an endorsement letter and are working with their dealer network for sales development.
(1) Electric automobile charging stations need re-charge times similar to gas refueling, using off the shelf batteries. Our 12 minute time is close while the state of the art is 30 minutes.

(2) Among industrial vehicles, 95% of forklift trucks are forced to swap 1 ton batteries between shifts as fast charging alternatives require about 3.5 hours but regularly overheat and damage the batteries, releasing toxic fumes. We eliminate these problems and enable up to 75% savings for industrial rapid charging and double the revenue for automotive charging stations.
(3) Owners of devices such as cell phones, laptops, and power tools are often stranded waiting several hours to recharge. Our 12 minute recharge can solve that problem from a 110 volt outlet.
Markets: (1) 2012 Worldwide Device Sales included 1.7 Billion Cell Phones, according to IDC and 195 Million notebook computers in 2011 (waiting for 2012 data), according to ResearchInChina.com.

(2) 503,681 electric forklifts were shipped worldwide in 2011, according to the Industrial Truck Association and Modern Materials Handling expects 820,000 in 2014. There are about 5 million electric forklift trucks in the world, an existing potential market value of $15 billion for our rapid chargers and $2.46 billion per year.

(3) There will be an $8.1 billion Global Electric Vehicle Charging Station market by 2014 according to TechNavio. Pike Research forecasts 1.5 million charging locations in the United States by 2017, 7.7 million locations worldwide and 150,000 fast charging stations.

column2: Devices such as Cell Phones, Laptops, Power Tools, etc.

column1: Elliott Small, President and Chief Technology Officer. Responsible for the development and testing of several of rapid battery charging prototypes, participating in procurement of parts, oversight of the engineers that constructed the chargers, modifications of the charging algorithm, and conducting testing of the charger at commercial locations. Developer of high end electric car conversion
column2: director of Commerce Department funded Technology Commercialization Center in Washington, DC

column1: Lou Josephs, Manufacturing Partner. CEO and founder of Chargetek, a battery charger manufacturer and an electrical engineering graduate of the University of Illinois/ Urbana/Champagne. Lou was a power electronics engineer design consultant for 18 years prior to launching Chargetek. He has designed the power systems and is currently the chief architect for all of Chargetek’s new products.

","(http://potentialdifference.com) Potential Difference is an electrical phrase that is the definition of voltage, and the logo is the symbol for voltage. Elliott chose it because the words can also imply making a difference for science, technology, or the environment.

We seek your help in providing our patented ultra-fast battery charger technology to charger manufacturers. Those manufacturers will then provide to you products that recharge your ordinary off the shelf batteries in minutes without overheating: batteries used in your environmentally friendly electric cars or cell phones, cameras, power tools, toys, model cars and airplanes, and other consumer electronics. Dramatically faster charging will even be available for forklift trucks and other industrial electric vehicles. For your help, we are providing the perks in the list on the right.

Exciting New Development! Much earlier than expected, our manufacturing partner, Chargetek, Inc. (http://www.chargetek.com) will work with us to develop a programmable microcontroller chip that will be available to charger manufacturers before the end of the year. We expect the first prototype chips to be finished this summer. At that time, charger manufacturers will have the opportunity contract with us for microcontroller chips or for our charging algorithm to be installed on their own chips.

Therefore, rather than receiving chargers from our company or Chargetek, Indiegogo campaign contributors who want fast chargers will be added to the top of the list to receive them from a manufacturer that will use our technology to make fast chargers.

Our company, Potential Difference, Inc. has an exclusive license from the Georgia Institute of Technology for two rapid battery charging patents to charge lithium ion batteries in minutes without overheating: 70% state of charge in 10 minutes, 80% in 12 minutes, and 100% in 16 minutes. With more tweaking, we expect to even further reduce the charge time. See more test details near the end of this page.
Our success with this campaign can also affect the environment as we have successfully tested it on the lead acid battery chemistry used for electric vehicles and solar and wind power battery backup.

column68:
>Looking for new cases for your new iPad Pro? 

Look No further! 

Since 2006 SwitchEasy have been working on new ways to protect your electronic devices. With the newly announce iPad Pro we tend to believe early adopters such as you would want to get the Smart Keyboard and Apple Pencil. 

With that in mind, our team invented a brand new product which will greatly compliment your user experience with your new gear.

Introducing CoverBuddy, the best case which offers you the best protection experience for your iPad Pro.

CoverBuddy is unlike any case in the market which consists of a simple flat back. It compliments Smart Keyboard and Apple Pencil seamlessly and offers an all-in-one convenience which no other cases will have in the market. CoverBuddy is also the world's first case for iPad Pro which offers interchangeable parts for multiple user scenarios. 


Ultra Slim form Factor

CoverBuddy is designed for users who doesn't want to carry bulk but wants full protection. Made with super strong Polycarbonate at 1.5mm thickness, it's strong enough to protect, yet thin enough to get unnoticed!

column1:
Textured Finishing for great grip

CoverBuddies are designed with a non-slip textured surface. This is to ensure that every time you hold your iPad, you will have good grip to it. As a bonus, the pencil holder (when attached with Apple Pencil) is a great handle for you to hold on to your large iPad.
CoverBuddy is designed with special cut-out area to seamlessly fit your Smart Keyboard. It's also compatible with Apple's Smart Cover.

Never lose your Apple Pencil or Cap!

CoverBuddy offers the world's first patent pending interchangeable FULL BODY Apple Pencil holder. The design is minimalistic and smart, and its created to blend in with your iPad Pro. Unlike a pencil loop or a stand, our pencil holder covers the whole lot including the easily removed pencil cap. Furthermore, operation of our pencil holder is super easy! You can slide your pencil in either way into the holder and it magically stays put in the cavity. To release the pencil, simply push the pencil through the middle opening of the holder and gently slide left or right. As a bonus, our pencil holder works equally well when detached, offering 360 degree protection for your Apple Pencil.  


Sketch Board Mode

With the announcement of iPad Pro, we've figured that there is one user mode that's missing. We call it the ""Sketch Board"" mode. A small elevated angle is introduced when our pencil holder is attached to CoverBuddy. The result is an ergonomically perfect elevation for drawing with Apple Pencil or using the virtual keyboard. Now you can sketch with ease!


Pencil charging with ease

Sometimes your Apple Pencil may be running out of juice, but a 15 second charge can power it for 30 minutes. CoverBuddy has special cut-out area designed to let your Apple Pencil charge with ease.



Two for One

Didn't want to bring your Apple Pencil out today? No problem, our Apple Pencil holder can be easily detached and be replaced with our included faceplate. It can also be used independently to protect your pencil and cap. With our faceplate attachment, our case will be flat as a book and your iPad Pro can be on its way!
Here are some sample photos of our mock up models tested for it's usability .

column2: >For $25 dollars Early Founder's Special pledge, you'll get to pick one of our CoverBuddies available in Translucent | Translucent Black | White

column3: >For $35 dollars Founder's Club Pledge, you'll get one (1) of our limited edition Firehouse Red CoverBuddy. They're great for the holiday season!
> For $50 dollars Founder's Buddy Pledge, you'll get one (1) of our limited edition Firehouse Red CoverBuddy plus one (1) CoverBuddy of your choice of Translucent / Translucent Black / White.

What is Rose City Soccer Press (RCSP)?

Rose City Soccer Press is a website/blog dedicated to covering soccer in Oregon, with a primary focus on the Portland Timbers and Portland Thorns.
• RCSP was founded in 2013 as a hobby of owner Anthony Thurston.
• RCSP is contributed to by fans and journalists alike.
• RCSP is the only outlet to release full length postgame and practice interview videos with Thorns coaches and players.

We are growing fast! In the first 5 months of this year RCSP has already doubled our entire traffic total from 2013 and traffic continues to rise. But, following events from last night, that growth, and the future of the site is in jeopardy.

Why RCSP Needs Your Help...

On the night of May 24th, following the Thorns disappointing loss to Sky Blue, I (Anthony) was driving home when my van overheated and broke down. Long story short, it ended up being a $450 towing bill to get home (I live in Independence and drive to Portland for games/practices), and that will not even cover whatever repair costs are needed (could be another $300+ if my father in laws over the phone diagnosis is correct). 

This is the second time in the last year that one of my vehicles has left me stranded on the side of I-5 on the way to or from covering the Timbers/Thorns. The effects of this go beyond my ability to go to games/practices though, as the $$ hit is now threatening my ability to pay for my site hosting and writers.
• I currently pay $30 a month for web hosting
• I currently pay roughly $100 a month to contributors of the site
• I currently spend from $50-$100 a week on gas/parking driving to and from Portland (usually 2 trips each week, one practice and one game).

Now, to put this all in perspective. I am a freelance writer that writes about photography, and I make $1200 on a good month. All of the expenses that you saw above are paid for out of pocket by me because this is something that I love to do. That said, all of those expenses above total between $400 and $500 a month, approaching half of my income. 
Anyone that knows me will agree when I say, I am not one to ask for help. In fact I find the fact that I am posting this campaign a little embarrassing. I like to take care of myself and handle my own messes. But in this case, if I want to keep doing what I love I will need some help. 

How Your Contribution Will Help...

Your contribution today will help in a variety of ways, but mostly it will help me offset the costs of my tow and any repair costs (or god forbid, vehicle replacement) so that I can afford to keep the site online. 

Your contributions will allow me to continue to...
• Stay current on payments to my contributors
• Continue to record and produce full postgame and practice interviews like the one you see below (from last night).

Other Ways You Can Help

Obviously, not all of you can afford to contribute, times are tough. But you can still help me out by:
• Share this campaign on your social networks
• Pass my site along to businesses who may be willing to advertise or become a sponsor of the site. (email me at anthony@rosecitysoccerpress.com for inquiries)

And that's all there is to it. I appreciate you taking the time to check this out and hope to find the support necessary to keep the site going.

Who I am

My name is Donald (I go by my middle name Matt) and I'm a 28 year old senior software/web engineer.  I have a wife and a beautiful 2 year old daughter.  I been writing software and creating websites for over 12 years back since Aol 2.5 days.  I currently own my own business which is really successful (surefiretaxes.com) and have developed it into a very profitable company.  I'm all about simplifying idea's and concepts to make life easier for the common person.

How I came up with the idea

This device came to mind when I bought my first Bluetooth Piece. After wearing it for a while I wondered where to put it.  I knew I could just put it in my pocket, but I wondered why there wasn't a way to just attach it to my phone for easy storage.  After doing some research I was surprised to find that nothing like this existed!  After creating a very primitive prototype in my head I wondered if this would really be a good idea.

Here is an image of the very first physical drawing that I produced regarding this invention.

After getting everything down on paper I tried my best to create a prototype and I came up with a successful ""bare bones"" version (as seen in the video) that worked surprisingly well!  I took it on a trip with me to Georgia and I was able to use it very easily all the time.  It stayed safely attached to my phone while it was in my pocket and everything.

You can also have multiple copies of my product to have one in your car for permanent storage for when your driving! So you can easily move it between your phone and your storage hook inside your car!  Or even on your Desk at work!  You can use this product multiple times and can never have too many!

We currently have Patents and everything regarding the invention. We are wanting to be able to get a 3D render created for mass production. We are also wanting to be able to ""innovate"" the concept and add the ""Spring Action"" motion so its not an ""open hook"" it is a type of ""Circle Spring Hook"" or some people call it a ""Circle Carabiner"" which we displayed in the Concept image in the video.

We also want to be able to customize it so it doesn't look so ""plain"" if people want to have something more personalized etc.  We want people to be able to put family photos and friendly photos on their customized version of our product.  We also want them to have preset design options as well such our KickStarter donator versions.

Soon as we are able to get the funding we are excited to get moving on the product as soon as possible!  We fill this will help a ton of people not only preventing them from losing their current Bluetooth's and buying more, but also stay away from ""johnny law"" and those expensive Tickets for breaking the law in their states.

I am wanting to start production as soon as funding is made available.  My plans are to get a full 3D Render created to submit off to a project production company here in Indiana to start producing the product.  I currently plan on getting my wife involved in helping me get production and shipping organized and developed.  We plan on doing web sales at first to our Kickstarter backers before pushing to get the product to be placed on shelves.

All of the customization imaging that we are offering to our Kickstarter backers will be done manually by myself and my wife.  We want to make sure that your product is fully personalized.  We are expecting to have all our initial shipments to our Kickstarter backers shipped out within 3-4 months after getting fully funded.  We have this expectation because we already have the production company selected and ready to go we just need funding.  I appreciate all the feedback and look forward to the generous donations!

Risks and challenges

As with any Product Design the Risk is getting people to want to use the product. We feel that this is a strong product and people will buy it since it will be very cheap and efficient and won't break easily.

Another main risk is that our prototype is very simple compared to our goal. However the overall unit price for the new design is extremely low and isn't a game changer.

Some unique challenges we might face is getting the adhesive company and Circle Carabiner (Circle Spring Hook) designs that are versions we are wanting to incorporate into our final design. However, we do have plan B's and C's to use a more standardized look and other options to use for the adhesive potion. These other plans would be a little bit more expensive to create on a per-unite basis, but nothing significant just a small difference of around .40 cents per unit.

This would be temporary until the original company's we are in talks with decide to get fully on board when they see the potential of the product, then we are confident they will change their mind.

Our mission is to finally fix this problem by creating a portable charger that charges insanely fast from a wall socket. How fast? ASAP Dash charges up to 16x faster than standard power banks in the market today.
Our patented fast charge technology puts us miles ahead of the nearest competition both in charge speed and size of the charger allowing you always be on-the-go. It's the first charger in the world to give you a whole weekend of charge to carry around that's pocket sized!

column2: >If you're familiar with crowdfunding websites you've seen many fast chargers power banks launching in the past year, here's a comparison chart showing ASAP Dash's stand out features.
>For all all customer service inquiries please email hello@chargeasap.com and the Customer Happiness Team will respond within 48 business hours
>All competitor information has been collected from the latest publicly available campaign or website pages and is correct as of the date of campaign launch.

column1: ASAP (an acronym/abbreviation/slang) means ""As Soon As Possible"", which is how fast you can now be on the go with your smartphone.

column2: >Unlike other rapid charge chargers which have a tiny capacity (under 2,000 mAh), ASAP Dash stores an incredible 5,000mAh keeping your phone going for more than 48 hrs.

column1: PLEASE NOTE: ASAP Dash charges in 15 minutes, not your phone.
Check out how much power ASAP Dash can store in as little as 5 minutes:
""mAh"" refers to the battery capacity of your phone. Samsung phones have a larger capacity than iPhone and hence will typically last longer.

column4: >Most portable chargers take FOREVER to charge, we've all been there waiting up to 10 hours to power them up, keeping you stuck to the wall and defeats the purpose of portable power.

column1: ASAP Dash features an amazingly slim and sleek anodized aluminum shell. We've really stripped down the charger and removed the unnecessary features to give you one of the thinnest high capacity chargers you've ever seen. Don't be fooled by the sleek profile as it does pack a punch of battery power!

The ASAP Dash not only works with all Iphone and Android devices, it is also compatible with all USB devices. Most phone chargers or power banks are only capable of outputting 2.1 Amps. We're already preparing for the future phones that accept a larger input, the ASAP Dash comes with a 2.4 Amp output. This makes it compatible with all iPad's and tablets.
The high output also means your iPhone will charge 2x faster than your standard wall charger (1 Amp).
You can also charge your iPad at the max speed of 2.4 Amp vs most wall chargers and power banks which only charge at 2.1 Amps.
PLEASE NOTE: ASAP Dash charges in 15 minutes, not your phone.
Have you ever used an old phone or laptop after charging it to 100% and it seems to run out FAST? It's because you've likely exceeded the battery life cycle.

Standard batteries today typically offer 100 - 300 cycles whilst premium battery packs can last up to 500 cycles (based on ideal conditions). Typically charging a battery at a higher than recommended wattage will result in it heating up (even exploding) or reducing its life cycle.

column4: >By using advanced battery technology, ASAP Dash solves this conventional problem with fast charge speeds and a

column1: This means most batteries when used 7 days a week will only last 1 year whilst ASAP Dash will last 3+ years even when used 7 days a week. Finally a reliable charger that lasts!
What makes ASAP Dash charge up so fast is the patented protection circuit board (PCB) that has been engineered with both smaller and fewer parts.

Our unique PCB (pictured above) is able to accept higher than standard wattage (60W) with a much higher energy conversion speed that results in a quicker charge despite a lower wattage input than competitors.

The result of a higher energy conversion speed is a much smaller adapter vs other fast charger brands, 40%+ lighter. With an adapter that's only 150g, that's light enough to fit in most pockets or bags for all your adventures.
ASAP Dash units are put through a rigorous series of tests to ensure we're able to secure our international certifications. Some are outlined below.

column4: >ASAP Dash units are placed inside a temperature chamber that mimics hot and cold weather conditions. They are put through extremes of -15°C to 60°C and tested after to still be in perfect working condition.

column1: Chargers are repeatedly charged to 100% then drained to 0% to ensure the batteries are at perfect working capacity.

ASAP Dash comes with international drop test certification. This means ASAP Dash can be dropped from a height of 1 metre (3.28ft) onto any side of the unit onto a hard wooden surface repeatedly and will still be 100% functional.

We've gone the extra mile to ensure your ASAP Dash is a light as possible, so we're proud to be one of the first crowdfunding campaigns to offer our wall sockets in 4 different wall types, so you won't need to purchase a travel adaptor to use in your own country. You can choose from 1 of the 4 most popular international wall socket types below.

The idea of ASAP Dash first came when founder Vinson Leow, a frequent world traveller, decided he could no longer cope with always being low on phone battery especially at the most inconvenient times such as using the GPS or catching an Uber. This lead to the Chargeasap brand being born in 2016. Today's solution of portable phone chargers solved this, however presented a new problem: they either take 2 - 4 hrs to charge but hold too little capacity or hold enough capacity but take 6 - 8 hrs to charge. The solution is a charger that can charge most smartphones 100%, fits into any pocket and charges in 15 - 18 minutes . With over 10,000 hrs of research and development into cutting edge battery and protection circuit board technology we've created our revolutionary surge charging technology.
We're a team of designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs across Australia and United States who've worked together the last 2 years to bring this vision to life.

column4: >With the latest ground breaking technology, cutting edge design and experienced suppliers with 15+ years in the electronics industry, we ensure safety, quality and portability.

column1: We wanted to share ASAP Dash with the Indiegogo community here first because of the strong community of creatives, innovators and early adopters. With your help not only will you help kickstart the next generation of batteries and change the world's expectations of charging speeds, you'll bring us one step closer to furthering future applications of this technology. Imagine a world with unlimited battery power, living life unplugged and always on-the-go. Help us bring the fast charge battery revolution today!

column1: Why would I buy ASAP Dash over any other charger?
column2:
>If you don't like waiting for your phone to charge, then this is for you. Best yet, not only are we the fastest portable charger on the market, we are the only pocket-sized fast charger above 4,000mAh capacity

When is ASAP Dash expected to ship?
column3:
>ASAP Dash is scheduled to ship June 2016.

How will my order be shipped?
column4:
>We will be shipping with the most suitable premium courier and that will vary between countries. All shipments will have tracking which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped.

Which countries do you ship to?
column5: >We ship to all countries excluding the following which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria &amp
column6:
Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.

Will I need to pay any VAT or import tax?
column7: >We will be shipping from Australia, Unites States or United Kingdom. Hence for countries that accept shipments from these countries VAT or tax free there are no additional duties or taxes.

column1: Will the ASAP Dash charge my iPhone in 5 minutes?
column2:
>No, there are two steps involved with using portable phone chargers to charge your iPhone on-the-go. 
Step 1: Charge the portable charger 
Step 2: Charge the iPhone. 
1) The ASAP Dash charges up incredibly fast. In just 5 minutes, the ASAP Dash stores enough power to charge an iPhone 5 from 0 - 100%. 
2) This step is where you use the ASAP Dash to charge your iPhone. A complete iPhone recharge from the ASAP Dash usually takes 60 - 90 min. The ASAP Dash has a built-in smart chip which detects devices and charge them at their maximum rate (3.1A / 5V).

Can I charge ASAP Dash whilst charging my phone?
column3:
>ASAP Dash does not offer simultaneous charging as it would increase excess heat with the surge charging technology. Instead, just wait 15 minutes and you'll be able to charge on-the-go.

What is the battery life of the ASAP Dash?
column4:
>Under ideal circumstances the ASAP Dash will charge and discharge over 1200 times which is 4x the average 300 cycles most charges provide today.

How long will the ASAP Dash stay charged?
column5:
>Lithium polymer batteries have internal self-discharge that is dependent on external environmental conditions such as heat. Stored at room temperature, the ASAP Dash will loss 5% of its charge after 1 week and 30% every month. It is recommended to charge ASAP Dash for at least 5 minutes if left unused for more than 1 week.

Does the ASAP Dash come with international warranty?
column6:
>Yes, all ASAP Dash orders will come with an international 365 day warranty.

Does ASAP Dash come with a big wall charger?
column7:
>Heck no, unlike other fast charger brands where their technology has restricted users to bulky wall charger units making them impractical for travel, ASAP Dash's charger unit is a mere 150g (5.3oz), light enough for you to carry on any trip.

How many times can ASAP Dash full charge my smart phone?
column8:
>This depends on the battery capacity of your smart phone. ASAP Dash has a capacity of 5000 mAh, which is 2 - 3 times the capacity of most smart phones today. However please note that this is not a direct comparison, for a detailed understanding please visit this link.

Can ASAP Dash damage my phone over long term use?
column9:
>No. Your phone will act as if it is connected to a standard wall power outlet via your conventional charger and will not affect your existing phone warranty.

Have you considered adding Qualcomm Quick Charge (QC2.0 or 3.0) technology?
column10:
>We've looked into this and there are 2 reasons we haven't included it: Firstly adding the QC technology will make the ASAP Dash at least 25% larger and we did not want to sacrifice the lightness or portability. Secondly the QC technology would increase the price of the ASAP Dash and we're aiming to keep it as the best value fast charger on the market.

How important is Qualcomm Quick Charge compatibility in considering buying my power bank?
column11:
>If you are buying a new phone in 2016 the answer is NONE AT ALL. This is because all new phones released from 2016 onwards will use a USB Type-C connector instead of Lightning or Android connector which is FASTER than QC technology and hence will no longer be needed.

How important is the output current (Amps)?
column12: >VERY important- many competitors will mislead you and give you their total output from more than 1 connector. This is very false as 3 x 1 Amps outputs means 3 phones can only charge at a max of 1 Amp at a time. Our connector charges at 3.1 Amps (over 3 times faster) which is required for iPads, tablets and all current and future phones which will use a USB Type-C connector. Look out for only 3.1 Amps output chargers and power banks if you are buying a phone from 2016 onwards as it will otherwise not charge your phone at its max speed.

column1: Which USB devices are compatible with the ASAP Dash?
column2:
>The ASAP Dash has the ability to charge all USB devices including: iPhones, Android phones, Windows phones, iPads, Android Tablets, GoPros, Bluetooth headphones and the list goes on. We are also USB Type-C compatible.

Does the dual USB cable charge all USB devices?
column3:
>The dual micro USB and lightning cable will charge all USB devices that are compatible with those 2 inputs. If your USB device does not accept these inputs you will simply need to use your existing cable to plug from the ASAP Dash into your USB device.

Can I charge the ASAP Dash from a regular USB wall or car USB outlet?
column4:
>You can charge the ASAP Dash in the following ways: 
(1) To 100% in 15 minutes via the fast wall charger or fast car charger that comes with the ASAP DASH
(2) At regular speed using your current USB wall charger or car USB outlet 

Will the voltage be compatible with my country?
column5: >Our wall charger is compatible with all voltages internationally. You will have the option to choose 1 of 4 international standard wall plugs (Type A, F, G, I.) Please refer to our ""Wall Socket Options"" section to find your country. If your country does not support either type, you may use a travel adapter.

column1: You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.

Please note all sales are final. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. There will be no exchanges or returns for change of mind. In the event your product becomes faulty, please email us hello@chargeasap.com with a description of the issue. Once we assess the issue and are able to determine its a product fault, you'll be able to pay the $7USD reshipping fee for the product(s). We'll then dispatch your replacement order straight away. Please note that if an item has been discontinued, we are no longer able to provide warranty on that item.

If our shipping provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons, there will be a reshipping fee: no-one is available to receive the package, the location is not accessible, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before the delivery dispatch.
If you have any questions please email the Customer Happiness Team on hello@chargeasap.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.

It's the first charger in the world to give you a whole weekend of charge to carry around that's pocket sized!

Most portable chargers take FOREVER to charge, we've all been there waiting up to 10 hours to power them up, keeping you stuck to the wall and defeats the purpose of portable power.

ASAP Dash features an amazingly slim and sleek anodized aluminum shell. We've really stripped down the charger and removed the unnecessary features to give you one of the thinnest high capacity chargers you've ever seen. Don't be fooled by the sleek profile as it does pack a punch of battery power!

The ASAP Dash not only works with all Iphone and Android devices, it is also compatible with all USB devices. Most phone chargers or power banks are only capable of outputting 2.1 Amps. You can also charge your iPad at the max speed of 2.4 Amp vs most wall chargers and power banks which only charge at 2.1 Amps.

Have you ever used an old phone or laptop after charging it to 100% and it seems to run out FAST? It's because you've likely exceeded the battery life cycle.

Standard batteries today typically offer 100 - 300 cycles whilst premium battery packs can last up to 500 cycles (based on ideal conditions). Typically charging a battery at a higher than recommended wattage will result in it heating up (even exploding) or reducing its life cycle.
By using advanced battery technology, ASAP Dash solves this conventional problem with fast charge speeds and a 1,200 battery life cycle, that's 4x the industry standard.
This means most batteries when used 7 days a week will only last 1 year whilst ASAP Dash will last 3+ years even when used 7 days a week. Finally a reliable charger that lasts!
What makes ASAP Dash charge up so fast is the patented protection circuit board (PCB) that has been engineered with both smaller and fewer parts.

The result of a higher energy conversion speed is a much smaller adapter vs other fast charger brands, 40%+ lighter. With an adapter that's only 150g, that's light enough to fit in most pockets or bags for all your adventures.
ASAP Dash units are put through a rigorous series of tests to ensure we're able to secure our international certifications. Some are outlined below.

ASAP Dash units are placed inside a temperature chamber that mimics hot and cold weather conditions. They are put through extremes of -15°C to 60°C and tested after to still be in perfect working condition.
Chargers are repeatedly charged to 100% then drained to 0% to ensure the batteries are at perfect working capacity.

ASAP Dash comes with international drop test certification. This means ASAP Dash can be dropped from a height of 1 metre (3.28ft) onto any side of the unit onto a hard wooden surface repeatedly and will still be 100% functional.

Type A: USA, Canada, Mexico & Japan
Type F: Europe & Russia, except for the UK & Ireland
Type G: United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus & Singapore
Type I: Australia, New Zealand, China & Argentina

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology ""Quick Charge 2.0"".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

column1: We are already working on the tooling and production of Wizician to meet our obligation to the Apple Stores. This all happened during our MFi PPID review and Apple engineers were blown away as how well Wizician sounded and wanted it in the stores. We are excited!
Come March, you could purchase Wizician from the Apple Store for US$89. Till then you could purchase Wizician for $59 with free shipping to the US and Australia

For those that asked how Wizician amplifies and improves the sound, we have added a video in the gallery. Please take a look. We also hit the streets asking a few people to compare listening to their music with Wizician and here what they said.
Meet Wizician, the only MFi lightning adapter with built in DAC and AMP and featuring a Lightning input port so you can charge your phone while using your headphones.

Wizician includes a Digital-to-Analogue Converter and Amplifier that is small, light, battery free and connects to your iPhone in seconds via Lightning port and makes any headphones sound amazing with clearer, louder, richer-sounding music and superior bass.

We have selected our MFi certified manufacturer and have been granted a PPID for Wizician, which simply means a preliminary approval based on our prototype and using Apple genuine C68 and C37 lightning charging port, also called a pass-thru charging port. This approval is a big milestone that allows us to certify the final production unit in 2 or 3 weeks.

At one end it has a short cable with an 8-pin lightning connector and on the other a 3.5mm audio jack input where you could plug your headphone or even a speaker and a pass-through charging via lightning so you can charge or sync your mobile device while listening to music. Wizician Plus has an additional Lightning input port so you can plug headphones with either a 3.5mm audio jack or a those with a lightning connector.
<div>Wizician will have 3 control buttons that perform 14 different functions. Volume Controls
column3: pause/play and Siri to name a few.

column1: Many of us have come to rely on our phones as our primary listening devices, they hold thousands of songs and they are easy to use but cramming so many features into one device comes at a cost and that cost is sound quality.

With the release of the newest iPhone, Apple killed the headphone jack. While Apple ships with the iPhone 7 an adaptor so you can plug your existing headphones into the Lightning port, their solution is simply an adapter that does noting to improve the iPhone sound quality and does not allow you to listen, charge and sync your iPhone at the same time.

column3: '>Amp.i.Am on the other hand is not just an adapter, It’s a tiny DAC &amp
column4: Amplifier which can produce the kind of premium quality audio that you expect from hi-end audio equipment used by audiophiles and sound producers.

column1: If you are an iPhone 7 User, you can benefit from Wizician with its amazing DAC &
column2: Amplifier and have the ability to use your favourite headphones with the 3.5mm audio jack and all with an additional port to charge your phone at the same time. iPhone 6, 5, iPad or iPod Users can benefit from listening to better sounding music on their mobile devices.

column1: The high quality components in Wizician will give your music a greater sense of space, enabling you to hear more clearly the separate instruments, voices and melodies. Detail is greater, so the subtle nuances in vocal intonation or the way a note is played can be heard more easily. Grip on the lower frequencies will also be better, so bass notes should sound more tuneful, driving their own rhythm, rather than just being heavy and loud. All of this leads to a more emotionally engaging, and therefore enjoyable experience.

About Taxes 
Different countries have different tax policies. All international duties, taxes, or clearing fees levied by the destination country are not included in the above prices. We have no control over these charges, nor can we predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country
column2: you should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates. If the destination country levies duty or taxes and you refuse to pay your country’s duties your package will be abandoned. If that happens, we can neither ship another package nor issue a refund.

column1: We’ve worked hard over the last few months to get Wizician to this point and we've successfully completed critical milestones including fully working prototypes with the help of many knowledgeable people.

We have interviewed, visited and selected a very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.
Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

All of this leads to a more emotionally engaging, and therefore enjoyable experience.

As smartphone use is ever increasing, we now enjoy

column1: watching videos or video calling using various applications. Holding your device for a long time can lead to discomfort and keep your hands busy.
Chokky has up to 16GB USB memory and its unique design offers a hidden touchpen for your Android or iOS device. It also comes available in 4GB and 8GB as well.

When you need to use it as a USB memory drive or a stand, simply twist it and that's it. This makes it extremely slim and portable when not in use. ","Chokky's unique switch design allows you to use Chokky as a USB flash drive, smartphone stand, AND even a touchpen for your Android or iOS device.
As smartphone use is ever increasing, we now enjoy
watching videos or video calling using various applications. Holding your device for a long time can lead to discomfort and keep your hands busy.

Chokky has up to 16GB USB memory and its unique design offers a hidden touchpen for your Android or iOS device. It also comes available in 4GB and 8GB as well. When you need to use it as a USB memory drive or a stand, simply twist it and that's it. This makes it extremely slim and portable when not in use. The bottom of the drive is lined with rubber to prevent any slippage. When you're watching videos or in a call, just place your smartphone and keep your hands free.
If you're worried about losing your Chokky, don't worry it comes with a hole and strap. You can connect it to your keychain or the strap hole on your smartphone if it has one.
Using the aluminum construction's conductivity, it allows for easy writing on any smartphone screen.
'CHOKKY’ can hold up iPhones, Galaxy series, Optimus, etc.
(Not that depending on the type of case or film you use, your device may be too thick for Chokky.)",10.0,0,"6 Campaigns

A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL THE BACKERS OF THE PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN! THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST AND SUPPORT. IT MEANS A LOT TO US! 

Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency. Jiffy uses the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" This is the fastest technology out at the moment for charging devices.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger and using the new technology ""Quick Charge 2.0"" will assure your device a quick charge that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.
column7:
width=""580"">

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology ""Quick Charge 2.0"".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps. Also watch the first prototype we tested.
column13:
width=""580"">

Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

column1:
The Jeligeo platform, was first developed in 2009, to serve as a geo-located database and smartphone application for  African-American History and Culture. The product was started to answer two main questions:

1. How does a businessperson, parent, or traveler learn more about what impact people of African descent have had in a city?

2. How do cultural institutions, libraries, tourism agencies and operators attract more visitors?

With the expanding ownership of smartphones amongst African-American, Latino, and other cultural/affinity groups, it was felt that new channels were now available to provide rich and interactive heritage and tourism content in the palm of consumer’s hands.

Version 1, known as the iHeritage Guide, was launched as a free iPhone application and was the first of it’s kind on the Apple iStore.  It was available for 19 months and had 6,000 downloads with no marketing spend.  Version 2 saw the development iBlackHeritage.tv, which took the main elements of the iHeritageGuide and brought it to the mobile web.  The new content database featured an ability to incorporate social media components such as YouTube videos, QR code technology, and rich text content on a geo-located database.
After soliciting feedback from users of the two versions, it was decided to embark on the development of Version 3 of the platform, reconfiguring both the content and platform.  More details below...

The team behind Jeligeo has over 30 combined years in global technology and entrepreneurial ventures.  The founder, Samuel Suraphel, envisioned and designed Jeligeo along with co-founder James Harris.  Both have focused their career on developing technology that meets the intersection between emerging cultural, technological trends and business opportunities.
Legal assistance is provided by a leading Silicon Valley law firm and advisors include practitioners in the heritage, digital media, and tourism sectors.
We'd like to extend the team to users like yourself!!

For the relaunch of Jeligeo, we will begin creating a library of curated guides that cover various affinity groups/interests which will be made available within and outside of the application via social media sites, Mp3 audio downloads, the mobile web and on iOS and Android platforms.  Additionally, users will be able interact with curated content via a check-in system similar to foursquare and also be able to submit and rate specific sites.

Our biggest hurdle is connecting with the huge number of city experts who would like to contribute the wealth of heritage found in their hometowns and working with them to organize and upload the information, media, and geolocation onto our platform.  Along with this effort, are the costs of outreach to various groups, such as parents and teachers, to assist them in finding strategic ways to integrate Jeligeo into learning experiences for their children.

The funds will be spent on 50% on tech, 25% content, and 25% outreach.  If we do not reach our target, the funds contributed will be spent on adding further content(i.e. heritage sites) onto the existing platform.

Curator level contributors will receive digital markers to thank them for their contribution on an existing site.  Ambassador level contributors can have a city included on the current Jeligeo African database, that currently is not listed, plus five entries that are designated as national heritage sites by a local historic preservation society.  Gobiz level contributors will be able to have one tablet donated(including Jeligeo app and content) to a school or library of their choice within the US and Canada.

Ras level contributors can be a part of launching additional affinity groups such as Women Heritage, Latino Heritage, etc...  Though not listed as perk, please feel free to touch base through our contact for further information on this option.

The team behind Jeligeo has consistently worked to bring forward our experience to help bridge the pain point found amongst those who seek to connect with their heritage....knowing where it is.  Those who are not scholars or have the benefit of knowing one, are limited in information and time needed to connect and visit such sites.
With Jeligeo, this problem will be solved, providing a one-stop source for heritage data that is accessible anywhere and anytime.
If you can’t contribute, no worries.  Other way you can help, include:
• Helping to spread the word about Jeligeo through your Facebook, Twitter, or other social media channels.
• Referring us to local heritage experts who'd be interested in being curators.

What We Need & What You Get

For the relaunch of Jeligeo, we will begin creating a library of curated guides that cover various affinity groups/interests which will be made available within and outside of the application via social media sites, Mp3 audio downloads, the mobile web and on iOS and Android platforms.  Additionally, users will be able interact with curated content via a check-in system similar to foursquare and also be able to submit and rate specific sites.

Our biggest hurdle is connecting with the huge number of city experts who would like to contribute the wealth of heritage found in their hometowns and working with them to organize and upload the information, media, and geolocation onto our platform.  Along with this effort, are the costs of outreach to various groups, such as parents and teachers, to assist them in finding strategic ways to integrate Jeligeo into learning experiences for their children.

The funds will be spent on 50% on tech, 25% content, and 25% outreach.  If we do not reach our target, the funds contributed will be spent on adding further content(i.e. heritage sites) onto the existing platform.

Curator level contributors will receive digital markers to thank them for their contribution on an existing site.  Ambassador level contributors can have a city included on the current Jeligeo African database, that currently is not listed, plus five entries that are designated as national heritage sites by a local historic preservation society.  Gobiz level contributors will be able to have one tablet donated(including Jeligeo app and content) to a school or library of their choice within the US and Canada.

Ras level contributors can be a part of launching additional affinity groups such as Women Heritage, Latino Heritage, etc...  Though not listed as perk, please feel free to touch base through our contact for further information on this option.

The team behind Jeligeo has consistently worked to bring forward our experience to help bridge the pain point found amongst those who seek to connect with their heritage....knowing where it is.  Those who are not scholars or have the benefit of knowing one, are limited in information and time needed to connect and visit such sites.
With Jeligeo, this problem will be solved, providing a one-stop source for heritage data that is accessible anywhere and anytime.
If you can’t contribute, no worries.  Other way you can help, include:
Helping to spread the word about Jeligeo through your Facebook, Twitter, or other social media channels.
Referring us to local heritage experts who'd be interested in being curators.

Introduction

Talk Yuh Sport Social Networking Web Application will consist of both a web portal
and mobile app which will allow sports fans from around the world to interact
with each other online and share their views, comments, passions and interests
on any sporting topic, issue, game or news as it relates to sports.
the application will allow users to:
using either a username or password created by registering on the web application
or by using their own Facebook and Twitter Credentials.
and customise their own social networking profiles which will be used as a mode
which local sports topics, issues, games or news is available for commenting on
images and videos while attending local sporting events for other online users
to view and comment on (copyright infringements will not be tolerated).
friends and sporting fans who have similar interests or share the same passion
for certain sports as part of a customised friends list.

As this application is web-based, the following technologies may be used in its design:

1) Web Server – Web server is responsible for serving web pages, mostly HTML pages, via the HTTP protocol to clients. The Web server sends out web pages in response to requests from browsers. A page request is generated when a client clicks a link on a web page in the browser.

2) HTTP - Hyper Text Transport Protocol is the communication protocol used to connect to servers on the World Wide Web. The primary function of HTTP is to establish a connection with a Web server and transmit HTML pages to the user's browser.

3) JDBC – Java Database Connectivity is an application program interface (API) specification for connecting programs written in Java to the data in popular databases. The application program interface lets you encode access request statements in structured query language (SQL) that are then passed to the program that manages the database. It returns the results through a similar interface.

4) XML - A programming language/specification developed by the W3C, for organizing and tagging elements of a document so that the document can be transmitted and interpreted between applications and organisations.

For the application to be designed successfully, several stages of development may be required:

1) Initial Design - conceptualizing how the app may initially look

  • Figuring out and sketching what the screens may look like, describing how they will behave, etc.

  • Deciding what graphical design and art work will be necessary for the user interface.

  • Deciding what kind of back end server support the app will require.


2) App Development – once the design is finalized, actual development on the application will begin.


3) Testing – once the application is fully implemented, beta testing will begin. Generally, at this stage, end users will be selected to perform testing to discover any bugs and problems.


4) Deployment – making the application available to the general public.


5) Maintenance – users may encounter problems which may not have been detected during testing. Also, more modules and features may be added as time progresses.

While it can be argued that there are many other social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter which do the same thing, these are general purpose, international social networks. They are not geared towards sports alone. Put simply, Talk Yuh Sport is a niche based social network for Sports Fans around the world to share their views, comments, passions and interests on any sporting topic, issue, game or news as it relates to sports.
2) App Development (Android, BlackBerry, Iphone, Windows) - $2000 USD

5) Marketing Campaigns - $2000
