The application guides the user through a few steps of key clicks on the old remote directed towards KLIKR. The learning process takes around one minute. We use data base codes however for some video streaming devices (such as Apple TV) as these devices are extremely common. We also use data base codes for air conditioners, as these appliances operate with complex strings of infrared codes, which cannot be learnt.What if my air conditioner code is not listed in KLIKR database?   We believe that our database lists a large selection of most air conditioners models on the market, covering the top 20 brand names and growing. If your air conditioner is not included in the list, please write to us through the App or through our website.What if I have lost my old remote control?   KLIKR is not meant to replace your old remotes but to enhance your user experience when controlling home devices. Still you can use KLIKR to replace a lost streaming device or air conditioner infrared remote control.What types of remote controlled devices cannot be operated with KLIKR?   KLIKR works with devices which receive infrared signals. This excludes remote controlled garage doors and car doors, whose remote controls function with radio frequency (RF).   How do I share my KLIKR with family and friends?   Once you and another person have downloaded the mobile application, through our share feature you can generate a QR code (Quick Response code, or optical readable matrix bar code) from the home screen in the application, which the recipient can scan with the inbuilt QR code receiver also in the home screen. You can choose to share device controls by rooms, or for the whole house. In effect, sharing all your home remote controls takes a few seconds.How does the smart feature work?   When you receive a phone call, KLIKR will automatically MUTE or PAUSE any controlled device equipped with these features, and will resume the device’s normal function once the phone call is ended. The smart feature can be set to default through the Settings section of the app.How does the voice control work?   You can use the voice control button from most screens in the application. It requires 3 parameters: the action, the device name and the room in which the device is located. Sometimes, up to 2 of these parameters can be inferred by the application. For instance, if you only have one TV in your house, saying, “Turn on the TV” will be sufficient. If you are already using the TV remote control, the “Volume up” command will be enough to increase the volume on your TV. Generally, KLIKR is designed with an intelligent algorithm, which will best interpret your commands based on your location, your registered devices as well as the control screen that you use.  So far the voice control supports English but more languages are coming soon.What happens when I get a new mobile phone?   You can save your codes on the cloud. When you get a new phone, you just log into your account from the application, and all your rooms and devices are still there for you to control, in the same way as before.How long does my KLIKR battery last?   KLIKR is equipped with a battery, which can provide up to eight months of standby mode. Depending on the intensity of the usage with your device, you can operate KLIKR for around four to six months. We have calculated that for an average of 100 clicks per day, you will be able to use KLIKR for around 160 days. That means that a KLIKR used on an air conditioner will usually last up to 6 to 8 months, while a KLIKR used on a television set will probably last around 4 to 5 months. Once the battery is depleted you can simply change the battery and your KlikR will continue to work as usual.How do I change the battery?   You can change the battery inside KLIKR just by sliding open the battery door on the top of the KLIKR cover, pulling out the battery tray, and putting a new standard cell battery inside.Do I have to manually reconnect to my devices?   No. The application remembers the unique ID of the KLIKR. It automatically and almost instantly reconnects you when you come within range of KLIKR, provided your smartphone Bluetooth is set to ON.Should I be concerned about the Bluetooth impact on my smartphone battery consumption?   No. The latest smartphones use Bluetooth 4.0, which uses very little battery.What are my smartphone requirement to use Klikr?Syncing to mobile devices requires Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology, iPhone 4S and later models, or leading Android phones.",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

substantially different from the existing concepts and designs within
this category. It is a novel, multipurpose device, and its
versatility exceeds that of any other opener currently available on
the market. It is a tool with which you will be able to open wine
bottles, beer bottles, champagne bottles, soft drink bottles, food
cans, tins, jars, medicine bottles, ampoules, paint cans and sealed
plastic bags. Also, the apparatus is wittingly appealing - it

idea came to me a few years ago, when my wife and I were at a
friend’s garden party. Throughout the evening I kept noticing that
hosts and guests were looking for different openers. I also noticed
that the gadgets not only had limited functionality, but they were
not easy to find. A night or two later while I was lying in bed, I
had an imaginative flash. As you know, ideas can visit you not only
when you are taking a shower. The bright light of the morning did not
kill the idea – just in the contrary – imbedded it in my mind.
Its seed started to grow, expanding in shape and size – a
multifunctional tool, designed to open “everything” - bank
accounts being an exception, obviously. I also wanted this opener to
perfectly connect the 3Fs (form, fit, function) and bring excitement,
surprise, fun and satisfaction to demanding customers. For more than
a year I felt like a pregnant man, carrying the idea everywhere and
thinking about it all the time when I wasn't in the office.

you can’t donate, how else can you help? 

If
you are not ready to pledge money, please pledge your support: share

via Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Instagram, Reddit and good old
fashioned email. Share it often - once a week or so. This helps a lot
because every time someone visits my indiegogo page, comments or
shares it, the campaign keeps trending.

do you plan to deliver the perks? 

All
perks (with the exception of the real product - which will be
distributed when manufactured), will be delivered within a month of
contribution received - a link will be sent to the same email address
the contribution was made from, and regardless of whether or not the
project reaches its funding target. This is how I would like to say
THANK YOU to all the people who reached across oceans and borders to

give me a hand.

column2:
>What is the 3D SNAP™?

 3D SNAP ™ has been designed by the innovative German design company Atomare, to be a wearable, go anywhere, water resistant (1500M), 35,000ft unpressurised (Airborne), fully wireless 4K '4D' action camera Array.

Wireless camera arrays are based around a similar principle to Pelican Imaging's Pi Cam Array concept (please see PI's video below)
column7:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

with the exception that ours consist of 4.6K individual laser etched photonic tubes, surrounded by DFB Quantum Casade lasers thereby enabling the capture of still images and video in 3D, through up to '4K' in almost total darkness and even under water.

There is a PERK option to purchase additional phased wireless lens arrays.

Whether you are an extreme sports person, skier, mountain biker, horse rider, white water rafter, canoeist, mountain climber, skateboarder, parachutist, athlete,windsurfer, scuba diver, life-logger or techie, whatever your activity (s) 3D SNAP™ has been designed for you
column11:
/>


3D SNAP™ has been designed to empower you. No longer do you have to focus, point and shoot - the onboard sensors (lasers and inertial movement - 9 degrees of freedom 3x Gyroscope, 3x Magnetometer, 3x Accelerometer &
column12: Barometric Pressure Sensor) automatically record your motion and direction and start recording with the press of one oversized button - the only button there is!
column15:
>Simple.

You simply secure  3D SNAP™ on your hand between your fingers, or alternatively use any of the revolutionary nano suction securing (multi use) mechanisms supplied. 

To put it simply - so long as you have a clear patch of clothing, skin, helmet etc then you can mount the camera lens array there.

No glue, no complicated fixing mechanisms - just press, twist and go!

If you have opted to purchase additional 4K '4D' wireless lens arrays (up to a system maximum of 4 in total), then carefully place the additional wireless lens arrays anywhere on your body or equipment.


And very powerful.

Taking a leaf out of NASA's book 3D SNAP™ will use a 32-bit RTOS ( (µC/OS-III) Micrium platform, NASA's choice for the SAM (Sample Analysis at Mars) on the Rover Curiosity.


The 3D SNAP™ App will come in iOS, Windows and Android versions - tablet and mobile handset.

The 3D SNAP™ uses Cota™ wireless charging that can recharge both the 4K '4D' SNAP™ Camera System as well as up to 4 additional wireless lens arrays concurrently - whilst in use or switched off for recharging up to 30ft away all without any wires whatsoever - truly wireless!

Each 3D SNAP™ Camera System comes with 512GB built-in '3D' memory and each associated wireless lens array will come with 512GB '3D' Memory (enough storage for a day’s worth of movies and high-speed photography. Capture 60Mbps video , for example, and you could theoretically keep going for almost 19 hours so there is little chance of you
column16: >avoiding losing that split second fantastic action shot!

column1: In its simplest form the 3D SNAP™
column2: > system consists of a Lens Array, a touch sensitive flexible high definition OLED display and an Main Control Unit all secured on a total 3 direction flexible memory clear polymer band.

column1:
High-tech ceramic Lens Array Case

A blend of zirconium and yttrium oxides subjected to high pressure at a temperature in excess of 2000°C, this high-tech ceramic is then ground using special diamond crystal tipped tools to shape the removeable phased Array lens case. It features a titanium cage with bevelled, drawn, polished and ruthenium-coated edges. providing for peerless resistance and stability for anything that your sport can throw at it!

Lens Array

In an insect, each ommatidium (Small Eye) in the compound eye has a corneal lens, a crystalline cone and a light-sensitive organ at its base. The ommatidia work in unison to build a picture of the world.

Our Ommatidium - small Eyes Consists of 4.6K individual laser etched photonic tubes, each with its own lens at one end and a photodetector at the other, providing for a true 160 degrees field of view.

This whole arrangement is engineered to a hemispherical shape to give a 160-degree field of vision and surrounded by DFB Quantum Casade lasers.

 The benefit of this arrangement is that they show remarkable depth of field - they can focus on objects at different distances at the same time and space, enabling the capture of still images and video in 3D, through up to '4K' in almost total darkness and even under water (1500M certified).

They also do not suffer from the aberrations seen in single lens systems when viewing off-axis objects such as the huge distortion observed in wide-angle camera lenses such as the fish-eye.

column2: >The main control unit consist of a flexible polymer casing complete with a high definition flexible touchscreen (with gloved fingers) OLED Display (you see what the cameras see), a '3D' flexible battery, 512GB built in '3D' memory, the main processing unit and associated electronics.

column1: There is only one button and simple rotary dial allowing users to quickly setup the 3D SNAP™,or alternatively using the software App on your phone/tablet
When rotated the dial brings up simple graphics on the flexible OLED display which with a single touch makes the required settings for you.
Alternatively, users can switch to Auto and let the system chose the optimum settings for you.
The rotary dial and button are made from the same materials as the lens case thereby ensuring strength and reliability no matter what you throw at it!

column2: >comes as standard supporting WiFi 802.11 ac MIMO and  802.15.6NB1

column1: (MBAN). with Bluetooth Smart Low Energy for handset/tablet setup.
3D SNAP™ comes as standard with a choice of GPS/Galileo/Glonass/Compass(BeiDou
2)/QZSS) support in addition to using MBAN and the 9 degree freedom inertial unit for local extra phased camera Array positioning if specified.

3D SNAP™ once fully charged using the Cota wireless charging system the unit will operate for approximately 5 hours recording at 4K '4D' 30fps (Cascade Lasers on). The system has a built in wireless quick charge facility that charges the units fully in 30 mins.
If you decide to purchase the optional Cota battery pack then you can wirelessly charge your devices continually giving you up to 19 hours of record time.
Frame rates: Variable from 4K 30fps down to standard HD 60fps (1080p).
Point and shoot for stills frequency 1 - 1/20K of a second - Auto on.
Maximum frequency stills motion frame rates burst photo 60fps for a maximum of 60 seconds.
3D video capture with Casade Lasers off
'4D' 4K Video capture with Cascade Lasers on - Auto switching.
So what can you do with the software?
Rather than explain the endless possibilities please see the video below (Courtesy of Pelican Imaging and You Tube!
So where are we with development and what do we need the funding for?

Hopefully as you can see from what you have read so far, we have the finished design, we have bench tested basic prototypes and are now ready to move forward with pre production before signing off for mass production.

I say mass, but in choosing the components for the system we are artificially limited by supply by the selected companies, which is one reason why no one large consumer electronics manufacture can compete - there just isn't enough of the OLED displays available in the market yet and what is available we have secured under contract with Japan.
So we are almost there and with your belief and funding we will bring to you and eventually the market (when component supplies exist) possibly the worlds most advanced '4D' 4K action camera system.
Thank you for your interest and for reading this, it is much appreciated.
All perks will be available at retail prices after the campaign ends for 30% extra.
3D SNAP will be available for £549.00 on a first come first sold basis. Limited quantities available according to supply of rare components.
The company is called Occulii - taken from the Latin meaning eyes (Oculus).
My name is Anthony and I am the CTO and co-founder of Occulii.org.

As such I am proud to be part of a team of some 18 technology veterans, specialising in state of the art opto electronics, photonics (lasers), component packaging (think 3D), wireless connectivity, software coding, dynamic nanotechnology and watchmakers.
My background is leading, some would say bleeding, edge technologies.
If you have ever seen a James Bond film then you will no doubt remember 007's right hand man 'Q', the gadget specialist.-

Some 30 years ago I was privileged to have been recruited by the real-life 'Q' -and have spent my time ever since that fruitful meeting helping in creating some of the World's most truly advanced technology based solutions.
For example, think 007's watch with builtin transponder to open, close, start and take limited control of his Aston Martin car in GoldenEye - that watch exists!
Welcome to the world of 3D SNAP ™ - possibly the world's most advanced '4D' 4K Action Camera.

StickFilament is a new filament system designed for FFF 3D printers. This system doesn’t aims to replace the spool, but to implement the traditional system in order to increase the range of available colors and, most important, innovative and brand new materials.
With your support to the Stick Filament’s project you can enable new applications for 3d printing that are otherwise impossible with traditional filament in spool.
We believe Stick Filaments are the best choice for home 3D printing and special manufacturing.

column3: >, because you can load the filament in the 3d print simply avoiding any twisting
>, because you can have a tidy desktop
>, because Stick Filament could be produced with many different materials difficult to find in spool
>, because you can print multicolor objects from the same extruder
>, because you can buy small quantities of filament even choosing from a wide range of colors
>, because you can reduce as much as possible the wasting of not used filament
>, because you can customize materials and colors on demand.

column1: The StickFIlament system is very easy: c
column2: >hoose two sticks, align and join them together applying a gentle pressure while slightly turning them.
column3:
>Then, insert them in the stepper and print it!!... It’s a child play!

The idea was born as an answer to common problems and limits of traditional spool filaments… and led us to find a new solution that offers many benefits. So we thought that a new design, thanks to a production process based on an injection system, is a smart idea for solving our problems concerning the home-use of the filaments.

column1: • the StickFilament doesn’t twist and is easier to insert in the stepper
• they allow you to choose among a wider range of colors and materials which can be stocked neatly and  take up less space on your desk.
<li>they can be also supplied in small quantities, so I  don’t need to buy a big amount of spools to have more colors… <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >In other words (though buying only 1 kg of StickFilament) I could use more colors and even more materials!

column1: Lastly, thanks to the more flexible production process of the StickFilament system, colors and even materials in the future can be customized upon request. A sort of 3D printing filament on demand!!! It sounds pretty cool, doesn’t it?!

With the StickFilament system we can create, mix, think up, and design new materials for 3D printing. Each filament has its own specific benefits, so we can develop applications for a huge range of productions: from food (HIPS for food) to fashion (elastic filaments), from artworks (Wood Pulp)  to electrical components (ABS V0), and many others…

Please note that Stick Filament's diameter is absolutely constant and highly precise, surely a huge step ahead compared to common filament in spool.
column2: >We produce StickFilaments in 2 versions: STANDARD and SPECIAL.

column1: STANDARD: ABS and HIPS colored filaments.
SPECIAL: filaments mixed up with other materials or with extra characteristics

The real good news is that with the Stick Filament’s production process we can produce filaments with lots of materials, most of them actually don’t exist with the common filament in spool. Just one of them: in the Update section you'll see that we are already testing a WAX FILAMENT!

It’s a real innovation for FFF 3D printing and we are proud to say that, soon, new applications will be possible for everyone. For example: we want to test this new materials for cast objects with the “lost wax” process! That's why we need your support.
NOTE: Stick Filaments are here available with a 3mm diameter but we have the 1.75mm version in beta test! It will be working soon.

We are excited about the idea of bringing this new useful and enable technology to makers, hobbysts, and DIY people but also to craftmans and designers. We choose Indiegogo to let you know about the innovations of the Stick Filament system and to find a worldwide support to our project.
We have developed the system in the last 6 months with our resources
column2: we have tested it and tried it out. Now, it’s ready to enter your studio, your laboratory, your home, your “man cave” because it’s affordable for everyone. But now, we need your help for:

column1: <li>the engineering and manufacturing of the mould
<li>developing a new flexible logistic system for the customization of new materials (choose the color, choose the material, choose the quantity and you’ll have your Stick Filaments)
• designing and producing a specific packaging to tidy up the filaments on your desk.
With your support to the Stick Filament’s project we'll be ready for full production, enabling new applications for 3d printing.

The perks of our Indiegogo campaign are pretty awesome! First of all Stick Filaments are an absolute innovation for 3d printing and you’ll be the first to have them. Of course, they’re available here at a special price, cheaper than the final price on the market...
column2: >Here we present you some pretty stuff, so you can support us in a lots of different ways:

column8:
>

Our Stick Filaments are provided with a detailed data sheet for each material. 

Few words about two of our perks:

column1: CRAZY PACK. It's really crazy: you have new kind of Sticks currently under development (with materials not present in the other perks here) for test them. 5 materials and 4 filaments each. You’ll be surprised, for sure! And don’t forget to let us know the results of your prints

PERSONAL FILAMENT: tell us a color (in RAL), choose the material (ABS or HIPS) and tell us your a name. You’ll receive 10 kg of Stick Filaments and… this filament will be in our e-shop with your own name! Cool! For example: if you choose a yellow color (maybe RAL 1016) in ABS and your name is John we’ll have the Yellow John ABS as an item in our e-shop!
Note that BIG MIX PACK and STARTER KIT come in ABS by default, if you want HIPS, please, tell us.
column6:
>OUR PLANNING

We plan to ship all the Stick Filaments in the perks in few months (June) after the end of the Indiegogo campaign.
column22:
>FAQ 

Stick Filaments work with any FFF 3D printer?
column23:
>Yes, they work with any printer accepting 3mm filaments.


Stick Filaments require to glue them together?
column25: their join system has been tested successfully with different kind of FFF 3d printers.
column26:
>

The Special Stick Filaments (ABS ultraclear, Photolum, Aluminium and Wood pulp) are easy to print?

Absolutely. Easy to use and easy to print as the most common 3d printing materials. We'll provide the right print temperature for each one.

StickFilament is a new filament system designed for FFF 3D printers. This system doesn’t aims to replace the spool, but to implement the traditional system in order to increase the range of available colors and, most important, innovative and brand new materials.
With your support to the Stick Filament’s project you can enable new applications for 3d printing that are otherwise impossible with traditional filament in spool.
We believe Stick Filaments are the best choice for home 3D printing and special manufacturing.
Easy, because you can load the filament in the 3d print simply avoiding any twisting
Comfortable, because you can have a tidy desktop
Technological, because Stick Filament could be produced with many different materials difficult to find in spool
Colored, because you can print multicolor objects from the same extruder
Cheap, because you can buy small quantities of filament even choosing from a wide range of colors
Wise, because you can reduce as much as possible the wasting of not used filament
Smart, because you can customize materials and colors on demand.

The StickFIlament system is very easy: choose two sticks, align and join them together applying a gentle pressure while slightly turning them. Then, insert them in the stepper and print it!!... It’s a child play!The idea was born as an answer to common problems and limits of traditional spool filaments… and led us to find a new solution that offers many benefits. So we thought that a new design, thanks to a production process based on an injection system, is a smart idea for solving our problems concerning the home-use of the filaments.
the StickFilament doesn’t twist and is easier to insert in the stepper
they allow you to choose among a wider range of colors and materials which can be stocked neatly and  take up less space on your desk.

they can be also supplied in small quantities, so I  don’t need to buy a big amount of spools to have more colors… In other words (though buying only 1 kg of StickFilament) I could use more colors and even more materials!

Lastly, thanks to the more flexible production process of the StickFilament system, colors and even materials in the future can be customized upon request. A sort of 3D printing filament on demand!!! It sounds pretty cool, doesn’t it?!

With the StickFilament system we can create, mix, think up, and design new materials for 3D printing. Each filament has its own specific benefits, so we can develop applications for a huge range of productions: from food (HIPS for food) to fashion (elastic filaments), from artworks (Wood Pulp)  to electrical components (ABS V0), and many others…Please note that Stick Filament's diameter is absolutely constant and highly precise, surely a huge step ahead compared to common filament in spool.We produce StickFilaments in 2 versions: STANDARD and SPECIAL.
STANDARD: ABS and HIPS colored filaments.
SPECIAL: filaments mixed up with other materials or with extra characteristics

The real good news is that with the Stick Filament’s production process we can produce filaments with lots of materials, most of them actually don’t exist with the common filament in spool. Just one of them: in the Update section you'll see that we are already testing a WAX FILAMENT!It’s a real innovation for FFF 3D printing and we are proud to say that, soon, new applications will be possible for everyone. For example: we want to test this new materials for cast objects with the “lost wax” process! That's why we need your support.
NOTE: Stick Filaments are here available with a 3mm diameter but we have the 1.75mm version in beta test! It will be working soon.

We are excited about the idea of bringing this new useful and enable technology to makers, hobbysts, and DIY people but also to craftmans and designers. We choose Indiegogo to let you know about the innovations of the Stick Filament system and to find a worldwide support to our project.
We have developed the system in the last 6 months with our resources

‘n Connect we provide mobile hotspot and tablet rental service to our customers
for hourly or daily rates either directly from our website (www.RentnConnect.com) or through our partners. Our objective is to
offer data connectivity at affordable rates by renting mobile hotspots and
tablet computers to travellers. We are now also adding Navigation+ as a rental option

• We know
that it’s almost impossible to stay disconnected from internet, but roaming is
costly and buying a local sim card may be both expensive and inconvenient. Rent
‘n Connect provides you a reasonable option to enrich your experience in the
city (Istanbul and other Turkish cities for the moment) with unlimited,

high speed internet connection with a fixed price.

How it works?

You Book

Reserve your device on our website for the dates you wish to have it or throughout your stay.

We Deliver

We deliver your device to your hotel or requested location prior to your arrival.

up the device from the selected location on the return day you selected. You can also use the provided envelope to ship

• At the moment we are operating in major Turkish cities Istanbul, Izmir, Marmaris, Bodrum and Antalya. As we experience the user feedback, we see that the service is very valuable and helpful for travellers who wants to be connected while mobile, thus we want to extend our services to more locations around Europe and elsewhere. We are seeking US $ 75,000 to expand our business in to other heavily visited cities, mainly: London, Paris, Rome and New York as well as marketing our website in travel sites such as Tripadvisor, Expedia etc. We believe that including the income from our current business (please check our website: www.RentnConnect.com), and the funds we hope to secure, we can support the operations for the next 9-12 months even if the new locations do not generate any income.
Anyone that contributes less than US $50 will be awarded free shipping on their first rental if they visit the aforementioned cities.
If you decide to support us US $100 we will award 3 days off for your first rental if you visit the aforementioned cities.
If you decide to support us US $250 we will award 5 days off for your first rental up to seven days and a life time discount of %25 in your next rentals.
If you decide to support us US $500 you will receive a free hotspot device and a life time discount of %25 in your next rentals.
If you contribute US $1000 you will receive a free hotspot device, a tablet and a life time discount of %25 in your next rentals.

We will retain the funds even if we don’t reach our entire goal, and use it to expand our business in to fewer selected cities. We believe that our business is easily scalable and we think that our product (software, applications, etc.) and our experienced team will provide a competitive advantage.

The world's first truly multi touch device for iMac.

We love iMac, we love technology and we love the ease and functionality of the iPhone and iPad. We have often wondered why the iMac has remained non-touch given the extensive development Apple has done in the touch screen realm. So, we have developed a unique and convenient way to convert a standard iMac into a fully functional multi touch screen computer.

As innovative as it is functional the C2T will transform the way you not only use your iMac but it will enhance the way you use it. Using a glass free design coupled with our unique and patented ""beam collation algorithm"" technology the C2T has reinvented the iMac and how you will use it in the future.
What We Need &

We have spent over $250,000 in the development phase of this project and have successfully completed testing on the original 21"" iMac. We have completed a production run to prove the technology and the usability of the design.

We now need to move to the next phase of this project, which is tooling for the set up of full production of C2T for all 21"" and 27"" iMac's. Our investment in R&
column2:
D and field-testing has been extensive so we know that the design and technology is sound.

By backing this project you will enable us to bring our dream of a world with multi touch iMacs to reality. You will become a part of something great as we change the world of iMac and how you see and use them.

column1: Without your help we would need to sell C2T through our existing supply channels. This means it will :
By backing us now, you will become an active member of our development team, and help us realise the full potential of this great product concept.
What's in it for you?
As a backer of this project you will be at the cutting edge of the iMac touch revolution. You will receive your very own C2T from our first full production run.

By being a part of our early bird offer you will receive a minimum of $100 discount on the RRP. We will include a limited edition customised 'The iMac, Reinvented' Touch Pen and a Screen protector for your iMac.

If you are a Designer or Educator you can save up to $1000 on the RRP by supporting us in this critical phase of development.
So, where are we now?

The platform and the industrial design are fully complete and we have the first production samples already in our office. Now we need your help to finish the development, buy tooling and expand our manufacturing capabilities.
Where will your funding go?

We have already invested heavily in the development of this project. Your funding is the critical link to the completion of this project and will be used to realise our dream of the world's first full multi touch device for iMac.

We have working prototypes and a supply chain that's ready to go. We need your help to take the next step.

We see the following funding milestones: We will use the first $100,000 raised through the campaign to buy tooling and enhance our existing manufacturing facility in Shenzhen, China. This will enable us to increase our cost-efficient manufacturing of the frame enclosure, which requires expensive die cast, and mould tooling. Then there are additional moulds required for the internal sections, components, connectors and cabling and all of these parts add up quickly.

We love the idea of letting you design the look. If we reach $250,000 we will give every backer the option to change the colour of their C2T.

Get us to $500,000 and we will give everyone free shipping.*

At $750,000 we will upgrade every backer to an extended 3 year warranty, up from the standard 1 year.*

At the goal of $1,000,000 we will we able to purchase some of the specialized machinery, equipment and hire additional staff required to customize some design of C2T to your personal preference.

Backers must have chosen a perk with a value of $229 or higher.

We have put a lot of effort into this project but like many things in life not everything can be completed by just a few. You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will not only be a part of a world first but you will be one of the first to be using C2T LIVE!

As we have already proven the technology with our C2T device for the pre 2012, 21"" iMac we know the design and concept is sound. All functionality has been tested through numerous software enhancements within the firmware which you will be able to continually update online simply should it ever be required.
Why Trust Convert 2 Touch

Convert 2 Touch has more than 25 years experience with Apple products. We have been there from the start and worked with virtually every model and design Apple have produced. It was a natural progression to move our business into this area as 'we love mac'. Today, it is rare to be able to design something for a product, which can totally reinvent an already amazing product like the iMac, but here we are.
Give the gift of crowdfunding!

The participation in creating C2T is a great gift to give for any occasion. We have many perks at all price levels. All of them have one thing in common: they let you (or your loved one) participate in the greatest innovation since Apple invented the iMac! Here is a quick summary of our coolest perks:
Your new C2T will be shipped via EMS with full online tracking and insurance to your specified postal address.
C2T is a unique device that converts a standard iMac 21"" or 27"" into a fully functional touch screen computer which allows you to use your iMac as if it were an iPhone or iPad.

C2T utilizes infrared technology overlaid across the screen to enable you to control the functions of the iMac by touch. Using a glass free design coupled with our unique and patented ""beam collation algorithm"" technology the C2T has reinvented the iMac and how you will use it in the future.
How does C2T connect?
Do I need additional software or drivers?

column2: Play) so it requires no additional software or drivers. Simply plug in the USB wait 10 seconds and your iMac will be touch enabled.

column1: Will C2T damage my iMac or leave any marks?
No. C2T will not damage or mark your iMac and is easily applied and or removed. It attaches to your iMac with discretely placed magnets within the frame.
Will my keyboard and mouse still function?
Yes. Once you have connected the C2T to your iMac you will still have the full functionality of your keyboard and mouse. They may however become a little jealous of your new device.
Will C2T work if my iMac is using Windows?
Yes. C2T has been designed to work with either Mac OS or Windows.
What operating systems can be used with C2T?

C2T is built out of the finest aluminium and poly materials. If we reach critical mass we can customise your C2T to your favorite colour or pattern. The C2T is hand made in our own modest facility Shenzhen, China.
How far are you in the development of C2T?

The platform and the industrial design are fully complete and we have the first production samples already in our office. Now we need your help to finish the development, buy tooling and expand our manufacturing capabilities.
How can you be sure the technology will work?

C2T is already fully complete and is already available for the original 21"" iMac. We have spent more than $250,000 developing the design, technology and sample production.

We now need your help with the costs associated with moving forward into the full production of the original 27"" and the new 21"" &

We do not see any risks at all as we have a proven design and working product already completed. We also hold patents for this design internationally.

However, with all technology there are always risks, in this case we believe we have identified all possibilities for issues and are in a position where the only delay is lack of the available funding to complete the project.
What else can you do to help?

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can forward this link to your network via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet.

We thank you so much for your support.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?

Hello everyone,

The Akio campaign has moved to here

www.indiegogo.com/projects/akio-fixed-funding-never-lose-anything-again 

Many people have contacted us in the week since we launched, asking whether we were a Fixed funding or Flexible funding campaign. We were originally Flexible funding campaign, but people have told us they feel more comfortable with a Fixed funding campaign. We have listened and understood, and Akio is now being re-launched as a Fixed funding campaign. Thanks to everyone who got in contact with us - we really appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback. Please check out our Fixed campaign and let us know what you think.

For those people who have already contributed to the Flexible funding campaign, please do not worry - your contribution is still valid for the Fixed campaign. A record of your contribution has been kept and you will receive your perks as normal - same time, same price, same product. You should have received a personal email from me, Eddie Palmer, but if you have not received it for some reason and have a question - please send me a message on eddie@akiosystem.com

Thanks everyone,

Eddie Palmer

column1: • Cosmo Communicator is a pocketable clamshell smartphone with a physical backlit keyboard
• Device features dual colour touchscreen displays and a 24MP camera
• External 2"" touchscreen when device is closed and large 6"" touchscreen when device is open - ample space to create on the move.
• Cosmo runs Android 9 (Pie) and also supports Linux OS, such as Sailfish OS and Debian, with a multi-boot option
• Built to be the only device you need to carry, and small enough to fit in your pocket, it’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your mobile phone and your laptop.

Slashgear  ""This is just the latest and greatest of the machines the company’s made to fill the gaps between smartphone and laptop“
ZD NET  ""Tiny Android, Linux laptop: Cosmo Communicator is also dual-screen phone”

The Verge “tiny Android laptop …doubles as a phone”
The Register  ""Planet brought the clamshell QWERTY back to the market 17 years after Psion made its last PDA”
Engadget  “intended to serve as a phone, not just a pocketable productivity machine”
Liliputing  “… use as a smartphone replacement rather than a smartphone companion”
Engadget Japan “レトロフューチャーなデザインに最新機能山盛りのGemini PDA後継機”

At Planet Computers innovation is at the heart of our company.  Earlier this year,  we successfully delivered our Gemini PDA product to more than 7000 Indiegogo backers who supported our mission to kick start a new mobile computing revolution.
Now, we are ready to push our vision even further and you can be part of it.
In the process of developing our new device we asked our Indiegogo backers, users and followers what features they wanted to have.
We are excited to announce that we are extending the range of Planet devices with the Cosmo Communicator, our new flagship device.

The Cosmo Communicator is a modern dual-screen clamshell-based mobile communicator with an integrated keyboard. It is built to be a great pocket computer, a superb mobile phone and an excellent high resolution camera.

The Cosmo features dual colour displays: it features an external colour touchscreen display for easy phone call control and notifications.  Tucked away inside the beautiful and sleek award winning clamshell design is an ultra-wide 6” colour touchscreen display providing ample space to create on the move with a fully functioning  keyboard integrated into the device. When open, the innovative clamshell also acts as a support of the device, allowing you to type comfortably.
Cosmo’s newly designed backlit keyboard, allows you to comfortably work at night or in dark spaces such as on long plane journeys without the need of external lighting.
The Cosmo Communicator also comes fully equipped with a great 24MP camera. To take a selfie or for a quick snap, you can operate the camera, zoom and flash without opening the clamshell.

We have selected a great world-wide 4G LTE phone modem to make the Cosmo a truly amazing phone, fast enough to be able to handle dual 4G SIM connections, for both phone calls and data. It also features Bluetooth, NFC and Wi-Fi communications.

Cosmo’s innovative toggle switch provides superior security for the device with an integrated fingerprint sensor and call answer buttons, so you can avoid accepting calls accidentally when the device is in your pocket or handbag.

The Cosmo is based on the powerful Mediatek P70 8-core processor plus separate GPU and AI processors. It has a massive 6GBs of RAM and 128 GBs of Flash memory - ample storage for today's power users. It also offers microSD expansion for storage memory.
Cosmo’s large 4220 mAh battery provides enough power for all day and even two day usage.
Cosmo allows you to work in restricted spaces comfortably, on planes, on trains, in coffee bars. You can also hold the Cosmo and use it with ease standing up or on the bus.
It's the only device you need to carry - and small enough to fit in your pocket.
It’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your mobile phone and your laptop.
We hope that you like our new device and that you can help us make it a reality.
Some exciting features of the Cosmo include:
• Dual-display: an external 2"" touchscreen when device is closed and large 6"" touchscreen when device is open
• 6GB of RAM and a huge 128GB of Flash storage
• Fingerprint sensor and smart toggle button for security and control
Below is the full Cosmo Communicator technical specification.

column4: >2x USB Type C, OTG support, HDMI out (via adapter cable)
>Call answer toggle button with fingerprint sensor

column1: Cosmo is designed to run the latest Android 9 OS and all you favourite app, as well as Linux-based operating systems, such as Sailfish OS and Debian Linux, with a multi-boot option.

You can easily run Microsoft Office for Android apps , as well as Planet’s own PDA software suite including the Agenda calendaring app, Notes app for notetaking and dictation, the Data database app and our new email client, Airmail.

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your support to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of re-inventing the all-in-one communicator product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the Android 9 and Linux firmware.

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Cosmo units claimed as perks will have at least $250 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in May 2019 - only to Cosmo backers.

With email and messaging applications such as WhatsApp, Line, WeChat, Skype, LinkedIn and Facebook Messenger, there is a lot of typing required - and having a quality mobile communicator is a must. It's no longer just about swiping  or typing on a keyboard, making calls , taking photos or voice control - its about all of these actions! And we need to be able to make these actions wherever and whenever we want.
In creating Cosmo, we tried to incorporate many features that will make this device a true all-in-one communicator - powerful enough to be the only device that you need to carry around with you.

The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 7 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market.

At present, we have an initial prototype of the Cosmo that we built with our industrial design partners Therefore in the UK. We will be working with our factory in China and our designers in the UK to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the Cosmo. Having delivered the Gemini PDA in less than a year we are proud of that achievement, but building any new product is a huge task and is a risky journey. Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in May 2019. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Cosmo's progress.

We would love you to join the Planet Computers' movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it.

Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@planetcom.co.uk) or social media. We would love to hear from you.
This time, we are also running a referral competition. The top 3 Cosmo Communicator campaign referrers by contributions will be rewarded with prizes as follows:

We hope that you like the prizes and that you will spread the message. The winning referrer prizes will be sent out after the Cosmo campaign ends in the first week of December 2018. We will contact the referrers for their choice of keyboard layouts. 

 

","Quick Facts
Cosmo Communicator is a pocketable clamshell smartphone with a physical backlit keyboard
Device features dual colour touchscreen displays and a 24MP camera
External 2"" touchscreen when device is closed and large 6"" touchscreen when device is open - ample space to create on the move.
Cosmo runs Android 9 (Pie) and also supports Linux OS, such as Sailfish OS and Debian, with a multi-boot option
Built to be the only device you need to carry, and small enough to fit in your pocket, it’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your mobile phone and your laptop.

Slashgear  ""This is just the latest and greatest of the machines the company’s made to fill the gaps between smartphone and laptop“ZD NET  ""Tiny Android, Linux laptop: Cosmo Communicator is also dual-screen phone”

The Verge “tiny Android laptop …doubles as a phone”The Register  ""Planet brought the clamshell QWERTY back to the market 17 years after Psion made its last PDA”Engadget  “intended to serve as a phone, not just a pocketable productivity machine”Liliputing  “… use as a smartphone replacement rather than a smartphone companion”Engadget Japan “レトロフューチャーなデザインに最新機能山盛りのGemini PDA後継機”

At Planet Computers innovation is at the heart of our company.  Earlier this year,  we successfully delivered our Gemini PDA product to more than 7000 Indiegogo backers who supported our mission to kick start a new mobile computing revolution.
Now, we are ready to push our vision even further and you can be part of it.
In the process of developing our new device we asked our Indiegogo backers, users and followers what features they wanted to have.
We are excited to announce that we are extending the range of Planet devices with the Cosmo Communicator, our new flagship device.

The Cosmo Communicator is a modern dual-screen clamshell-based mobile communicator with an integrated keyboard. It is built to be a great pocket computer, a superb mobile phone and an excellent high resolution camera.

The Cosmo features dual colour displays: it features an external colour touchscreen display for easy phone call control and notifications.  Tucked away inside the beautiful and sleek award winning clamshell design is an ultra-wide 6” colour touchscreen display providing ample space to create on the move with a fully functioning  keyboard integrated into the device. When open, the innovative clamshell also acts as a support of the device, allowing you to type comfortably.
Cosmo’s newly designed backlit keyboard, allows you to comfortably work at night or in dark spaces such as on long plane journeys without the need of external lighting.
The Cosmo Communicator also comes fully equipped with a great 24MP camera. To take a selfie or for a quick snap, you can operate the camera, zoom and flash without opening the clamshell.

We have selected a great world-wide 4G LTE phone modem to make the Cosmo a truly amazing phone, fast enough to be able to handle dual 4G SIM connections, for both phone calls and data. It also features Bluetooth, NFC and Wi-Fi communications.

Cosmo’s innovative toggle switch provides superior security for the device with an integrated fingerprint sensor and call answer buttons, so you can avoid accepting calls accidentally when the device is in your pocket or handbag.

The Cosmo is based on the powerful Mediatek P70 8-core processor plus separate GPU and AI processors. It has a massive 6GBs of RAM and 128 GBs of Flash memory - ample storage for today's power users. It also offers microSD expansion for storage memory.
Cosmo’s large 4220 mAh battery provides enough power for all day and even two day usage.
Cosmo allows you to work in restricted spaces comfortably, on planes, on trains, in coffee bars. You can also hold the Cosmo and use it with ease standing up or on the bus.
It's the only device you need to carry - and small enough to fit in your pocket.
It’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your mobile phone and your laptop.
We hope that you like our new device and that you can help us make it a reality.
Some exciting features of the Cosmo include:
A newly-designed integrated physical backlit keyboard
Dual-display: an external 2"" touchscreen when device is closed and large 6"" touchscreen when device is open
6GB of RAM and a huge 128GB of Flash storage
Fingerprint sensor and smart toggle button for security and control
Here are the key external features...
Below is the full Cosmo Communicator technical specification.
2x USB Type C, OTG support, HDMI out (via adapter cable)
Accelerometer, compass, light sensor, gyro, magneto-sensor
Call answer toggle button with fingerprint sensor
Cosmo is designed to run the latest Android 9 OS and all you favourite app, as well as Linux-based operating systems, such as Sailfish OS and Debian Linux, with a multi-boot option.

You can easily run Microsoft Office for Android apps , as well as Planet’s own PDA software suite including the Agenda calendaring app, Notes app for notetaking and dictation, the Data database app and our new email client, Airmail.
What We Need & What You Get

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your support to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of re-inventing the all-in-one communicator product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the Android 9 and Linux firmware.

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Cosmo units claimed as perks will have at least $250 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in May 2019 - only to Cosmo backers.

With email and messaging applications such as WhatsApp, Line, WeChat, Skype, LinkedIn and Facebook Messenger, there is a lot of typing required - and having a quality mobile communicator is a must. It's no longer just about swiping  or typing on a keyboard, making calls , taking photos or voice control - its about all of these actions! And we need to be able to make these actions wherever and whenever we want.
In creating Cosmo, we tried to incorporate many features that will make this device a true all-in-one communicator - powerful enough to be the only device that you need to carry around with you.

The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 7 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market.

At present, we have an initial prototype of the Cosmo that we built with our industrial design partners Therefore in the UK. We will be working with our factory in China and our designers in the UK to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the Cosmo. Having delivered the Gemini PDA in less than a year we are proud of that achievement, but building any new product is a huge task and is a risky journey. Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in May 2019. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Cosmo's progress.

We would love you to join the Planet Computers' movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it.

column10:
>

1/2 credit card size Mopoint is the world's smallest 65W Gallium Nitride (GaN) charger that is 70% smaller than current traditional chargers.

column14:

With 65W, there is plenty of power to share around with 2 x USB-C (supporting Power Delivery 3.0) and 1 x USB-A (supporting Quick Charge 3.0) ports. 

Mopoint In the Press
column15:

column16:

Quick Charge for All Your Apple Devices
column17:

The 65W power can quick charge a laptop (MacBook Pro), smartphone (iPhone), and mobile device (AirPods, Watch) all at the same time

Power 2 Laptops Simultaneously
column18:
>

With 65W Dual USB-C Power Delivery, a single Mopoint charger can power 2 laptops simultaneously.

Pocket-friendly Same as Your Airpods

 Takes up the same space as Airpods and you can easily fit Mopoint in any pocket anywhere. 

Foldable Wall Plug
column19:
> 

The Mopoint is designed as a powerful 65W charger. It’s actually quite robust and works with almost USB-C devices. No need to mess with bulky power cables which can be bigger than the charge itself.

Powered by the Latest Gallium Nitride (GaN) Technology
column20:
>

Mopoint utilizes the industry-leading GaN Chip Innoscience INN650D02 Power IC to better power and performance. The new Gallium Nitride semiconductor material allows for power devices that can operate at higher voltages and switching frequency which results in smaller and more efficient chargers.
column21:

Travel-friendly Worldwide Converters Including
column24:

Intelligent Power Distribution

column2:
>

You will like to take Mopoint with you to your friend’s, office meeting room, hotel lounge, and travel place. We design Mopoint as foldable pin and can be compatible with the travel pin. So you can take it with you any place you like to use on the earth.

93% AC/DC Power Efficiency Testing (vs 91% for Apple/Anker)
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Mopoint charger generates lesser heat and the power efficiency is around 93% (compared to Apple/Anker chargers with 91% efficiency). As shown in the video above, with an input power of 71.3W, Mopoint GaN Charger is able to output 66W (22.2*3.0)/71.3W = 93.4%.

Proof of Product Testing Video

The following video shows a full working prototype of the Mopoint GaN Charger able to output 66W power. The USB-C 1 power is 30W, the USB-C 2 power is 18W and USB-A power is 18W. So the total output for Mopoint is 66W(30W+18W+18W). In addition, it is able to charge another 2 MacBook at the same time.
column8:
showinfo=0"">

The Mopoint charging test on 2 MacBook, 16"" MacBook Pro and 13"" MacBook Air. Mopoint can charge 16"" MacBook Pro with 65W in single USB-C port. Mopoint can also charge 2 MacBook for 30W simultaneously. 

Charging 2 MacBook Simultaneously
column11:
showinfo=0"">

Low-Temperature Operation Testing

The temperature control is very important for GaN charger. So we measured the temperature across 15 points on the Mopoint charger while it is charging the 15"" MacBook from 0% to 100% battery level. The internal components temperature did not exceed 70ºC while the exterior housing temperature did not exceed 50ºC, beating industry-standards of 100ºC and 65ºC respectively.

Product Comparison

column2:
Certifications

Mopoint 65W GaN Charger is certified with cTUVus, FCC, CE, PSE, ROHS.

Design and Development
column4:
>

Mopoint is already in manufacturing state. We've completed the design for manufacturing &
column5:
assembly (DFMA) reviews for the product. The tooling are also already fished the first try run. We plan to finish the whole mass production by the end of July. We will prepare the first 2000PCS in the first week of August. And we will also send the others before the end of August. So there is no risk to pledge us.

Introducing WarpDrive - The Lightest Portable SSD

WarpDrive is perfect for creative work. Whether you’re a content creator, photographer or videographer, the WarpDrive will save you time and allow you to work efficiently.

 

 

Small &
column2:
Lightweight

The WarpDrive weighs only 29g / 1oz, and is only 10mm / ⅜ inch thick. It’s even smaller than your standard credit card.

 

High-Speed Data Transfer

 

With USB Type-C 3.2 Gen 2 NVMe interface, the WarpDrive provides high-speed data transfer up to 850MB/s, that is 5.6x faster than the average external HDDs.

 

 Blackmagic Speed Test Comparison

 

4K Video Transfer Speed Comparison

 

Scratch Resistant

 

Aluminum is a great heat conductor to keep the flash controller cool at all times. The metallic surface compliments Macbooks and iPads perfectly. To make the WarpDrive scratch-resistant, we designed a silicone bumper that protects your gadgets and the drive itself.

Water Resistant

 

The WarpDrive has an IP67 rating, meaning it can be dropped into a body of water up to a meter deep for half an hour. Feel free to give the drive a quick wash!

 

Compatibility

 

 

Different types of creatives prefer different computers. The WarpDrive is equipped with USB Type-C connector. Connect to Windows PCs and older Mac OS models with USB Type-C to USB A cable, or to newer iOS gadgets with a USB Type-C to Type-C cable.

Optimal for System Backup

System backup typically requires 2GB of computer memory and 150MB of free disk space. WarpDrive’s high memory capacity are great for system backup. With 1TB WarpDrive, you can backup your system up to 500 times without deleting any files.

Works with Dual OS

 

Windows directly, turning any Mac into a PC. 

 

 

 

Specifications

 

Design &
column3:
Technology

When designing the WarpDrive, we wanted it to be as small and compact as possible. We experimented with different form factors and realized the current design is the most minimal.

 

Speed is another important factor. We wanted it to have one of the fastest data transfer speeds, but overheating would be an issue. To overcome this, we included a layer of graphene and encased everything in an aluminum case for optimal cooling effect.

 

Working Prototype Demonstration

column1: Blackmagic Disk Speed Test for WarpDrive Prototype with Intel i9-9900K, Z370 Motherboard, 512GB NVMe WDS500G2X0C, 16GB DDR4.

We are a team of IT enthusiasts who work in the creative industry. Knowing what content creators want in their work purse, we dedicate our time and combine our specialties in product design, engineering and marketing into making a high speed memory drive with great aesthetic and functionalities.

The team is led by Darren, who has worked in sourcing and manufacturing for over 15 years. His experience has helped the team with supplier contacts as well as streamlining the prototyping stage. As a product designer and creative content creator, James has provided much needed user experience to enhance the design. Xiao's expertise in PCB design has helped bring WarpDrive from the drawing board into reality. 

Project Timeline

 

2019

Risks and Challenges

Though this is our first ever crowdfunding campaign, some of us have previous experience in e-commerce and operation management that we are aware of all the potential risks and challenges we might face. We felt that we have done all the research and preparations before launching our campaign.

WarpDrive is made with two key components: flash controller, NAND flash memory, with aluminum case and a silicone bumper. All the components to make a WarpDrive has already been finalized.

The WarpDrive shown in the campaign and video are actual working prototypes.

We are excited to see the WarpDrive being used by more people in the community. With your help, we can bring WarpDrive to life and keep the cost low by raising economies of scale.

We hope you will enjoy the WarpDrive!

One common complaint about the Fire is that it lacks the Collections feature of the other Kindles, which allows users to organize books into folders. We all love reading, and we need this feature on the Fire to help us keep track of our books! So we're going to take matters into our own hands and develop an app for the Kindle Fire that accomplishes this. But we can't do it alone.

We've got app development teams standing by to make this app a reality. They'll design it especially for the Fire, and it should even have a few more options than just what's on the original Kindle collections. We're hoping for something beautiful with background images of dusty bookshelves and cozy libraries to help get us in the mood for reading as we create our collections.

We roughly estimate that it'll take a month to develop, once we've reached our funding goal. The app will eventually make it into the Amazon Appstore, but everyone who contributes to this campaign will get a complimentary copy!

We're hoping to bring one of the most-beloved features of the Kindle to the Kindle Fire, and it's no exaggeration to say that this is something everyone will want to have. You'll be able to create your own collections and hopefully access your books straight from this app. What are the consequences if this campaign doesn't happen? Well, we'll all just have to continue scrolling through our entire list of books to find the one we want without being able to bunch them together in ways that make sense. But let's show that we've got what it takes to find a solution for this!

We need to raise $5,000 to make this happen. It sounds like a lot, but that's only $10 from 500 people or $50 from 100 people. With all of the Kindle Fire lovers we have around here, we can easily make that happen. But if we don't there's no risk you for because all of the money will be refunded.

The vast majority of the money goes to the app developer, then there's a small amount left over for artwork and support if it's needed. IndieGoGo and Paypal take a percentage for allowing us to do this as well.
Everyone who pitches in $10 gets a copy of the app when it's finished.
<div>Everyone who pitches in $25 gets a copy of the app and a copy of our Tips &amp
column2: Tricks Guide, The Kindle Fire Department Compendium.

column1: Everyone who pitches in $50 gets the app, the guide, and the chance to beta-test the app and give us feedback. If you've never beta-tested an app, it can be exciting to be so closely involved in the development process. It's definitely worth it!

Everyone who pitches in $100 will get the app, the guide, the beta-testing spot, and a special Thank You on our site when the app finally gets released. This is your chance to be a Kindle Fire Department Hero!

Once you've contributed, the most important thing you can do to make sure this app gets into your hands is to make sure other Kindle Fire owners are involved! Send links to your friends, post on forums in internet message boards, share on Facebook on the Kindle Fire and Amazon Kindle walls. We appreciate you getting behind this project, and we're going to see it through to the end!

","Our Story

One common complaint about the Fire is that it lacks the Collections feature of the other Kindles, which allows users to organize books into folders. We all love reading, and we need this feature on the Fire to help us keep track of our books! So we're going to take matters into our own hands and develop an app for the Kindle Fire that accomplishes this. But we can't do it alone.

We've got app development teams standing by to make this app a reality. They'll design it especially for the Fire, and it should even have a few more options than just what's on the original Kindle collections. We're hoping for something beautiful with background images of dusty bookshelves and cozy libraries to help get us in the mood for reading as we create our collections.

We roughly estimate that it'll take a month to develop, once we've reached our funding goal. The app will eventually make it into the Amazon Appstore, but everyone who contributes to this campaign will get a complimentary copy!

We're hoping to bring one of the most-beloved features of the Kindle to the Kindle Fire, and it's no exaggeration to say that this is something everyone will want to have. You'll be able to create your own collections and hopefully access your books straight from this app. What are the consequences if this campaign doesn't happen? Well, we'll all just have to continue scrolling through our entire list of books to find the one we want without being able to bunch them together in ways that make sense. But let's show that we've got what it takes to find a solution for this!
What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $5,000 to make this happen. It sounds like a lot, but that's only $10 from 500 people or $50 from 100 people. With all of the Kindle Fire lovers we have around here, we can easily make that happen. But if we don't there's no risk you for because all of the money will be refunded.

The vast majority of the money goes to the app developer, then there's a small amount left over for artwork and support if it's needed. IndieGoGo and Paypal take a percentage for allowing us to do this as well.
Here's what you get for contributing!
Everyone who pitches in $10 gets a copy of the app when it's finished.
Everyone who pitches in $25 gets a copy of the app and a copy of our Tips & Tricks Guide, The Kindle Fire Department Compendium.

Everyone who pitches in $50 gets the app, the guide, and the chance to beta-test the app and give us feedback. If you've never beta-tested an app, it can be exciting to be so closely involved in the development process. It's definitely worth it!

Everyone who pitches in $100 will get the app, the guide, the beta-testing spot, and a special Thank You on our site when the app finally gets released. This is your chance to be a Kindle Fire Department Hero!

Once you've contributed, the most important thing you can do to make sure this app gets into your hands is to make sure other Kindle Fire owners are involved! FileLife is a solution that focuses on giving you protection and control over your files. Technology has undoubtedly changed the way the world is connected. Documents and pictures are easily exchanged at an incredible rate. With this huge amount of sharing it is easy to lose track of where or with whom your personal information might eventually end up. FileLife gives you control over your files and their usage once they leave your computer.

The problem with sharing files, sending attachments in emails, or posting content like pictures online, is that once they are out of your reach they are out of your control. You cannot ""kill"", or delete a file once it has been released to the internet. Additionally, you cannot control who views it past the immediate group of people you share it with. FileLife provides a unique solution by giving you complete control over your files during their lifespan.

Lets face it, accidents happen. FileLife insures you against moments when you realize you might have hit the send button just a little too quickly. No more regretting sending those pictures or wondering where your heartfelt letter might end up. FileLife is like a remote control for your digital life
column2: with it your online reputation is in your hands.

column1: • 256 bit bank strength encryption to ensure your files remain secure no matter where they go
• Insight and visibility on where your files are at all times
• The ability to modify, remove, or block any recipients access to your files with the click of a mouse
• Up to 1 GB of FREE secure storage when in the cloud
• We currently support 300 file types and are working on increasing our coverage to more file formats

Here is a screenshot showcasing some of our features at their current level of completion. Our management console shows the user notifications, recent file activity, as well as quick buttons used to perform actions on files efficiently.
Just in case you were wondering how it looks, here is our limited edition FileLife t-shirt for your viewing pleasure, enjoy!
FileLife would like to give you the first opportunity at being in control of your digital life by helping us support our mission.

We have successfully accomplished a great deal of this process on our own and we are nearing the end of this incredible journey. We want everyone to be a part of our revolution by assisting us in our final push toward making this a reality.
Your contributions will help us continually keep FileLife at an affordable price to all.

In addition to providing security solutions, our FileLife team is dedicated to educating everyone on how to better protect themselves in the digital world. Our team has created a worldwide society focused on always staying in control at www.keepsyouincontrol.com

We hope that the Indiegogo community will join us and enjoy our ground breaking achievements as we change the paradigm of sharing information on the web through FileLife.

About I-CeKey 

i-CeKey is part of a product range started by a
Student from Switzerland Polytechnic School. His
idea was to create convenient memory extensions for mobile devices, and
easy way to share multimedia content with friends, regardless of your
platform. And pack it with fun, style and extra features. After I-CeKub,
the WIFI the Wireless memory platform, introducing the I-CeKey, the
mini  Memory device for Iphone and Ipad.
cost to fund production, packaging and shipping of the product
As we reach the goal, you will get a brand
new i-CeKey. It is the new alternative to traditional storage solutions
such as connection depend Cloud. Your data storage  in your pocket.
As our product is about look, as we reach this target, we will provide 5 different colors to choose from. The standard color is gold.
Plug your I-CeKey on your Iphone and access Gigas of further storage, files and fun. As simple as that! Now you can think your iOs devices differently:
• Expand the Memory limitations of your Iphone
The biggest challenge remains production costs and dimensions.  We are confident that our
team, partly based in China , can manage a day-to-day follow up of the
product development. Also, we do get great support from expert
from the Polytechnic school. You will get updated frequently.
If you cannot donate, you can still be
part of the adventure. Tell your family and friends about us, introduce to potential distributors. Share our links

and help us spreading the word that i-CeKey is here! Thank you all.

Actually, there were some attempts to produce toothpaste in tablets in the world. The main problem is solubility, so it is not just to ""dehydrate"" toothpaste. Another problem for users is to feel remains of granules in their mouth after washing teeth. These problems are solved in Dentamete.
Advantages of the toothpaste in tablets in relation to
► Preventing the transmission of infectious diseases (HIV,
herpes, etc.). If the same tube of toothpaste is used by more people, it is
possible that diseases (infections by germs or viruses) are transmitted with
the brush on the top tube and the top tube to the other brush. This has been
scientifically proven. Also beneficial effect is to people with cystic
► Tablets are less weight than tube of toothpaste,
convenient for carrying on the travel (what if you sit on a tube of toothpaste in
your bag?), Dentamete are not on antiterrorist restrictions in air traffic, while toothpastes in tubes are.
► Unlimited shelf life (tablets do not contain water, which
normally promotes decay) while the toothpaste has the usual shelf life of two
years. Tablets are, in essence, dehydrated toothpaste with new properties
► Easy for storage and distribution of Dentamete in case of big natural disasters,

column5: >Easy to add different flavors and active substance (fluorine,

column1: ► Ideal for military, hotels, travel, even for astronauts,

column5: >The first package contained 10 tablets, but we are considering package of 30 tablets (equivalent of 100 grams toothpaste in tube ),

column1: ► Are certified by the Croatian Institute for Public Health,
which means that they are correct and safe for public use

Dentamete tablets and small travel toothbrushes are ideal for hotels. Their place is besides small soap and shampoo in hotel bathrooms. According to official statistics in Croatia, in 2013. were over 64 millions of tourist overnights! One toothbrush with 2 Dentamete tablets is ideal for morning and evening.

64 millions tourist overnights just in Croatia! What's about Austria, Germany, France, Italy, USA...? That's a huge potential market and great business opportunity! Be a part of that story! Contribute now!

column2: >Dentamete is introduced to former NASA astronaut, Ms. Marsha Ivins, who spent 5 flights into Space during Space Shuttle missions. Dentamete was also introduced to Mr. Dennis Stone from NASA who is also a president of the World Space Week Association. Mr. Stone is presently Project Executive of NASA's Commercial Space Capabilities Office at the Johnson Space Center.

column1: Weight of the box with 30 Dentamete tablets is 18,77 grams, compared with 105 grams of toothpaste in tube. Astronauts on International Space Station are still using a toothpaste in tube. However, besides reduced weight which is important for calculation of launch expenses, Dentamete do not require a lot of water and they are ""edible"" (amount of the toothpaste in every tablet is only 235 miligrams) and volunteers tested them without consequences.

I have repeatedly won awards on innventions exhibitions for Dentamete because of being highly innovative. Here you can see one of those award certificates and bronze medal on ARCA international exhibition of innventions, new ideas, products and technologies.

column2: >There are some articles about Dentamete in development phase, when I started to research market.

column3:

Der Standard, Vienna, about our cooperation and project Dentamete

column1: After months and years of engineering and pharmaceutical development and testing, we now have a highly functional and high quality product. Dentamete classic (""blue Dentamete"") was produced in reduced quantity as testing serial production. Before that, there were produced very small trial series until we reached required quality. However, business partners at that time were not reliable and previous factory didn't offer good conditions. That is the reason why I put the project to rest on the table.
Dentamete is an international project now, a cooperation of partners in Croatia and Austria.
Currently we are closely working with a factory manufacturer to prepare the production setup, and finalize materials and components for mass production.
Negotiations with new producer were successfull. New producer of Dentamete will be Magdis pharamceuticals in Croatia.

Our mission is to become a major global manufacturer and supplier of tablets for cleaning teeth. Dentamete should become recognizable brand. When customers says ""cola"", we think on one specific product, but not for other ""cola"" products. The same is with instant coffee, or some other products which brand names became a name of the entire group of similar products. So, we want that ""Dentamete"" becomes a synonym for all toothbrushing tablets in the world.

column2: >We are really excited about this, and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Dentamete to global success.

>Our perks are tailored so that we can satisfy every contributor and his/her needs: from small travel toothbrushes with 2 Dentamete tablets to XXL Family pack of Dentamete tablets and travel toothbrushes. With every perk will come personalized Certificate of contribution.

column1: If you like our project, but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons. This will help us a lot to spread the word!
Team members and project managers are Goran Nikolasevic (Croatia) and Silvia Payer (Austria).

column2: >Goran was a participant of Erasmus for young entrepreneurs 2014 and he spent 3 months in Vienna. His host entrepreneur was Mag. Silvia Payer and her company Co.systems consulting GmbH. During the exchange, they decided to start a close cooperation on Dentamete project. And here they are after one year!

column1: The production of Dentamete will be in Croatia and ""the mission control"" is in Austria.
