Actually, there were some attempts to produce toothpaste in tablets in the world. The main problem is solubility, so it is not just to ""dehydrate"" toothpaste. Another problem for users is to feel remains of granules in their mouth after washing teeth. These problems are solved in Dentamete.
Advantages of the toothpaste in tablets in relation to
► Preventing the transmission of infectious diseases (HIV,
herpes, etc.). If the same tube of toothpaste is used by more people, it is
possible that diseases (infections by germs or viruses) are transmitted with
the brush on the top tube and the top tube to the other brush. This has been
scientifically proven. Also beneficial effect is to people with cystic
► Tablets are less weight than tube of toothpaste,
convenient for carrying on the travel (what if you sit on a tube of toothpaste in
your bag?), Dentamete are not on antiterrorist restrictions in air traffic, while toothpastes in tubes are.
► Unlimited shelf life (tablets do not contain water, which
normally promotes decay) while the toothpaste has the usual shelf life of two
years. Tablets are, in essence, dehydrated toothpaste with new properties
► Easy for storage and distribution of Dentamete in case of big natural disasters,
► Easy to add different flavors and active substance (fluorine,
► Ideal for military, hotels, travel, even for astronauts,
► The first package contained 10 tablets, but we are considering package of 30 tablets (equivalent of 100 grams toothpaste in tube ),
► Are certified by the Croatian Institute for Public Health,
which means that they are correct and safe for public use

Dentamete tablets and small travel toothbrushes are ideal for hotels. Their place is besides small soap and shampoo in hotel bathrooms. According to official statistics in Croatia, in 2013. were over 64 millions of tourist overnights! One toothbrush with 2 Dentamete tablets is ideal for morning and evening.

64 millions tourist overnights just in Croatia! What's about Austria, Germany, France, Italy, USA...? That's a huge potential market and great business opportunity! Be a part of that story! Contribute now!

Dentamete is introduced to former NASA astronaut, Ms. Marsha Ivins, who spent 5 flights into Space during Space Shuttle missions. Dentamete was also introduced to Mr. Dennis Stone from NASA who is also a president of the World Space Week Association. Mr. Stone is presently Project Executive of NASA's Commercial Space Capabilities Office at the Johnson Space Center.

Weight of the box with 30 Dentamete tablets is 18,77 grams, compared with 105 grams of toothpaste in tube. Astronauts on International Space Station are still using a toothpaste in tube. However, besides reduced weight which is important for calculation of launch expenses, Dentamete do not require a lot of water and they are ""edible"" (amount of the toothpaste in every tablet is only 235 miligrams) and volunteers tested them without consequences.

I have repeatedly won awards on innventions exhibitions for Dentamete because of being highly innovative. Here you can see one of those award certificates and bronze medal on ARCA international exhibition of innventions, new ideas, products and technologies.
There are some articles about Dentamete in development phase, when I started to research market.
Lider, ""The leader"", business magazine in Croatia
It wasn't easy to start with such a project in Croatia.
Dentamete advertisement on Osijek International Airport, Croatia (Photo credits: local newspaper ""Glas Slavonije"", March 2015)
Der Standard, Vienna, about our cooperation and project Dentamete

After months and years of engineering and pharmaceutical development and testing, we now have a highly functional and high quality product. Dentamete classic (""blue Dentamete"") was produced in reduced quantity as testing serial production. Before that, there were produced very small trial series until we reached required quality. However, business partners at that time were not reliable and previous factory didn't offer good conditions. That is the reason why I put the project to rest on the table.
Dentamete is an international project now, a cooperation of partners in Croatia and Austria.
Currently we are closely working with a factory manufacturer to prepare the production setup, and finalize materials and components for mass production.
Negotiations with new producer were successfull. New producer of Dentamete will be Magdis pharamceuticals in Croatia.
Here is our estimated production timeline:

Our mission is to become a major global manufacturer and supplier of tablets for cleaning teeth. Dentamete should become recognizable brand. When customers says ""cola"", we think on one specific product, but not for other ""cola"" products. The same is with instant coffee, or some other products which brand names became a name of the entire group of similar products. So, we want that ""Dentamete"" becomes a synonym for all toothbrushing tablets in the world.
We are really excited about this, and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Dentamete to global success.

Our perks are tailored so that we can satisfy every contributor and his/her needs: from small travel toothbrushes with 2 Dentamete tablets to XXL Family pack of Dentamete tablets and travel toothbrushes. With every perk will come personalized Certificate of contribution.
If you like our project, but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons. This will help us a lot to spread the word!
Team members and project managers are Goran Nikolasevic (Croatia) and Silvia Payer (Austria).

Goran was a participant of Erasmus for young entrepreneurs 2014 and he spent 3 months in Vienna. His host entrepreneur was Mag. Silvia Payer and her company Co.systems consulting GmbH. During the exchange, they decided to start a close cooperation on Dentamete project. And here they are after one year!
The production of Dentamete will be in Croatia and ""the mission control"" is in Austria.

• Nixie LAB - Ultimate Nixie Project
• Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi

WHAT IS THIS

The Nixie Shield / Hat is a modular circuit board that piggyback onto your Raspberry Pi to install it with extra functionality. The Shield was designed according to Raspberry Pi HAT specification. The Nixie Shield allows an Raspberry Pi board to connect any nixie tube you want to use in your projects. The Hat is compatible with Raspberry Pi: 1B+, 2B, 3B, ZERO, ZERO W.

column2:
>

 

I take weekly flights for work. And after a while watching in-flight entertainment on my phone became painful. There had to be a better way than crouching over the tray table, balancing on the seat back, or swapping my phone between tired hands.

Searching online for a solution turned up dry. I tried product after product, each more
disappointing than the last. Some were so wobbly that I had to hold my breath while using
them. Others wouldn’t pack for traveling, didn’t fit my phone, or did not work at all!

Being an engineer, I decided to take matters into my own hands. First, I started designing a quick prototype out of KNex, rubber bands, and tape. Several iterations later, with the help of other engineers, and an ergonomics professor, Easy Phone Holder was born.

column1: Easy Phone Holder is manufactured in the U.S. Our manufacturing process was designed to remove human error and provide the highest quality product to our customers.
If you can't commit to being a backer today you can still support our product:
• Share Easy Phone Holder so we can spread hand and phone freedom to the masses!
Release your hands and fingers from cramping.
Relieve your neck and back from hunching.
Move freely with your phone in full view.
We have all come to accept the inconvenience of losing hand freedom to our phones. Now there is a total solution - not just when you are stationary.

​ When Should I Use Easy Phone Holder?There are more possibilities than we can name here, but here are just a few ideas :) Where should I use Easy Phone Holder?Its robust design came from the need to pack it away during airline travel. So pack it, wear it, or take it anywhere you go with your phone! Ergonomic for Your Next In-flight Entertainment  Receive your Easy Phone Holder in our 200 lb. test packaging. Open the package to find your Easy Phone Holder and instruction card. Add your phone and enjoy!   ​

The iMagBond is a magnet powered CNC aluminum made, smartphone dashboard, air vents, CD-slot stands designed to make your daily commute as well as longer trips easier and safer.

We need your support to bring these prototypes to the market!

The latest update 12/8/2014:  What people say?

column1: • Preparing limited amount of mounts for early birds.

High-end phone mount is hard to find!
1. High-End beautiful, solid CNC anodized aluminum made,  not plastic.
2. Dashboard, Vent and CD-Slot( Patent pending ) are available.
3.  It is universal, good for any smartphones and portable devices.

column3: /> iMagBond for Dashboard

column1:
iMagBond for CD-Slot, patent pending product

Current Market Inadequacies:

Many current smartphone vehicle mounts require the use of two hands to detach or attach, were made out of plastic, ugly and cheap looking feel , or simply did not give the user enough choices about its location.
1. Luxury car needs luxury phone mount, there are no luxury phone mounts in the market, all iMagBond mounts are made of beautiful anodized aluminum by CNC machine.
2. Dashboard, air vent and CD-slot mounts give you maximum option for the location.
3.  CD-Slot mount is designed with minimum  360 swivel base, and has looking feel of integration of car control panel, CD player is able to play while CD-slot mount is installed.
4. iMagBond's  Magnetic head has standard thread of tripod, can be easily mounted to tripod, you got a extra cellphone tripod mounting!
5. Dashboard mount can be used at home, table, and wall anywhere.
•   See who is calling without having to touch your phone.
•  Real-Time recordings with your phone as a dash cam.
•  Detachable base can mount any cameras.
•  Good for essentially all car vents. Make type easy.
Patent pending CD-Slot mount allows mounting device in the central of car.
•   Head and body of mount is compatible with tripod.
• Watch videos, video chat with friends, play music, or even browse the internet in the kitchen, office, and anywhere else in your home.(Dash mount only)

Some problems existing car phone mounts had, including: suction base periodically falling, having to use two hands to remove or attach your device, being made of cheap and highly degradable materials, bulky, unsightly, and complex designs.
We researched and compared different mounting design possibilities by examining other car phone mounts, camera mounts, and even shower swivel heads before drawing rough idea sketches.

column2: 3D design data sent to workshop for a real prototype

column1: • Will the magnet damage my phone or the memory card?

No, memory cards are not magnetic data carriers and thus will not be damaged by magnetic fields, smartphone mobile devices and tablet computers also use non-magnetic storage media and thus magnetic fields will not damage data.
As stated by Macworld on January 12, 2012: “… magnet-based accessories are safe to use with iPads and pose no threat of scrambling interior electronics.”
Yes, almost. There are three installation methods for phone, all kits come with a 3M taped metal plate that is attached to your phone.
A: Tape plate to the back of cellphone.
B: Tape plate to the inside of case of phone.
C: Tape plate to the outside of case of phone:
• Where can I mount my device with the iMagBond?
With the iMagBond, your device can be easily mounted on any car vent, dashboard, CD-slot, wall, or even in the home or office.

Mark Cui is a main product creator and a founder of LED light company, in the past a few years, Mark Cui designed and manufactured a few products for NASA lunar simulator projects and EPA research facility, recently, his company is authorized by Apple as  MFI developer.

column1: Once connected to your tablet device,  FiiV will then initiate your WiFi network, and you're done! It's that simple.

FiiV gives you the freedom to choose any carrier, even with pre-paid data plans so that you can pick the best option wherever you are, with no binding contracts.
FiiV allows the user to choose their wireless carrier on virtually ANY GSM (Global System for Mobile communications) platform.
If you can buy a SIM card, you can use it with FiiV to create a secure, private, and reliable WiFi network that you can access from any device.

on ANY DEVICE.

FiiV provides you with a charge on the go, when you need it most. It can also act as a back up battery for your smartphone!
International data plans are expensive. Simply purchase a pre-paid data SIM from your country of travel, pop it into FiiV, save hundreds.
Even better, don't rack up expensive international phone calls, use FiiV with Skype, Google Voice and more and SAVE BIG.

column2: >YOUR LAPTOP WILL HIGH FiiV YOUR iPAD

column1: FiiV isn't just for tablets... it can share its WiFi Network with your laptop as well.

Q: When will I receive my FiiV case?

A: Our current ETA is May 2015, and we'll continue to communicate schedule updates to our pre-order customers via email.

Q: Why a smart case?

A: There are a lot of ways to 'stay connected' - from finding your local Starbucks and enjoying a coffee to buying a table top Mi-Fi unit to buying a cellular tablet. But there are limitations. We created FiiV so that you can control when and how you connect. Once you pair your FiiV case to your tablet, enjoy connectivity on your terms and an adequate power bank to get you through those rough days.

Q: Is this a viable method to sustain my privacy?

A: Privacy is a hot topic for any 'connected' technology product, and here's our take. We purposefully designed FiiV so that it's completely controllable by the user. There are several options in terms of security settings that you control to keep your personal information safe.

Q: Why do I need a case to be functional on multiple GSM networks?

A: We feel this is the right design path to take given the varying data rates and terms from carrier to carrier. We want the user to remain in the driver seat. Other solutions lock you in to any 1 carrier without recourse. With FiiV, you can switch at any time. This also works great for those who travel abroad
column2: Avoid those roaming data charges. FiiV helps you focus on what is important- enjoying your travels and sharing it with the folks back home.

column1:
Q: How do I get a SIM card once I choose to switch carriers?

A: After you have exhausted all of your purchased data on one wireless carrier, simply visit a retail location for your preferred choice and request to open a data account. Stay clear of contracts and get the data connectivity you want and need, any time.

Q: Is the FiiV case compatible with any tablet? 

A: Initial FiiV tablet models will be compatible with iPad Air (1st Generation) and iPad Mini (all generations). We fully intend to introduce Android compatible FiiV models very soon.

column3:
>Email sending is one of ""must have"" functionality in most of software projects and thus we have to repeatedly work on the template management task from projects to projects. This kind of work take time and disturb developers from focusing on the major implementation and idea development.

Take a look at below capture.



This describes an email template that we normally use to send personalized email to our users when they signup, reset password or some other operations. SilentAnt is built to help developers to save time and focus on building their applications by providing a platform that manages all the email templates on cloud.

What is SilentAnt?

SilentAnt is a FREE, on cloud service, that provides email template and responsive email template through a RESTful api.

All template could be accessed via a rest API so that you can call it from PHP, .NET, JAVA or Javascript or whatever language you are using in your project.

Each template is associated with a unique token and you can get the template using the key like http://silentant.co/api/token/05IG5pBr5mf8F3wB9eFA3mr0a32uPNbf
You can limit access to the template by specifying the trusted IP addresses, any access from untrusted IP will be denied.

How the raised fund will be used?

1. Hire a designer who is specialized on email template to design around 20 common templates.
2. Pay for a cloud VPS from Ocean Digital for 3 years
3. Extend the SSL Certificate

Current project status

The core functionality has completed 80% and the live application is being hosted on a local server, you can try and use it for your project now (not recommend for production use at the moment).
If you like the idea and want to too see it come true soon, give it a help and use it FREE forever.

column1: • Share with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Google plus, etc.
• Give your comment on the idea and functionality.
• Register an account and start using SilentAnt in your project.

Dzung Cao
From Hanoi, Vietnam.
Creator of SilientAnt
http://silentant.co

column2:
>

Flexibility and Freedom to Shoot with GoPro

Designed for GoPro, it is the first hand-held gimbal with integrated controls to simultaneously control GoPro and the gimbal. Using the Snoppa Go will completely transform your videos and change the way you capture memorable scenes and action sports forever. 

With Snoppa Go you can hold, control, and operate your GoPro with one hand. Now you can follow any action and capture smooth shots with ease.

Key Features
column13:
>

 All-in-one GoPro Accessory

column1: 3400 mAh battery - Up to 5 hours working time, and you can charge the GoPro. Moreover, the battery is replaceable (Panasonic NCR18650B) and you can get one more to double the battery life.
Built-in LED light - We know that the action doesn’t always stop when the sun goes down. Snoppa Go is equipped with a built in LED light to illuminate the scene and let you keep filming.

column2: >
column3: >

column1: Storage space for a TF card – Running out of memory is a hassle and having an extra TF Card is essential. We added a safe, secure storage for a TF card built right into the Snoppa Go. No more losing memory cards or storing them haphazardly in your pocket.
column2:
>
  • Perfect Video Stabilization

The Snoppa Go uses 3 brushless motors and advanced sensors to keep your camera level and stable during any kind of activity. The advanced 3-axis stabilization technology instantly compensates and auto-balances for vibrations, arm shake, and body movement. It allows you to follow a subject or capture an action scene perfectly, resulting in video footage that is stable across any plane of motion that perfectly captures the action.
column3: >
column7:
s=ec38477a65ef55d011335de67e16a1dd"" src="""" style=""""/>
  • Control at Your Fingertips

We take pride in our industrial design and understand the importance of ergonomics.
column8:
>

 The silicone wrapped handle provides a soft, yet secure grip and the simple button controls can be operated easily without taking your eyes off the scene.

column1:
Snoppa Go is extremely versatile. It utilizes 3 modes of stabilization for any type of video capture. 

  • Lock Mode – Holds the camera stable along the pan axis and tilt axis. This mode is essential for long still shots, time-lapse, tripod shots and other situations where total stability is required.
Pan Track Mode – Locks the tilt axis while controlling the pan axis for perfectly level panning and tracking for following shots and action that moves horizontally.

column2: Underslung Mode – The most versatile and useful stabilization mode controlling both the tilt axis and pan axis for optimum video stabilization. Unbeatable for action sports, snowboarding, skiing, running, driving vehicles, or any other motion-heavy activity needs to be perfectly captured.
column7:
s=907dbc232c063c3d09aefe3f66c65f1e"" src="""" style=""""/>
  • Go Remote, Get Creative 

For special shots, creative filmmaking, and wireless control, Snoppa Go works with an optional remote control. Go remote and get creative, Snoppa Go can do it all.
column8: >

About us:
column16:

 We are an experienced group of engineers, product designers, and video fans who have a passion about what we do. We create products that solve problems. Our love of videography, sports, and fun have perfectly intersected in our production of the Snoppa Go and we are excited to share it with you. Our team has very strong R&
column17:
D ability in hardware and software of automation control as well as experience in supply chain control. Most importantly, we put imaginative innovation in every product.

","Introducing Snoppa 3-axis stabilizer with computer controlled stabilization and integrated controls for GoProFlexibility and Freedom to Shoot with GoProDesigned for GoPro, it is the first hand-held gimbal with integrated controls to simultaneously control GoPro and the gimbal. Using the Snoppa Go will completely transform your videos and change the way you capture memorable scenes and action sports forever. With Snoppa Go you can hold, control, and operate your GoPro with one hand. Now you can follow any action and capture smooth shots with ease.   Wake up GoPro Recording   Turn off GoPro Key Features  All-in-one GoPro Accessory

column1: 3400 mAh battery - Up to 5 hours working time, and you can charge the GoPro. Moreover, the battery is replaceable (Panasonic NCR18650B) and you can get one more to double the battery life.
Built-in LED light - We know that the action doesn’t always stop when the sun goes down. Snoppa Go is equipped with a built in LED light to illuminate the scene and let you keep filming.

Storage space for a TF card – Running out of memory is a hassle and having an extra TF Card is essential. We added a safe, secure storage for a TF card built right into the Snoppa Go. No more losing memory cards or storing them haphazardly in your pocket.Perfect Video StabilizationThe Snoppa Go uses 3 brushless motors and advanced sensors to keep your camera level and stable during any kind of activity. The advanced 3-axis stabilization technology instantly compensates and auto-balances for vibrations, arm shake, and body movement. It allows you to follow a subject or capture an action scene perfectly, resulting in video footage that is stable across any plane of motion that perfectly captures the action. The advanced 3-axis stabilization technology instantly compensates and auto-balances for vibrations, arm shake, and body movementControl at Your FingertipsWe take pride in our industrial design and understand the importance of ergonomics.  The silicone wrapped handle provides a soft, yet secure grip and the simple button controls can be operated easily without taking your eyes off the scene.   Multi-mode Shooting

Snoppa Go is extremely versatile. It utilizes 3 modes of stabilization for any type of video capture. Lock Mode – Holds the camera stable along the pan axis and tilt axis. This mode is essential for long still shots, time-lapse, tripod shots and other situations where total stability is required.
Pan Track Mode – Locks the tilt axis while controlling the pan axis for perfectly level panning and tracking for following shots and action that moves horizontally.

Omni Track & Underslung Mode – The most versatile and useful stabilization mode controlling both the tilt axis and pan axis for optimum video stabilization. Unbeatable for action sports, snowboarding, skiing, running, driving vehicles, or any other motion-heavy activity needs to be perfectly captured.Go Remote, Get Creative For special shots, creative filmmaking, and wireless control, Snoppa Go works with an optional remote control. Go remote and get creative, Snoppa Go can do it all.1/4 screw extension socket at the bottom of Snoppa gimbal handle Using 2.4G Zigbee technology the Snoppa remote can control all functions of the camera and mount including shooting modes, LEDs, and power modes Mount on Bike For those who like bicycling, we also offer a mount version of Snoppa:Snoppa CAVALRY  Snoppa Cavalry Media report:   About us:  We are an experienced group of engineers, product designers, and video fans who have a passion about what we do. We create products that solve problems. Our love of videography, sports, and fun have perfectly intersected in our production of the Snoppa Go and we are excited to share it with you. Our team has very strong R&D ability in hardware and software of automation control as well as experience in supply chain control. Most importantly, we put imaginative innovation in every product.",22.0,0,"2 Campaigns

'It was filmed using the Redcard'

A normal looking piggy bank and a doll…. is it really?

 

You can see the twinkling spy camera from one of the eyes of the piggy bank.

 

What is at the end of the familiar curtain and curtain rod?

 

Oh no! There is a twinkling lens found in the hole of the curtain rod!

 

What is that near the window?

 

Oh, there is a camera lens here too.

 

 

Hello everyone!

My name is David Lee, the leader of this team

I'm a person who really loves traveling.

Traveling to different countries every year, meeting new people and experiencing new cultures is one of the most precious parts of my life.

But no matter where you travel, no matter what accommodation you go to, one can experience paranoia because of this possible threat…

That's the threat of spy cameras

 

 

With the universalization of global travel, traveling became very convenient, and with access to some available services, one has the option to stay in homes at relatively low prices instead of expensive hotels. 

But we've heard a lot of news about spy cameras that are found there.

There will be nothing more devastating than having a video somewhere on the internet which forever exposes my personal life, leaving me forever scarred all because of a journey I left for my happiness. 

So I teamed up with friends in the engineering and designer industry.  

While the service for spy camera detectives are available on the market, if you search for portable infrared detectors they use, most of the devices are worth 300 dollars or more. Having these detectives come for a visit is just as expensive and adding this on top of ones travel expenses is definitely not budget friendly and is time consuming. 

We were hinted by a security expert with 26 years of experience on TV which motivated us to make the card and we soon realized that using a material called cellophane can be another solution but it is easily crumpled up, making it difficult to carry around. 

So we made it more efficient and reasonable. 

With this Redcard and a cellphone, one can easily detect the lens of the spy cameras. 

 

 

1. Just good enough!

 

A regular cellophane is not suitable because it is hard to cut and easily crumpled.

 

As long as one does not fold the Redcard all the way, which will leave a mark,  one can lightly bend all he or she wants.

 

Cellophane is thinner than paper and can be easily wrinkled up. This makes it inadequate for frequent and long term use. One can use the coating method by pasting cellophane to a see through card but cellophane will start to scratch up and moisture will weaken it, making it impossible for semi- permanent use. 

Then a designer who has knowledge of diverse range of materials found a wonderful one. 

After testing, Redcard proved that it does not easily wrinkle up or rip because of its thicker attribute. Thickness made it very easy to cut it into the form we originally planned and there was no difference in the performance of the lens detection.

 

 

2. Let's make it portable!

It was very important that we made it easy to carry around anywhere. Size too small to cover lenses and flash was not compatible, and too large or too small to cover would reduce portability.

 

As a result, I thought that the most standardized size that I could carry around anywhere in my cell phone case, wallet, bag, etc. was 54mm x 86mm, the size of my credit card.

When I cut it to the size of a card, the edges were very sharp, leaving my hands with bloody cuts. So we rounded up the edges and left them to a professional to make it safe. 

 

 

3. All in one

It's really uncomfortable to carry a manual with you on your trip
column2:
therefore we thought it was important to provide a clear explanation. Please scan the QR code located on the bottom corner  for a clear instructional video to avoid any confusion.

 

How does it work?

column1: 1) Cover both the camera and the flash with a Redcard.
2) Turn on the flash and keep it on while pressing the video mode.
3) Move the camera from various angles on suspicious areas for spy cameras.
4) If you have a small shiny object, it can be a spy camera.
4. You can save the next victim
Imagine a world without illegal filming? How nice would that be?

This is similar to the principle of infrared detectors. LED light, which is illuminated using Redcard and cell phone flash, have a wavelength of 600-700nm. The superimposed curved surface of the lens reflects the light of this wavelength back and is displayed in white dots on the mobile phone screen.

Risks and challenges

 

Redcard’s precautions and weakness

1. It is a simple lens detector, not an all-purpose camera detector

It’s not an all-purpose spy camera detector but a simple one. 
We believe that it's the easiest way to find a spy camera at a reasonable price. 
The Redcard does not have the ability to track down frequencies like some expensive equipment and track where a spy camera is literally located. It's hard to find one with your naked eye, but if you use it the correct way, and flash it with the right angle, one will be able to find the spy camera. (Poke it with a pointed object, such as a hairpin or pen, to see what it is.)

2. Writing can be erased

The description and design on the Redcard can’t be erased by hand, but can be easily erased by sharp objects or rough surfaces. This is because the material is smooth and does not have the ability to absorb ink on its own like paper. While the front can be coated to make it more wear-resistant, the coating will reduce transparency and reduce the performance of the product. We will continue our research to find out if there are better alternatives!

3. Do not over bend or fold the card 

Redcards are also flexible and recover their original condition quickly, but if one over bend the card to a certain point, the Redcards will not be able to recover its bent sides. We wanted to make this clear just in case someone may be unaware.

4. If you take a closer look, you'll find little scratches

The material itself is strong, and as it is stored and shipped from the factory, which can result in some scratches of its own. But it's almost invisible and will not have any impact on its efficiency. In some cases, however, please contact us to request an exchange if the scratches are very serious.

If you think a smartphone dock is simply something to lean your iPhone on, you're wrong. At least that's not true anymore, now that there is Retroduck. We at Wisekids Corp. thought long and hard about how we could add new value to the smartphone, a device people all over the world rely on heavily every day, all day, for communication and entertainment. After much thinking and testing, we came up with Retroduck, a smartphone dock like no other. With one simple slide, Retroduck will instantly - and dramatically- transform your smartphone into a stylish, retro-style television, allowing you to enjoy it like your good ol' TV set at home.

 

 

FEATURED IN

 

 

 

ANYTIME ANYWHERE

Retroduck will transform your iPhone into a retro-style television anytime, anywhere. All you need to do is simply put it where you usually enjoy watching your entertainment apps and slide in your iPhone. Retroduck will not only transform into a convenient accessory - it will brighten up the room as a home decor.

 

 

SLEEP TIGHT, TIME TO CHARGE

Retroduck can double up as a convenient charging dock or as an awesome desktop clock. To charge, just insert your lightning cable into Retroduck's hidden cable guide for hassle-free charging. To transform your Retroduck into a bedside radio clock, simply download one of many radio clock apps available and your Retroduck will help you start a great day!

 

MAG!COVER

Removing and attaching Retroduck's front cover can be done effortlessly as the cover is made of magnet.

 

 

 

RICH SURROUND

Retroduck's speaker kernels have been designed to enrich and enhance your iPhone's audio, making it sound like a natural stream from a television set.

 

 

WITH OR WITHOUT LEGS

Retroduck’s standing legs are available as standard accessories. These stable legs not only play a central role in making the Retroduck look retro, but are also crucial for maintaining a comfortable height and tilt for your eyes, wherever you choose to place it.

 

 

UNLIMITED ACCESSORIES BY DIGITAL PRINT

Meet hundreds of different exclusive accessories for Retroduck. These accessories are not mass-produced but are custom-made with 3D printers. That's why we are able to offer countless accessories. New accessories are being added as we speak, and anyone can download and print them.

 

HOW TO USE

Using a Retroduck is extremely simple: Open the front cover, secure the lightning cable in the cable guide, close the front frame and slide in your iPhone. And did we mention that the front frame is made of magnets and can be removed and attached effortlessly?

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Retroduck is currently available in two sizes for iPhone only: one size to fit the standard iPhone 6, 6s, 7 and 8 sizes, and a plus size for the 6+, 6s+, 7+ and 8+. And we recommend using your iPhone with no cover or case for the best fit.

 

 

BEST FIT FOR IPHONE

 

 

COLOR VARIATION

Retroduck mainframes come in three different moods to fit your iPhone color and the space you'll be using it in. How about Pop Red for a bright and cheerful interior space? Or Classical Brown for a warm and cozy living room? Or Mono White for a calm and minimal space? The choice is yours.

 

 

PACKAGE CONTAINS

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

 

FROM IDEA TO PRODUCT

 

 

 

FAQ

Q: Which cables are compatible?

A: It is optimized for genuine iPhone lightning cable. It fits well with third party compatible cables of this standard.

 

Q: What are compatible smartphones?

A: iPhone 6, 6s, 7 and 8 size corresponding to the size and version corresponding to the plus size, you can choose from two sizes, respectively.

 

Q: Is it compatible with Android smartphones such as Galaxy?

A: Retroduck is now available for iPhone only. We are planning to release models corresponding to various Android sizes such as Galaxy in the near future.

 

Q: Is a lightning cable included?

A: Lightning cable is not included.

 

Q: Is there a rechargeable battery built in?

A: The battery is not included.

 

Q: Is there a speaker built in?

A: Speakers are not built in. However, it was designed to flow sound back and forth through the speaker kernels that were designed to fit the speakers of the iPhone.

 

Q: Is it okay to use the available accessories commercially made from downloaded open source accessory specifications?

A: Retroduck's accessory specifications are open source, open to anyone, and we support them to create their own accessories through 3D printers. But the commercial use of these accessories is strongly prohibited.

 

Q: Why are a lot of additional accessories made to order in a way called 3D printing?

A: We believe that the limits of the diversity of existing mass production can be overcome through 3D printing technology, so-called digital manufacturing. Retroduck's accessories are produced in a variety of small quantities through state-of-the-art 3D printers and can satisfy your unique personality in the world.

 

Q: How do I get the additional accessories?

A: Retroduck's additional accessories will be produced in small quantities via 3D printers and will be sold in a separate space. Additional information will soon be available via update.

 

Q: Is it possible to exchange or refund the product?

A: If the seal attached to the product is opened or damaged, it can not be exchanged or refunded. Please check your reward selection again!

 

 

 

MEMBER

Wisekids is a Seoul based company that seeks to expand the use of 3D digital printing technology in our everyday lives and culture through creative experimentation. Wisekids is in the process of uncovering new values that result from the mixing and remixing of everything digital and analogue, online and offline, while placing importance on spreading and sharing these new values with as many people as possible. Retroduck is our first attempt at mashing up conventional mass production procedures and digital manufacturing for the purpose of hardware production. Our project aims to surpass the limits of conventional mass production by digitally manufacturing a small amount of diverse products that meet a wider range of customers' needs.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Perhaps you are curious about this product.

Although this is our first Indiegogo campaign, it is not our first experience to produce unique, limited products.

Our journey began in 2014, and the first 3D printing prototype version has been reprinted and reprinted, with more than 500 versions sold worldwide.

We have done a lot of tests to meet you, and finally we have made it to a reliable level. We are sure your iPhone will love Retroduck. 

***** Manufacturing and supply chain ***** 
We have progressed to the final stage of the mold and begin production in mid-October, when we successfully complete our funding. And it ships to you as early as December in case of everything goes right on time. Although there may be some variation in shipping time, we will try hard to deliver you Retroduck as soon as possible. 

***** Our promise to you ***** 
We will update the news of Retroduck frequently, whether it is positive news or not, within the funding period. Our team is passionate and dedicated, and I want to make a small difference in your life through Retroduck. And what we want to say is that we want to make you and Retroduck meet very quickly.

Your smartphone is still attractive enough and can perform its original functions well. 
The latest smartphones are good, but we want to enhance your familiar smartphone’s value much higher.

That is the real reason we made Retroduck.

I would like to thank all those who participated in funding and love the Retroduck.

Thank you!

column2: >
>

>

 

Overview

• Run Android applications, just like you would on your phone or tablet.

• Support for multiple windows, just like on a conventional computer.

• 360 degree images, and a customizable interface. (Feel like you’re at the beach while in New York City).

• Just slip in your Android phone, install our app, and connect a bluetooth keyboard and mouse to get started.

Shipping currently set for December, in time for the holiday season.

What is it, and how is it going to replace my computer?

The Marvel is a Virtual Reality device that can replace your Laptop, not just your gaming console. It runs Android applications, just like your phone or tablet, so you can chat with friends from the beaches of Hawaii, power through your email in Rome, or write a document in space.

You navigate the interface using a Bluetooth Mouse and Keyboard, just like you would on your desktop computer. You’ll be able to customize the interface and background as you see fit, to be productive anywhere. Feel like you’re in the tropics in the middle of winter. This isn't just an entertainment device, this for both work and play, like your laptop.

We’re raising money on IndieGoGo to take the Marvel to the next level, and get it into the hands of people everywhere. We're not a big corporate company trying to steal your data and give you a cheap device.

We've made a high-class device that is accessible to everyone.
column8:
>Rewards

$1 — Pledge a Dollar to help us spread the Marvel into homes, schools and businesses everywhere. You’ll be kept up to date on the project, with exclusive updates on availability and more.

$10 — Your name will be put on our wall of love, and you’ll receive a personal thank you from our team, as a thank you for supporting our mission.

$99 — Get the Marvel! 

$1000 — Come to our Launch Party in New York City! You’ll get one of the first Marvel devices off the shelves, with your name engraved, and a handwritten thank you from the team. You’ll always be a key supporter of the Marvel. (We’ll send you more details if you opt for this reward.)

$5000- This is for people who want to sell the VR headset in their store or want to buy in bulk for other reasons.

$10,000 - This option is for large merchants that want to buy the Marvel VR headset or buy it in bulk for other reasons.

 

Team

We’re a team who’s designed and built apps, companies, and hardware.

We’re building the Marvel to change how and where computing is done, at home, at work, and in the classroom. 

Learn, build, and do with the Marvel.
column13:
>Support

 

We offer a 1-year warranty against manufacturer defects. Contact us with the details and we’ll ship you a new Marvel, as well as a pre-paid shipping label in some cases, when we want to diagnose the problem on your original device.

We ship worldwide, and the cost of shipping varies outside the United States. Once you’ve filled out the shipping information, we’ll let you know if shipping costs more than $20. If it does, we can refund you the full cost of the device, plus shipping, or you can choose to pay for the full cost of shipping.

 If you have any questions at all, we have easily accessible support via email and through IndieGoGo, reach out and we'll respond as soon as possible. 

 

Avoiding Risk

We’ve predicted demand, and have made sure production is ready to scale, when demand arises. Our team is experienced working with our manufacturers in China, and don’t foresee any component shortages.

Should any problems arise, like shortages, or issues with production, we’ll immediately update our backers, give detailed information, and take steps to resolve the problem.

Technical Details

Software

>We increase the font size so you can read easily
>8.6 x 5.2 x 5.1 inches, exact dimensions, with device inside
>Compatible with phones from 3.5 inch - 6 inch sizes, 5+ inch device recommended for the best experience

column1: ","Designed with high-quality lenses, ample padding, and enhanced eye tracking - so you won't be disoriented
Telegram for Android running on the Marvel (example UI)

Use it anywhere, even a café Overview• Run Android applications, just like you would on your phone or tablet.• Support for multiple windows, just like on a conventional computer.• 360 degree images, and a customizable interface. (Feel like you’re at the beach while in New York City).• Just slip in your Android phone, install our app, and connect a bluetooth keyboard and mouse to get started.Shipping currently set for December, in time for the holiday season.What is it, and how is it going to replace my computer?The Marvel is a Virtual Reality device that can replace your Laptop, not just your gaming console. It runs Android applications, just like your phone or tablet, so you can chat with friends from the beaches of Hawaii, power through your email in Rome, or write a document in space.You navigate the interface using a Bluetooth Mouse and Keyboard, just like you would on your desktop computer. You’ll be able to customize the interface and background as you see fit, to be productive anywhere. Feel like you’re in the tropics in the middle of winter. This isn't just an entertainment device, this for both work and play, like your laptop.We’re raising money on IndieGoGo to take the Marvel to the next level, and get it into the hands of people everywhere. We're not a big corporate company trying to steal your data and give you a cheap device.We've made a high-class device that is accessible to everyone.  Rewards$1 — Pledge a Dollar to help us spread the Marvel into homes, schools and businesses everywhere. You’ll be kept up to date on the project, with exclusive updates on availability and more.$10 — Your name will be put on our wall of love, and you’ll receive a personal thank you from our team, as a thank you for supporting our mission.$99 — Get the Marvel! $1000 — Come to our Launch Party in New York City! Hi, we're a small Australian software company that has produced a smartphone &
column2: tablet app which can assist people in calling the correct numbers and accessing important information needed during an emergency situation.

column1: • When seconds count, lives can be saved
• Our goal is to give the Emergency App to every Australian who owns a smartphone, tablet or computer
• From there, we'd like to share the Emergency App with the rest of the world
• Every dollar donated to this cause makes a world of difference to building the awareness of the Emergency App
• We need $30 000 to create a full scale PR awareness campaign across all of Australia
• We've got some interesting perks like postcards from the world heritage Fraser Island, in Queensland. (Which is where we are based)
• Personal messages via email, twitter and on our facebook page
• Premium Featured Business Directory listings from a month to 1 year
• Should we not reach our goal, the available funds will all still be used to increase awareness of the Emergency App
• Should we exceed our goal, the funds will be used to develop the Emergency App for overseas markets
• In the days of ever improving technology, it's important for us to utilise the advances we have for good - and what better good is there than to save a life
• Every year it seems as though natural disasters are occurring more often all around the world
• The need to access information quickly prior to an event is as important as knowing who to call after a disaster

<li>Everday emergencies are a part of life and unfortunately they affect everyone, the Emergency App covers a number of everyday emergency details including: Poisons Hotline, Lifeline, Crimestoppers, Electricity outages, Weather warnings, Traffic Conditions, Sexual Assualt, Alcohol &amp
• Make some noise about the Emergency App
• Tell all your friends and family so they can keep safe
• Send them to www.emergencyapp.com.au on their smartphone for the free web app (free smartphone app is in final stages of testing)
• And finally, share this info about the Emergency App through social media using the Indiegogo sharing tools.
Thank you for your assitance in bringing awareness to this live saving cause.

column7: >We have built Solu — a tiny collaborative cloud computer — to remove the hassle of installations, backups and storage from your life.

column1: Solu is built on a completely new type of operating system, linked to the cloud, but also working perfectly offline. It allows you to save time and money while focusing on teamwork. You do not have to worry about installing apps and their updates, and Solu has almost unlimited storage, with a history of everything you work on. Unlike other cloud computers, Solu also works offline. Get away from hassle and stop managing your IT, and do it with a beautiful UI.
Our operating system is packaged into a beautiful wooden pocket computer with its own screen and battery, but is also powerful enough to power all your daily computing needs.
Solu is conceptualised, designed, and manufactured in Finland.
Solu is rethinking how people interact with computers.
How three different characters use Solu computer on their daily basis?

To enable fluent work, Solu has designed a completely new OS. You will never again need to worry about your hard drive, file backups or software installations — Solu does it for you. Yet, Solu also works offline, synchronizing your data as soon as you’re connected to the Internet. You can even chat with your team while you are offline!

The user interface is designed around zooming in and out of 'cells' — a combination of content and application code. You do not need to open applications and files. Simply zoom in on what you want to do. These cells can be shared freely without anyone having to install them or worrying about versions. Developers simply get paid by people using their apps. In addition to Solu's own app library, with fully collaborative apps developed in HTML5 technologies, Solu is compatible with Android apps.

Cells can be collected into clusters, which represent projects or social groups you are involved with. By simply zooming in and out, you can switch the project or environment you are working in. No longer will you have a desktop full of overlapping projects and windows. Each cluster can also shared by a team, so you can work fluidly and together — in the most natural way possible.

The Solu cloud will store your data, device status and application settings automatically, without you having to spend a minute managing it. If you lose your device, you can get a new one and within minutes you are up and running again.
The virtually unlimited storage of SoluCloud combined with SoluOS ensure that the data and tools you need are always available and cached on the device for easy access – even when you are offline.
Solu is a pocket-sized computer that works as a stand-alone portable device. Alternatively, it can be connected to a screen and keyboard for a full desktop experience.

The physical device was designed to have a minimalistic, organic look that matches the form and function of its intuitive UI. Instead of cold metal or cheap plastic, we carved part of the device from real wood that is warm to touch and develops character over time. 

Used as a pocket computer, Solu has its own edge-to-edge touch screen with a zoomable interface, incredible accuracy and amazing contrast. Its built-in battery allows the device to be used on the go. Once connected to an external monitor with the elegant USB type C port, Solu’s screen transforms into a smart touchpad with context-specific controls.

Despite its size and beauty, Solu is incredibly powerful. It is one of the most powerful mobile devices ever created, and is more than 10 times faster than other MiniPCs capable of running Android applications.
People no longer work alone or as cogs in the machine
column2: they work together. The Solu OS is designed to support the modern way of working, where people are often editing the same document at the same time. With clever algorithms Solu managed to synchronise this in real time and figures out what to do when you reconnect after being offline.

column1:
SoluOS is collaborative by nature. Document sharing and discussions are at the very core of its OS, available to you across projects and documents.

Native apps and tools track all the changes you make in your documents. Whether you are working on something alone or with a group, you’ll always have access to the complete history.

When you share something, you’re not just sharing the document. You’re also sharing the application used to edit that document, which means that your collaborators can start working as soon as they open it.

The software industry is broken, and we have the means to fix it. Up until now, developers have been forced to charge substantial fees from a handful of clients or resort to getting pennies from individual users. Solu replaces this outdated business model by charging all users a small monthly fee.

column4: >For a fixed monthly fee of $20, you get all the storage and apps you need, without annoying in-app purchases, freemium options or advertisements. We are also helping developers to make a living out of their apps by sharing a fair portion of the monthly fee with them.

column1: Developer rewards are allocated based on exact user data. Our algorithm takes various factors into account: the number of users, the frequency of use, the length of each use and its overall usefulness.
We are working with a number of development houses to bring their collaborative tools to Solu, but we also support legacy Android apps.

Finland is best known for its technological innovation. It is the country that led the mobile revolution, where Linux was created and where databases were refined with MySQL. It is the home to some of the world’s leading gaming companies including Rovio and Supercell.

Solu was was inspired by the nature and skills of the Nordic people. Not only was Solu invented in Finland but it is also designed, built, tested and packaged there. When you buy a Solu you know you are getting something built in a place with very low levels of corruption, and high standards of working conditions.

Our values

Solu is not merely a company, it is a team of a 13 people, driven by a common goal. You can learn more about us on our web site.
Our core values and beliefs are the driving force behind everything we do:
We subscribe to and believe in innovation through every level of Solu and its activities. We are happy to stand out, challenge the status quo, and have pride in what we do.
• External display - support for up to 4K monitors
• Graphics - NVIDIA Kepler™ GPU with 192 NVIDIA CUDA® cores
• Connectivity - Dual-band 2x2 MIMO WiFi (802.11a/b/g/n), Bluetooth 4.0, and USB Type C

A project of this magnitude always contains risks. There are naturally areas of the software, in particular, which are still under development, and others which currently lack polish. Members of the Solu team have, however, delivered multiple hardware and software projects for a variety of companies ranging from large enterprises to startups. The progress of Solu has been extremely swift.

To minimize delays in delivery, we have completed a lion’s share of the work before launching our campaign on Kickstarter. We have been developing and testing the software for almost a year. We have built a number series of prototypes for the hardware, and have partnered with established hardware engineers to build the device. We have signed a contract with our manufacturing partner, and placed orders for several of the parts with long lead times.

About this project

We believe that coffee brewing can be a special experience - every single time, with every single cup. That’s why we created GINA, the first complete smart coffee brewing instrument. 

 

 

 

 

With a built-in Bluetooth SCALE weighing your ingredients will become easier, allowing you to find the perfect ratio between coffee, water and time.  

Your phone will connect GINA with an APP via Bluetooth to transfer and save all of your brewing data and see what the rest of coffee loving community is sharing.

With specially designed VALVE you can even tune your GINA and play with 3 different brewing techniques. Leave it open for pour-over, close it for immersion brew or set the drop flow for cold drip.

 

 

We combined all the features from the tools you already know into one complete device. All of your manual coffee brewing techniques are now featured in one. This means better use of your kitchen space and less hassle prepping all your coffee brewing tools.

 

 

Pour hot water over coffee grounds while leaving the valve open and observe the elegant flow - for the purest taste and highlighted qualities of the bean.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

Soak coffee grounds in the ceramic funnel, open the valve and extract the brewing - for the sharpest taste and a richer beverage body.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

 Put grounds into the inner glass pitcher and pour cold water into the funnel. Set the drop flow and let it drip - for the sweetest taste and smoothest beverage body.
column7: showinfo=0"">

column1: You can also make tea with GINA - soak tea in the ceramic funnel, open the valve and extract the brew.

GINA is ideal for both experts or first-time users 

The app itself connects you with the whole coffee loving community. It allows you to create and share your own brewing print or be guided through every step thanks to other friendly coffee masterminds.

 

COFFEE SHOP feature inside the APP 

We listened to your requests and added a COFFEE SHOP feature to our APP. It works best on tablets and it allows baristas in coffee shops to simultaneously control 4 GINA's at once. It goes perfectly with the BARISTA 4-PACK reward level. 

 

 

 

You can power GINA with the micro USB charger which comes included in the package. Her strong battery will keep her going for up to 80 brewing hours. Her stand by time is 30 days. Just follow the battery level in the app and immediately know when she needs recharging.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pick a shade of GINA that suits your taste best. Polished steel and powder coating finish in white or black. 

 

 

 

We compared GINA with a number of coffee brewing devices out there and we believe she can proudly stand next to each:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It wasn't easy coming up with a project like GINA. It is a result of our love for coffee, our passion for design and improving user experience that brought us to where we are today. We made sure that every detail of GINA is well thought through and crafted to perfection.

 

Wondering how GINA's software and hardware connect? Check out the video presentation below:
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

See the variety of rewards we offer below and let us know if you have any question or special request. We love talking to you!

 

 

 

 

 

It is such a pleasure working and creating with such a great team. Product design and product development: Luka Pirnat
column7: Copywriter: Dunja Kristan. Production manager: Domen Lavrič
column8:
Business developer: Katja Sever, Graphic designer: Petra Ogrin and more than 10 other team members who made this project possible.

We also couldn’t have done it without the support of our friends. Special thanks go to: Aleš Turšič – coffee roaster, Damjan Bizjak – coffee shop owner
column9: Jaka Birsa – photography, Brightvisuals – video production
column15: Moderna caffe and STOW cafe – coffee shops
column17:
props.

THANK YOU !

Anze Miklavec, Founder

 

Risks and challenges

After the GOAT Mug, GINA is a second crowdfunding campaign for the GOAT STORY team. We've experienced and learned a lot working on the first one and we're proud to say that all 10,617 pledges from the first campaign were successfully delivered.

Our team now is even bigger and stronger. We have 5 working prototypes of GINA. Many hardware and electronic prototypes were built in order to come to the final PCB board. Right now it is working perfectly and we managed to optimise the firmware for fast connection and optimise the battery life to 80 working hours and 10 months in stand-by position. We even have some more place for additional improvements. The GINA app has the final design ready and the crucial screens working.

All prototypes were tested by baristas, roasters and coffee experts worldwide. Determined that we will deliver an exceptional product once again, we made sure that every detail of GINA is carefully selected and made from the best quality materials.

We're so excited for everyone to start using GINA. You will be impressed!

Determined that we will deliver an exceptional product once again, we made sure that every detail of GINA is carefully selected and made from the best quality materials.We're so excited for everyone to start using GINA. You will be impressed!",44.0,5,"1 Campaign

column1: AppYourCar is the first smartphone gear specifically designed to give you an easy and safe way to use your phone or tablet in your car.
Consisting of a Wireless Bluetooth Controller, a Wireless Dashboard Mounting and an Innovative Mobile App.
We set out to develop AppYourCar with one simple idea in mind: To bring all your favorite apps, on your own smartphone into your car.
The only thing you need to have your favorite apps and all your personal data available while driving your car, is an easy and safe way to control your smartphone directly.
AppYourCar enables you to use all your messaging or social media apps right there on your smartphone – without taking your eyes off the road or your hands off the steering wheel.

AppYourCar‘s Wireless Bluetooth Controller is designed to integrate perfectly with your steering wheel and its patent pending technology gives you the same unrestricted access to your smartphone as if you would use your phones touchscreen by hand.
AppYourCar is for reading, browsing and selecting data from all kinds of apps which improve your driving experience. It is neither a keyboard, nor a gamepad.
Just use the thumb joystick to navigate and control your apps and you will be amazed how much your smartphone has to offer you this way!
We worked really hard on minimizing the number of buttons on the controller. In doing so, we created the most effective, yet simplest way to control your phone with just your thumb and fingers.

On the back of the Android controller you will find the 'quick navigation' buttons. They will bring you back to the corresponding category in our Innovative Mobile App - no matter which other app you're using at that moment.
On the back of the iOS controller you will find the buttons to do a swiping action on your phone's screen. The VoiceOver button tells your phone to read any selected text or message out loud.
On the front of both controller versions you will find the main controls for browsing and selecting apps or menu entries, list entries or other data inside an app.
AppYourCar was designed with safety in mind. The Controller sits snugly on your steering wheel.
That way you can keep control of your vehicle at any given moment. The Controller will fit on almost any steering wheel.
Just mount it onto yours in the way it fits your driving style best.
Also, life is grey enough, let's put some color in! Just choose a color which works best for your car:
The Wireless Dashboard Mounting lets you keep your eyes where they belong: On the road.

With our amazing new smartphone mounting we made sure, that you get the best possible view onto your smartphones display. Also, it is the most comfortable mounting on the market. Just clip your phone to the front of the mounting and the mounting will securely keep it there with the help of its two powerful magnets.
We are using the newest charging technology available right now: Wireless Charging. If your phone supports wireless charging you will never have to bother with any cables again.
And if it doesn't? Just plug the usb cable into the mounting, then into your phone and you'll never run out of juice again!
Wireless and wired charging, a bluetooth hands-free connection, audio and music streaming: Our Dashboard Mounting does it all.

And aren't you sick of all those cables running and hanging around in the interior of your car? The only cables you need are plugged into the back of our mounting. With their extra long reach you can guide them along the windshield down to your cars 12 V power outlet and your radios audio jack: A cable-free dashboard.
AppYourCar comes with an Innovative Mobile App. If you wish, it provides you with fast access to those apps and functions you want to use most frequently.

It is divided into three categories: Communication, Media and Navigation. Use any of the three category screens to quickly start any third party app you like. Of course you can configure and adapt each category screen to your individual liking.
The Innovative Mobile App was specifically designed to be used while driving. With its easy to recognize buttons it's really convenient to use even while you're behind the wheel.
The idea for AppYourCar was born a little bit over a year ago. Since then we have worked tirelessly to improve upon the idea continuously.
During this time our team grew and the idea evolved from being a fun and smart gadget we wanted for ourselves to a product you will want for your car as well.
We experimented with several different prototypes and software architectures to find the best solution for controlling a smartphone.
Demo - Controlling an Android phone with an older prototype:
Demo - Controlling an iPhone with an older prototype:
We now have a fully functional and finished prototype. We also have a manufacturer lined up with massive experience and countless global customers.
That way we make sure that not only you will get your AppYourCar system on time, but also that it‘s the highest quality product we could possibly make.
We do have a fully functional prototype and our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production.
But we need your help to bring AppYourCar to market. Only together we can make this vision become reality: A Way to Use Your Smartphone Apps in Your Car!
Furthermore we started this crowdfunding campaign not only to raise the needed funds but also to gather as much input as possible from you - the crowd!
It is only with your invaluable input and support that we can finish this amazing new gadget.
We are a team of geeks with many years of experience in developing hardware and software solutions for a number of international companies.
Our background of working for BMW, Siemens, Infineon and Bosch enabled us to create a truly unique product of the highest quality.

With different backgrounds of computer science, electrical engineering, physics, economics, politics, public administration, sociology, marketing, software, graphic and video design, our team is well prepared to overcome any potential obstacles we might face in the future.
As a founder of now three information technology companies and as the CEO of two of those companies, Antony has the needed experience to guide AppYourCar to success.
Alex has two passions: BBQ and economics.
As the CFO of now two companies he knows his numbers well. Surprisingly enough, he has also incredible knowledge in developing embedded systems.
Flo develops products for a living. From concept, to development, to beta testing and finally the launch of a new product.
As the CTO he will make sure that AppYourCar will be of the highest possible quality.
Harald is the father of the idea behind AppYourCar: Simply brilliant and brilliantly simple!
He is spearheading research and the development of all prototypes and electronic components.
Florian is all about social marketing and the power of the community.
He has worked for international companies all over the EU and knows how to bring the power of the crowd into the development of a new product.
Roland has years of experience in product and automotive design as well as strategic &amp
As an Co-founder of Zyncd.com, he's also passionate about innovative business models and products.
Ben is the man behind the scene, quit literately. He's directing, shooting and editing our video production. Ready? And Action!
Mesbah has a passion for modern development methods. By employing methods like 'test driven development', SCRUM and 'clean code', he keeps our software code at the highest possible quality.
Markus is Mesbah's right hand, his left hand and sometimes even his right foot. Together they make sure that no line of code is ever only seen by one person. Team work does it!
Managing a crowdfunding campaign is exciting and a lot of fun.
Nevertheless, we will not cease improving the product itself and we will keep on pushing really hard towards the launch of the product. Here is how we are planning to do so:
Yes! Shipping is included for all countries.
Why do EU contributors need to add VAT?

As a company registered in the EU we are required by law to charge VAT to EU contributors. However, if you are ordering on behalf of an European company with a valid VAT ID, you don't need to add VAT to your perk. Simply provide us with your VAT ID when we will ask you to do so by mail.
I live in the EU and forgot/was unable to add VAT – what shall I do?
Don´t worry – you’re not the only one :)
Once the campaign has ended, we will contact each contributor about outstanding costs. We will also give you instructions on how to pay.
I want to change the shipping address – can I do that?
Yes, you can! Before shipment we will be contacting each contributor to confirm the shipping address. This will give you the option to change the address, if you wish.

YES. We did extensive research in that regard and are certain that AppYourCar is legal according to current laws and regulations. AppYourCar is basically an infotainment system like any other legal automobile on-board system: Giving you a controller, a display (= your smartphone) and a way to browse and select infotainment related data while driving.
Why do you call AppYourCar an 'infotainment system' and what exactly are those?

Infotainment systems are usually on-board systems consisting of different categories like communication, media and navigation. AppYourCar excels in those categories because your smartphone is way more advanced than any on-board system and has those functions down easily.
Why is AppYourCar so much better than all the other (high end) infotainment systems?

Your smartphone's genius shines where other infotainment systems stop: Read notifications from your social media apps, check your calendar, read short messages from any messaging service, get traffic and weather forecasts, leave voice messages to your contacts or even to yourself as a reminder service...
AppYourCar turns your smartphone into the most advanced on-board system the world has ever seen. Why? Simply because your smartphone is just such an amazingly powerful device!
But isn't it dangerous to use your smartphone extensively while driving?

Yes, indeed! That is why AppYourCar does NOT provide you with a way to misemploy your smartphone while driving. AppYourCar was built with safety in mind. It gives you access and a way to browse and read important but small amounts of data when you need it.
AppYourCar is for reading, browsing and selecting small amounts of data from all kinds of apps which improve your driving experience.
• Safely choose whatever song you like to listen to from all the music on your smartphone.
• Checking your calendar appointments for a time and date or an address. It's no more complex or complicated than scrolling through a list of radio stations.
• Easily access voice command apps for complicated inputs like an address.
• Use the text-to-speech function to have your phone read your short messages out loud.
• Dictate a short message with the help of your smartphone's speech-to-text functionality.
And what exactly CAN'T you do with AppYourCar?
The system is not designed to simply entertain or even worse distract you from driving.

• Writing an email while driving. AppYourCar has no keyboard or anything similar. It is built to let you read, browse and select small amounts of data only. You will be amazed how much your smartphone has to offer you this way!

• Play a video game or something equally idiotic! AppYourCar is NOT a gamepad. Think of it as a small remote control for your smartphone sitting snugly on your steering wheel and giving you access to what really can improve your driving experience.
<h4>Why is AppYourCar by far the safest 'infotainment system' on the market?
AppYourCar's system utilizes the power of your smartphone and combines it with an easy and safe way for you to use while driving.
• You are in constant control of the vehicle. You never have to take your hands of the steering wheel! The AppYourCar Controller fits perfectly on almost any steering wheel.
You have direct control of your phone's apps with just the use of your thumb and fingers. And with its smart design, it also doesn't constrict the use of the steering wheel in any way.
• You can keep your eyes where they belong: On the road. The AppYourCar Mounting can be positioned on the dashboard of your car.
With the display of your phone sitting above the steering wheel, almost at eye level, the system is very close to the sensation of a head-up display (HUD).
At the same time your smartphone is not obstructing your view of the street since it is not mounted directly on to the windshield.

• There is no more unnecessary distraction due to complicated and uncomfortable infotainment systems build into your car. After all, there are not many 'computer systems' you know so well as your own smartphone, are there?
What kind of smartphones does AppYourCar support?
AppYourCar works with Android and iOS smartphones and tablets.
What Android Versions are known to work with AppYourCar?
The system was developed for Android Version 4.0 and higher. It is known to work with Android Versions as low as 2.3, but some functions may not be working perfectly.
If you are interested in more information please contact us directly: contact@appyourcar.com.
Which Android Apps are supported by AppYourCar?
All Android Apps which fulfill the following requirements can be fully controlled:

All drawable resources which are used for accessing and controlling an app's functions should represent the state of the control by a StateListDrawable (e.g. a button is highlighted to show that it's selected at the moment).

The focus handling of all drawable resources which are used for accessing and controlling an app's functions should be declared properly (e.g. a button declares which button will be highlighted next).
Furthermore, there are a lot of Android apps which do not fulfill those requirements completely but can still be accessed and satisfyingly used with AppYourCar.
Which iOS Version are supported by AppYourCar?
The system was developed for iOS Version 7.0.x and higher. It is known to work with lower Versions as well, but some functions may not be working perfectly.
If you are interested in more information please contact us directly: contact@appyourcar.com.
Which iOS Apps are supported by AppYourCar?
All iOS Apps are supported by AppYourCar.
What are the technical specs of the Wireless Bluetooth Controller?
• Size: 66 x 30 x 26 mm. (without the mounting brackets.)
• Connectivity: Connects via Bluetooth with your smartphone or tablet.
• One charge keeps the Controller running for up to 6 months easily. (Based on typical user experience. Your results may vary.)
• Ultra-portable: The super-small design fits snugly on almost any steering wheel.
What are the technical specs of the Wireless Dashboard Mounting?
• Size: 135 x 70 x 12 mm. (without the suction cup.)
• Connectivity: Connects via Bluetooth with your smartphone or tablet. (If your car is not equipped with its own hands-free bluetooth connection.)
• Audio and music streaming: The mounting can be plugged into your radios 3.5mm audio jack.
• Wireless charging: If your smartphone supports wireless charging the mounting recharges your phone wirelessly.
• Wired charging: If your smartphone does not support wireless charging just plug the micro usb cable into the mounting and then into your phone.
• Secure contact: Your smartphone is kept in its place by two powerful neodin magnets. (Magnets do not harm your phones function in any way.)
• Ultra-portable: Installing the mounting only takes a moment.

<li>Less cables, less hassle: The only cables you need are plugged into the back of the mounting. (With their extra long reach you can guide them along the windshield down to your cars 12 V power outlet.)
The Innovative Mobile App was designed to provide you with fast access to those apps and functions you want to use most frequently.
It is divided into three categories: Communication, Media and Navigation.
• Fast access: Use any of the three category screens to quickly start any third party app you like.
• Designed for driving: The app was specifically designed to be used while driving. With its easy recognizable and bigger buttons it's really convenient to use even while you're behind the wheel.
• Communication: The Mobile App provides you with a list of your contacts and short messages. Call any of your friends or read any short message directly in the app.
• Media: Use the app's own music player to listen to all the music on your smartphone.
• Navigation: The Mobile App provides you with an address database (based on OSM data) and a way to put in, save or use any address for navigation.
Yes, of course. You can configure and adapt each category to your individual liking.
• Select any third party app and put it on any of the three category screens for faster access.
• Organize and sort the three category screens to your individual liking.
• Use AppYourCar's Mobile App as your personal driving homescreen.

column2: >Solid Anodized Aluminium body and a strong Polycarbonate housing. Finished in a soft-touch rubber coat.

>Three integrated USB charging ports for the iPhone, Apple Watch and additional port at the back to charge any other USB Devices such as your iPad or Kindle.

column4: >harge your iPhone without the hassle of removing your protected case or Mophie Juice Pack battery case.

column7: >Simple and quick installation, while the non-slip rubber base keeps your devices firmly in place. Integrated cable management system keeping cables neatly hidden for a clutter-free space with instant charging.

column1: Compact, portable keychain backup battery solution with an integrated Apple® MFI Lightning Cable and convenient detachable keyring means you’re always ready for instant power on-the-go.

column2: >Latest CSR Bluetooth Smart Chipset allowing low energy connectivity for locating your Keys or iPhone just in case you have misplaced them on the go with a 100FT proximity range.
